entry.defn: Work order

noun love; affection 母愛 mǔ'ài maternal love 父愛 fù'ài paternal love 夫妻之愛 fūqī zhī ài conjugal love 狂熱的愛 kuángrè de'ài wild love; madly in love 把愛傾注在孩子身上 bǎ ài qīngzhù zài háizi shēnshang heap affection on one’s child; smother one’s child with love 
verb 1 love 愛和平 ài hépíng love peace; peace-loving 愛祖國 Ài zǔguó love one’s country 溺愛孩子 nì'ài háizi dote on one’s children; spoil a child 2 like; fond of; keen on 愛下棋 ài xiàqí keen on chess 愛出風頭 ài chū fēngtou fond of the limelight; like attention 酷愛 kù'ài have an excessive fondness of; dead keen on 只愛聽恭維話, 不愛聽批評話 Zhǐ ài tīng gōngweihuà, bù ài tīng pīpíng huà. fond of flattery but deaf to criticism 我不愛跟他來往。 Wǒ bù ài gēn tā láiwǎng. I don’t like having anything to do with him. 3 cherish; treasure; hold dear; take good care of 愛公物 Ài gōngwù look after public property 愛廠如家 àichǎngrújiā treat the factory like one’s family 愛集體榮譽 ài jítǐ róngyù cherish the good name of the group 4 apt to; in the habit of 愛頭疼 ài tóuténg often get headaches; prone to headaches 愛暈車 ài yùnchē get carsick 愛發脾氣 ài fā píqi irritable; short-tempered 不愛誇人 bù ài kuā rén seldom praise others 鐵愛生鏽。 Tiě ài shēngxiù. Iron rusts easily.

noun 1 class; team 短訓班 duǎnxùnbān short training course 跳班 tiàobān skip a grade in school 作業班 zuòyèbān work team 2 shift; duty 接班 jiēbān come on shift 替班 tìbān take someone else’s shift 三班倒 sānbāndǎo work in three shifts 今晚是我的班兒。 jīnwǎn shì wǒ debān r. I’ll be on duty tonight. 3 military squad 加強班 jiāqiángbān reinforced squad 4 dated [as part of the term for a troupe] 戲班兒 xìbānr theatrical troupe; company of players 5 (Bān) a surname 
verb move troops; withdraw troops 班兵 bān bīng call back troops 
measure word 1 a group of people 這班年輕人真了不起。 Zhè bān niánqīngrén zhēn liǎobuqǐ. They’re a fine bunch of young people. 2 a trip by bus, boat, etc. 班船 bānchuán regular ship 搭下一班火車 Dā xià yī bān huǒchē take the next train 一路公共汽車每隔三分鐘就有一班。 Yī lù gōnggòng qìchē měi gé sān fēnzhōng jiù yǒu yī bān. There’s a Number One bus every three minutes. 
adjective regularly-run; regular; scheduled 班機 bānjī regular air service

verb 1 report; announce; declare 報上級批准 bào shàngjí pīzhǔn report (or submit) to the higher authorities for approval; send up for approval 爆竹報春。 Bàozhú bào chūn. Firecrackers exploded, proclaiming the Spring Festival. 2 reply; respond; reciprocate 報友人書 bào yǒurén shū a reply letter to a friend 報以熱烈的掌聲 bào yǐ rèliè de zhǎngshēng respond with warm applause 3 recompense; requite 無以為報 wúyǐwéibào unable to repay a kindness 4 revenge 
noun 1 newspaper 辦報 bànbào run a newspaper 日報 rìbào daily 2 periodical; journal 畫報 huàbào pictorial 3 bulletin; report 捷報 jiébào victory bulletin 4 telegram; cable 發報 fābào transmit a telegram; send a wire 5 retribution; judgment 果報 guǒbào retribution for a sin

number half 半年 bànnián six months; half a year 半小時 bàn xiǎoshí half an hour 價格減半 Jiàgé jiǎn bàn a 50% discount; halve the price 一個半月 yī ge bàn yuè a month and a half; one and a half months 與某人對半分 yǔ mǒurén duì bàn fēn go halves with sb. 增加一倍半 zēngjiā yī bèi bàn increase by 150% 
adjective 1 half; semi- 半機械化 bànjīxièhuà semi-mechanized 2 in the middle; halfway 半山腰 bànshānyāo halfway up a hill 半開玩笑地說 Bàn kāi wánxiào de shuō say half jokingly 房門半開著。 Fángmén bàn kāizhe. The door was half open. 3 very little; the least bit 他連半句話都不說。 Tā lián bàn jù huà dōu bù shuō. He didn’t breathe a word. or He said nothing.

verb 1 do; handle; manage; tackle; attend to 代辦 dàibàn act on sb.’s behalf; act for sb. 你看著辦吧。 Nǐ kànzhe bàn ba. Do whatever you think is best. 缺少經費, 這事兒沒法辦。 quēshǎo jīngfèi, zhè shìr méifǎ bàn. Without the necessary funds the job is impossible. 我該怎麼辦？ Wǒ gāi zěnme bàn？ What shall I do? 我有點兒事得辦一辦。 Wǒ yǒudiǎnr shì děi bàn yī bàn. I have something to attend to. 這點兒事她一個人辦得了。 Zhèdiǎnr shì tā yī gèrén bàndeliǎo. She can handle (or tackle) this by herself. 2 buy a fair amount of; get sth. ready 辦酒席 bàn jiǔxí prepare a feast 辦年貨 bàn niánhuò New Year shopping; go shopping for the Spring Festival 他們剛辦完喜事。 Tāmen gāng bàn wán xǐshì. They recently got married. 3 set up; run 辦工廠 Bàn gōngchǎng run a factory 辦教育 bàn jiàoyù be involved in education 村里新辦了一所學校。 Cūnli xīn bàn le yī suǒ xuéxiào. The village has set up a new school. 4 colloquial punish (by law); bring to justice 辦了幾個為首的 Bàn le jǐ ge wéishǒu de punish the ringleaders

noun 1 cup 茶杯 chábēi teacup 瓷杯 Cí bēi china cup 酒杯 jiǔbēi beer mug 高腳杯 gāojiǎobēi goblet; wine glass 2 (alcoholic) drink 貪杯 tānbēi too fond of drinking (or the bottle) 咱們喝一杯。 Zánmen hē yī bēi. Let’s have a drink. 3 (prize) cup; trophy 世界杯 shìjièbēi World Cup 獲得獎杯 huòdé jiǎng bēi win the cup 
measure word cup; glass 一杯茶 yī bēi chá a cup of tea 兩杯啤酒 liǎng bēi píjiǔ two glasses of beer; two beers

noun 1 the root or stem of a plant 水有源, 木有本。 Shuǐ yǒu yuán, mù yǒu běn. A stream has its source; a tree its roots. 2 foundation; basis; origin (opp. 末) 健康是幸福生活之本。 Jiànkāng shì xìngfú shēnghuó zhī běn. Health is fundamental to a happy life. 3 capital; principal 還本付息 huánběnfùxī pay back the principal plus interest 賠本兒買賣 Péi běn r mǎimai losing business 
verb be based on 每句話都有所本。 Měi jù huà dōu yǒusuǒ běn. Every statement is well-founded. 
adjective 1 major; central See 17399296本部ben3bu4本部 2 original; intrinsic See 17415680本性ben3xing4本性 
adverb originally; at first 我本不想去 wǒ běn bù xiǎng qù Originally I didn't want to go. 
pronoun 1 oneself; one's own work 本單位 běn dānwèi one’s own work unit 2 current; this; present 本周 běnzhōu this week; the current week 本決議 běn juéyì this resolution 
preposition according to; in line with 本有關規定執行 běn yǒuguān guīdìng zhíxíng act according to the relevant rules and regulations 
noun 1 book 賬本 zhàngběn account book; ledger 筆記本 bǐjìběn notebook 戶口本 hùkǒuběn residence registration booklet 日記本 rìjìběn diary 2 manuscript; script; copy 抄本 chāoběn hand-copied book; transcript 劇本 jùběn script 影印本 yǐngyìnběn photocopy 3 edition; version 普及本 pǔjíběn popular edition 善本 shànběn valuable edition 4 colloquial licence; diploma; certificate 考本 kǎoběn take tests for a driver’s licence; take driving tests 
measure word [for books, parts of a serial, etc.] 兩本書 Liǎng běn shū two books 這部電影有十二本。 Zhè bù diànyǐng yǒu shí'èr běn. This is a twelve-reel film.
noun cup; glass

noun 1 pen, pencil, or writing brush 擱筆 gēbǐ lay down one’s pen; finish writing 提筆 tíbǐ put pen to paper; start writing 一管筆 yī guǎn bǐ a writing (or painting) brush 一支筆 yì zhī bǐ a pen (or pencil) 2 technique of writing, calligraphy, or drawing 敗筆 bàibǐ poor expression in otherwise good writing; fly in the ointment 文筆 wénbǐ style of writing literary style 神來之筆 shénláizhībǐ stroke of genius; inspired writing 3 stroke; touch “天”字有四筆。 “tiān” zì yǒu sì bǐ. The character 天 has four strokes. 你給他寫信時, 替我帶一筆。 Nǐ gěi tā xiěxìn shí, tì wǒ dài yī bǐ. Please remember me to him when you write. 這裡再添幾筆, 情節就更生動了。 Zhèlǐ zài tiān jǐ bǐ, qíngjié jiù gèng shēngdòng le. Add a few touches here and the episode will be more lively. 
verb literary write 筆之於書 bǐzhīyúshū put down in black and white; write down; record 
measure word 1 [for sums of money, financial accounts, debts, etc.] 一筆錢 yī bǐ qián a sum of money; a fund 有三筆賬要算 Yǒu sān bǐ zhàng yào suàn have three scores to settle 2 [for skill in calligraphy or painting] 能畫幾筆山水畫 néng huà jǐ bǐ shānshuǐhuà be a landscape painter of sorts 寫得一筆好字 xiě de yī bǐ hǎo zì write a good hand; good penmanship
noun 1 meter; gauge 水錶 shuǐbiǎo water meter 2 watch (a timepiece) 校錶 jiàobiǎo adjust a watch; set the time 鍍金錶 dùjīn biǎo gold-plated watch 給錶上發條 Gěi biǎo shàng fātiáo wind up a watch

noun 1 side (of a geometrical figure) 三角形的一邊 Sānjiǎoxíng de yībiān one side of a triangle 2 side; margin; edge; brim; rim 碗邊兒 wǎn biānr rim of a bowl 寬邊草帽 kuān biān cǎomào broad-brimmed hat 田邊地頭 tián biān dìtóu edges of the fields 湖邊那座揚水站 hú biān nà zuò yángshuǐzhàn pumping station on the shore of the lake 每頁邊上的批註 měi yè biānshàng de pīzhù notes in the margin on every page 襯衣的邊兒 chènyī debiān r hem of a shirt 街道兩邊 jiēdào liǎngbiān both sides of the street 3 border; frontier; boundary See 17552896邊城bian1cheng2邊城 4 limit; bound 不著邊兒 bù zhe biān r not to the point; beside the point; miss the point 一望無邊 yīwàngwúbiān stretch as far as the eye can see; boundless 外層空間沒個邊兒。 Wài céng kōngjiān méi ge biānr. Outer space is boundless. 這話可太沒邊兒了。 Zhè huà kě tài méi biānr le. That’s just absurd. or The remark missed the point. 5 place next to; by the side of 坐在窗邊 zuò zài chuāng biān sit by the window 放本字典在手邊 fàng běn zìdiǎn zài shǒu biān keep a dictionary at hand; have a dictionary near 6 part; side 雙邊協定 shuāngbiān xiédìng bilateral agreement 7 [after numerals or words indicating time] close to; near 活到六十邊 huó dào liùshí biān close to (or getting on for) sixty 8 (Biān) a surname 
adverb [used with two verbs to indicate the simultaneous progression or development of two actions] 邊讀邊議 biān dú biān yì read and discuss as one goes along 邊幹邊學 biāngàn-biānxué learn while working; learn on the job 邊哭邊說 biān kū biān shuō speak with sobs 邊發展邊鞏固 biān fāzhǎn biān gǒnggù expand while consolidating 他邊唱歌邊工作。 Tā biān chànggē biān gōngzuò. He sang as he worked.

verb 1 leave; part 別故鄉 bié gùxiāng leave one’s native place 辭別 cíbié say goodbye 不辭而別 bùcí'érbié take French leave; leave without saying goodbye 揮淚而別 huīlèi ér bié part in tears 久別重逢 jiǔbiéchóngféng meet after a long separation 2 dialect turn; change 她把頭別了過去。 Tā bǎ tóu bié le guòqu. She turned her head away. 這個人的脾氣一時別不過來。 Zhège rén de píqi yīshí bié bù guòlai. There is no changing his temper. 
adjective other; another See 56541667別處bie2chu4別處 
noun 1 difference; distinction 男女有別 nánnǚyǒubié make a distinction between the sexes 天壤之別 tiānrǎngzhībié as different as light from darkness; totally different 2 classification; category 職別 zhíbié official rank 
verb literary differentiate; distinguish 別其真偽 Bié qí zhēn-wěi determine whether it’s genuine or false 
verb 1 fasten with a pin or clip 把表格別在一起 bǎ biǎogé bié zài yīqǐ pin (or clip) the forms together 胸前別著大紅花 xiōngqián bié zhe dà hónghuā with a big red flower pinned on one’s breast 2 stick in 腰裡別著旱煙袋 yāo lǐ bié zhe hànyāndài with a pipe stuck in one’s belt 把門別上。 Bǎ mén bié shàng. Bolt the door. 
adverb 1 [giving commands or advice] don't; better not 別忙。 Bié máng. No hurry. or Take your time. 別管我。 bié guǎn wǒ. Leave me alone. 別忘了。 Bié wàng le. Don’t forget. 2 [expressing anxiety that sth. undesirable may happen] 明天可別下雨。 Míngtiān kě bié xià yǔ. I hope it doesn’t rain tomorrow. 他別睡過頭了, 誤了火車。 Tā bié shuì guò tóu le, wù le huǒchē. Hope he won’t oversleep and miss the train.
noun other; another; the rest 別的國家 biéde guójiā other countries 這個不好, 請換個別的。 zhège bù hǎo, qǐng huàn ge biéde. This one is not good; please give another.
noun written examination (opp. 口試) 參加筆試 cānjiā bǐshì take a written examination
noun 1 father's elder brother; uncle 二伯父 èr bófù second uncle 2 term of address for an older man of one's father's generation; uncle 張伯父 zhāng bófù Uncle Zhang

adverb 1 [before verbs, adjectives, and other adverbs; never before the verb 有] not; won't; not want to 我不會。 Wǒ bù huì. I don’t know how. 我不去。 Wǒ bù qù. I’m not going. or I won’t go. 他不是學生。 Tā bù shì xuésheng. He isn’t a student. 他的病不(很)嚴重。 Tā de bìng bù (hěn) yánzhòng. His illness is not (very) serious. 他昨天不來, 可是今天來了。 Tā zuótiān bù lái, kěshì jīntiān lái le. He didn’t come yesterday, but came today. 2 [before certain nouns to form an adjective] un-; in- 不法 bùfǎ illegal; lawless 不軌 bùguǐ against the law 不道德 bùdàodé immoral 不自在 bùzìzai ill at ease; uncomfortable 3 [used alone or with a particle in responses] not so; no 您再吃一點兒吧。——不了, 謝謝。 Nín zài chī yīdiǎnr ba. —— Bù liǎo, xièxie. How about having some more? —No more, thanks. 他不知道吧？——不, 他知道。 Tā bù zhīdao ba？ —— bù, tā zhīdao. He doesn’t know, does he? —Yes, he does. 他是上海人。——不是吧。 Tā shì Shànghǎi rén. ——bù shìba. He comes from Shanghai. —No, I don’t think so. 他知道嗎？——不, 他不知道。 Tā zhīdao ma？ —— bù, tā bù zhīdao. Does he know? —No, he doesn’t. 4 colloquial [at the end of a sentence to indicate a question] 你要咖啡不？ Nǐ yào kāfēi bù? Some coffee? 他現在身體好不？ Tā xiànzài shēntǐ hǎo bù？ Is he in good health now? 5 [between a verb and its complement] cannot 打不開 dǎbùkāi unable to open 進不去 jìnbùqù cannot go in 拿不動 nábùdòng (find sth.) too heavy to carry 6 [inserted within a reduplication, usu. preceded by 什麼] no matter (how, where, etc.) 什麼難學不難學, 我保證學會。 Shénme nán xué bù nán xué, wǒ bǎozhèng xuéhuì. No matter how hard I’ll learn it. 什麼學歷不學歷, 要有真才實學才行。 Shénme xuélì bù xuélì, yào yǒu zhēncáishíxué cái xíng. Formal schooling is all very well, but what matters is real knowledge and ability. 7 [used correlatively with 就] if not... (then...); either...or 他這會兒不(是)在教室, 就(是)在圖書館。 Tā zhèhuìr bù shì zài jiàoshì, jiùshì zài túshūguǎn. At this time, he’s either in the classroom or in the library. 晚上他不是看書, 就是看報。 Wǎnshang tā bù shì kànshū, jiùshì kànbào. In the evening he either reads a book or a newspaper. 8 [in polite formulas only] don't; needn't 不謝。 bù xiè. Don’t mention it.
adverb 1 not necessarily; by no means 不一定這樣做。 bùyīdìng zhèyàng zuò. This is not necessarily the way to do it. 2 not certain; not sure 他不一定來。 Tā bùyīdìng lái. He may not come.

adjective 1 correct; right 這個答案一點兒不錯。 Zhège dá'àn yīdiǎnr bùcuò. This answer is perfectly correct. 2 colloquial not bad; pretty good 錄音不錯。 lùyīn bùcuò The recording is pretty good. 這個主意不錯。 Zhège zhǔyi bùcuò. This idea is not bad. 莊稼長得挺不錯。 Zhuāngjia zhǎng de tǐng bùcuò. The crops are doing well. 3 [used alone to express agreement] yes 不錯, 他是這麼說的。 Bùcuò, tā shì zhème shuō de. Yes, that’s what he said.

noun 1 vegetable; greens 種菜 zhòngcài grow vegetables 2 (non-staple) food 上街買菜 shàngjiē mǎi cài go to the market to buy food 3 dish; course 川菜 Chuāncài Sichuan dishes; Sichuan cuisine 做菜 zuòcài prepare the dishes; do the cooking 一道菜 yī dào cài a course 做四道菜 zuò sì dào cài prepare a four-course meal 地方風味菜 dìfang fēngwèi cài local cuisine 4 (edible) wild herbs 吃糠咽菜 chī kāng yàn cài barely keep alive on chaff and wild herbs 5 oil seed rape; rape

noun 1 difference; dissimilarity 時差 shíchā jet lag See 18244096差別cha1bie2差別 2 mathematics difference 兩數之差為四。 Liǎng shù zhī chā wéi sì. The difference between the two figures is 4. 
adverb literary only just; barely 差可 chākě barely passable

noun 1 tea (the plant or its leaves) 採茶 cǎichá pick tea (leaves) 種茶 zhòng chá grow tea 這兒產茶。 Zhèr chǎn chá. Tea is produced here. 2 tea (the drink) 紅茶 hóngchá black tea 綠茶 lǜchá green tea 濃茶 nóngchá strong tea 淡茶 Dànchá weak tea 品茶 pǐnchá sip tea to judge the flavour 沏茶 qīchá make tea 喝早茶 hē zǎo chá have morning tea 喝午茶 hē wǔ chá have afternoon tea 請給我倒杯茶。 qǐng gěi wǒ dào bēi chá. Please give me a cup of tea. 你的茶裡要加糖嗎？ Nǐ dechá lǐ yào jiā táng ma? Do you take sugar in your tea? 3 certain kinds of beverage or liquid food 杏仁茶 xìngrénchá almond paste (used to make a drink); almond-flavoured drink 4 dated betrothal gift (often in the form of tea) 下茶 xiàchá send a betrothal gift 5 botany tea-oil tree; oil-tea camellia See 18274304茶油cha2you2茶油 6 botany camellia See 67494826茶花兒cha2hua1r5茶花兒 7 dark brown See 18269952茶色cha2se4茶色

colloquial adjective 1 about the same; similar 姐妹倆長相差不多。 Jiěmèi liǎ zhǎngxiàng chàbuduō. The two sisters look very much alike. 他們倆高矮差不多。 Tāmen liǎ gāo'ǎi chàbuduō. The two of them are about the same height. 2 just about right; just about enough; not far off; not bad 麥子熟得差不多了, 該割了。 Màizi shú de chàbuduō le, gāi gē le. The wheat is just about ripe enough to be cut. 那件行李你扛不動, 我扛還差不多。 Nà jiàn xíngli nǐ káng budong, wǒ káng hái chàbuduō. That luggage is too heavy for you, but I can carry it. 
adverb almost; nearly 差不多一半同學都學過英語。 Chàbuduō yībàn tóngxué dōu xué guò Yīngyǔ. Nearly half the students have learned English. 你比我差不多高一頭。 Nǐ bǐ wǒ chàbuduō gāo yī tóu. You’re almost a head taller than me. 我差不多等了兩個小時。 Wǒ chàbuduō děng le liǎng ge xiǎoshí. I waited for nearly two hours.

verb 1 sing 唱國歌 Chàng guógē sing the national anthem 唱女高音 chàng nǚgāoyīn sing the soprano part 唱唱祖國新面貌 chàngchàng zǔguó xīn miànmào sing of the new look of the motherland 頌歌一曲唱北京 sònggē yī qǔ chàng Běijīng sing a song in praise of Beijing 2 call; cry 唱收唱付 chàngshōuchàngfù call out the amounts when receiving money from and giving change to a customer 雞唱三遍。 Jī chàng sān biàn. The rooster has crowed three times. 
noun theater a song or a singing part of a Chinese opera

adverb frequently; often; many a time; more often than not 她常常工作到深夜。 Tā chángcháng gōngzuò dào shēnyè. She often works far into the night. 他倆常常通過電子郵件交換學術上的看法。 Tāliǎ chángcháng tōngguò diànzǐ yóujiàn jiāohuàn xuéshù shàng de kànfǎ. The two of them frequently discuss academic questions through email.

noun 1 thing 她買東西去了。 Tā mǎi dōngxi qù le. She’s out shopping. or She’s gone shopping. 他收拾好東西就走了。 Tā shōushi hǎo dōngxi jiù zǒu le. He packed his things and left. 一成不變的東西是沒有的。 Yīchéngbùbiàn de dōngxi shì méiyǒu de. Nothing is immutable. 分析形勢要注意全局性的東西。 Fēnxi xíngshì yào zhùyì quánjú xìng de dōngxi. When analysing a situation, pay attention to things that affect it as a whole. 2 [referring to a person or animal] thing; creature 這小東西真可愛。 Zhè xiǎo dōngxi zhēn kě'ài. What a sweet little thing! 真不是東西！ Zhēn bù shì dōngxi! What a despicable creature!

adverb 1 all 大家都到了嗎？ Dàjiā dōu dào le ma？ Is everybody here? 什麼都行。 Shénme dōu xíng. Anything will do. 我父母都不在了。 Wǒ fùmǔ dōu bù zài le. My parents are both deceased. 2 [with 是 to show the cause] 都是你, 把他灌成這樣。 Dōu shì nǐ, bǎ tā guàn chéng zhèyàng. It’s all your fault making him drunk. 都是你老磨蹭, 害得我們遲到了。 Dōu shì nǐ lǎo móceng, hài de wǒmen chídào le. It is because you dawdled that we were late. 3 even 今天天氣真怪, 中午比早晨都冷。 Jīntiān tiānqì zhēn guài, zhōngwǔ bǐ zǎochen dōu lěng. What strange weather, it’s colder at noon than early in the morning! 連他都不知道。 Lián tā dōu bù zhīdao. Even he doesn’t know. 4 already 他都八十歲了, 身子骨還那麼硬朗。 Tā dōu bāshí suì le, shēnzi gǔ hái nàme yìnglang. He’s already eighty but still going strong.

noun antithetical couplet; couplet 喜對 xǐ duì wedding couplet 
verb 1 answer; reply 無言以對 wúyányǐduì have nothing to say in reply 2 treat; cope with; counter 刀對刀, 槍對槍 dāo duì dāo, qiāng duì qiāng sword against sword and spear against spear 上海隊對北京隊 Shànghǎi duì duì Běijīng duì Shanghai versus Beijing 3 train on; direct at 槍口對著某人 qiāngkǒu duì zhe mǒurén train the gun on sb. 她的話不是對著你的。 Tā de huà bù shì duì zhe nǐ de. What she said was not directed at you. 4 bring (two things) into contact; fit together 這個榫頭對不上。 Zhège sǔntou duì bù shàng. This tenon does not fit. 5 suit; agree; get along 對心眼兒 duìxīnyǎnr suit one very well; compatible 6 compare; check; identify; verify 對筆跡 duì bǐjì identify the handwriting 對號碼 duì hàomǎ verify numbers 7 set; adjust 對好望遠鏡的距離 duì hǎo wàngyuǎnjìng de jùlí adjust the focus of a telescope 8 mix; add 茶太濃了, 給我對點兒水。 Chá tài nóng le, gěi wǒ duì diǎnr shuǐ. Add some water to the tea, it’s too strong for me. 9 divide into halves 對股劈 duìgǔ pī go halves; split fifty-fifty 
adjective 1 opposite; opposing See 59556067對岸dui4an4對岸 2 right; correct 猜對了 cāi duìle guess right 對,  就這麼辦。 Duì, jiù zhème bàn. All right, just do it. or Yes, that’s what we’ll do. 你說得很對。 Nǐ shuō de hěn duì. What you say is quite true. or You are quite right. 這事你做得對。 Zhè shì nǐ zuò de duì. You did the right thing. 他今天神色不對。 Tā jīntiān shénsè bùduì. He doesn’t look himself today. 
adverb mutual; face to face 對罵 duìmà call each other names; curse each other 對飲 duìyǐn (two people) drink together 對坐 duìzuò sit facing each other 
preposition with regard to; concerning 對健康不利 duì jiànkāng bùlì bad for one’s health; unhealthy 對青少年的教育工作 duì qīng-shàonián de jiàoyù gōngzuò educating young people; education of the young 對這個問題的不同意見 duì zhège wèntí de bùtóng yìjian different views on this question 對犯罪分子實行法律制裁 duì fànzuì fènzǐ shíxíng fǎlǜ zhìcái impose legal sanctions on criminals; punish criminals according to the law 他對父親很尊敬。 Tā duì fùqin hěn zūnjìng. He has great respect for his father. 這錄音機對我來說是夠好的了。 Zhè lùyīnjī duì wǒ láishuō shì gòu hǎo de le. This recorder is good enough for me. 
measure word pair; couple 一對夫婦 yī duì fūfù a married couple 一對花瓶 yī duì huāpíng a pair of vases

common phrase I'm sorry; sorry; excuse me; pardon me; I beg your pardon 對不起, 給你添麻煩了。 Duìbuqǐ, gěi nǐ tiān máfan le. Sorry to have given you so much trouble. 對不起, 是我的錯。 Duìbuqǐ, shì wǒ de cuò. I am sorry, it was my fault. 對不起, 我得走了。 Duìbuqǐ, wǒ děi zǒu le. Excuse me, but I must go now. 對不起, 請你再講一遍好嗎？ Duìbuqǐ, qǐng nǐ zài jiǎng yī biàn hǎo ma？ I beg your pardon, would you repeat what you said? or I beg your pardon? 
verb let sb. down; unworthy of; unfair to (opp. 對得起) 球隊輸了球, 大伙兒覺得對不起教練。 Qiúduì shū le qiú, dàhuǒr juéde duìbuqǐ jiàoliàn. The team lost and felt they had let the coach down. 他對不起她, 本來答應跟她結婚, 後來卻把她甩了。 Tā duìbuqǐ tā, běnlái dāying gēn tā jiéhūn, hòulái què bǎ tā shuǎile. He treated her shabbily by first promising to marry her and then jilting her.
1 Correct! 2 Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention) 3 Oh, by the way, ...

adjective 1 many; much; more (opp. 少, 寡) 很多人 hěn duō rén many people 多思。 Duō sī. Think more. 人多議論多。 Rén duō yìlùn duō. More people mean more ideas. 這樣簡單多了。 Zhèyàng jiǎndān duō le. This is much simpler. 要辦的事情很多。 Yào bàn de shìqing hěn duō. There are many things to do. 他多喝了一點兒 (= 喝多了一點兒)。 tā duō hē le yīdiǎnr . He’s had a drop too much. 我在那兒多住了幾天。 Wǒ zài nàr duō zhù le jǐ tiān. I stayed there a few days longer. 時間緊迫, 我不能多考慮。 Shíjiān jǐnpò, wǒ bù néng duō kǎolǜ. Time is running out so I can’t give it much thought. 我們比原計劃多打了十口井。 Wǒmen bǐ yuán jìhuà duō dǎ le shí kǒu jǐng. We have sunk ten more wells than planned. 昨天很熱, 今天涼快多了。 Zuótiān hěn rè, jīntiān liángkuai duō le. It was quite hot yesterday but today it’s a lot cooler. 2 excessive 多疑 duōyí suspicious; distrusting 
adverb over a specified amount; and more 十多斤 shí duō jīn a dozen or more jin 十斤多 shí jīn duō over ten jin 六十多歲 liùshí duō suì over sixty years old 三個多月 sān ge duō yuè over three months; three months and more 一百多個人 yībǎi duō ge rén more than 100 people 全書一千多頁。 Quánshū yīqiān duō yè. It’s a book of 1,000-odd pages. 
verb 1 have (a specified amount) more or too much (opp. 少) 班上多了三個新同學。 Bān shàng duō le sān ge xīn tóngxué. There are three more new students in the class. 這個句子多了一個詞。 zhège jùziduō le yī ge cí. There is one word too many in this sentence. 2 have sth. in abundance 南方多水, 利於灌溉。 Nánfāng duō shuǐ, lìyú guàngài. Irrigation is easy in the South because of the abundance of water. 這裡春天多風, 夏天多雨。 Zhèlǐ chūntiān duō fēng, xiàtiān duō yǔ. Here we have a lot of wind in spring and a lot of rain in summer. 
adverb 1 [in questions] to what extent 他多大年紀了？ Tā duō dà niánjì le？ How old is he? 天安門有多高？ Tiān'ānmén yǒu duō gāo？ How high is Tian’anmen? 多厚的木板才能做桌面呢？ Duō hòu de mùbǎn cái néng zuò zhuōmiàn ne？ How thick must a wooden plank be to make a table top? 2 [in exclamations] to what an extent 看她多漂亮！ Kàn tā duō piàoliang! Look how pretty she is! 這天兒多悶哪！ Zhètiānr duō mēn nǎ! What stuffy weather! 3 to an unspecified extent 有多大勁兒使多大勁兒。 Yǒu duō dà jìnr shǐ duō dà jìnr. Use out all the strength you have. 走出不多遠, 他又回來了。 Zǒu chū bù duō yuǎn, tā yòu huílai le. He turned back before going far. 多複雜的算術題他都能做出來。 Duō fùzá de suànshù tí tā dōu néng zuò chūlai. He can figure out any arithmetic problem, no matter how complicated.

pronoun 1 how many; how much 這藥我每次吃多少？ Zhè yào wǒ měi cì chī duōshao？ How much of the medicine do I take each time? 這一班有多少學生？ Zhè yī bān yǒu duōshao xuésheng？ How many pupils are there in this class? 這裡的糧食畝產量是多少？ Zhèlǐ de liángshi mǔchǎnliàng shì duōshao？ What is the per mu yield of grain here? 2 [expressing an unspecified amount or number] 我知道多少說多少。 Wǒ zhīdao duōshao shuō duōshao. I’ll tell all I know. 我跟你說過不知多少次了。 Wǒ gēn nǐ shuō guò bù zhī duōshao cì le. How many times I’ve told you! or I’ve already told you many times.

verb 1 make things convenient for sb. 方便群眾 fāngbiàn qúnzhòng make things convenient for the people 2 euphemistic have money to spare or lend 手頭不方便 shǒutóu bù fāngbiàn have little money to spare 3 euphemistic go to the lavatory 你要不要方便一下？ Nǐ yào bù yào fāngbiàn yīxià？ Do you want to use the lavatory (or wash your hands)? 稍候, 我去方便方便。 Shāohòu, wǒ qù fāngbiàn fāngbiàn. Wait a few minutes. I’m just going to wash my hands.

noun dining hall; dining room; mess hall 這個飯廳可容三百人就餐。 Zhège fàntīng kě róng sānbǎi rén jiùcān. The dining hall can seat 300 people.

verb 1 (of birds or insects) fly; flit 飛鳥 fēiniǎo flying bird 老鷹飛得高。 Lǎoyīng fēi de gāo. Eagles fly high. 小鳥飛(走)了。 Xiǎoniǎo fēi le. The bird flew away. 蜜蜂在花叢中飛來飛去。 Mìfēng zài huā cóng zhōng fēi lái fēi qù. Bees are flitting from flower to flower. 2 (of an aircraft or its occupants) fly; travel by plane 我明天飛上海。 Wǒ míngtiān fēi Shànghǎi. I’m flying to Shanghai tomorrow. 那架飛機從北京直飛廣州。 Nà jià fēijī cóng Běijīng zhí fēi Guǎngzhōu. That plane flies nonstop from Beijing to Guangzhou. 3 hover or flutter in the air 飛絮 fēi xù willow catkins fluttering in the air 飛鳶 Fēi yuān a hovering kite 飛雪花了。 Fēi xuě huā le. It’s snowing. 4 colloquial disappear through volatilization 樟腦丸放久了會飛凈的。 Zhāngnǎowán fàng jiǔ le huì fēi jìng de. Camphor balls will disappear as time goes on.

noun aircraft; aeroplane; plane 我坐飛機去上海。 Wǒ zuò fēijī qù Shànghǎi. I’ll go to Shanghai by plane.

verb 1 divide; separate; part (opp. 合) 分組討論 fēnzǔ tǎolùn hold discussions in groups 分階段實行 Fēn jiēduàn shíxíng carry out stage by stage 一年分四季。 Yī nián fēn sìjì. The year is divided into four seasons. 這藥分三次吃。 Zhè yào fēn sān cì chī. This medicine is to be taken in three separate doses. 他的頭髮往右邊分。 Tā de tóufa wǎng yòubianfēn. He parts his hair on the right side. 一條河把縣城分成兩半。 Yī tiáo hé bǎ xiànchéng fēn chéng liǎngbàn. A river divides the county town into two parts. 2 distribute; assign; allot 她分到了一套新房子。 Tā fēn dào le yī tào xīn fángzi. She has been allotted a new flat. 把這個任務分給我們吧。 Bǎ zhège rènwu fēn gěi wǒmen ba. Assign (or Give) this task to us, please. 音樂會的票都已經分完了。 Yīnyuèhuì de piào dōu yǐjing fēn wán le. The tickets for the concert have all been distributed. 大學畢業後, 他就分到外交部工作。 Dàxué bìyè hòu, tājiù fēn dào Wàijiāobù gōngzuò. After his graduation from college, he was assigned to work at the Foreign Ministry. 3 distinguish; differentiate 是非不分 shìfēibùfēn make no distinction between right and wrong 現在還分不出個勝負來。 Xiànzài hái fēn bù chū ge shèng-fù lái. It’s still quite impossible to tell who’ll win. 這對雙胞胎長得一模一樣, 簡直分不出誰是誰。 Zhè duì shuāngbāotāi zhǎng de yīmúyīyàng, jiǎnzhí fēn bù chū shuí shì shuí. The twins look so much alike that you can hardly tell them apart.

measure word 1 fraction 約分 yuēfēn reduction of a fraction 2 [in spoken forms of fractions and percentages] 三分之一 sānfēn zhīyī one-third 十分之七 shífēn zhī qī seven-tenths 百分之四 bǎifēn zhī sì four per cent 3 one tenth (of certain units of the metric system) 4 fen (of the traditional system of weights and measures) a a traditional unit of length, equal to 0.01 chi (市尺), and equivalent to 0.333 centimetre or 0.131 inch b a traditional unit of weight, equal to 0.001 jin (市斤), and equivalent to 0.5 gram or 0.175 ounce c a traditional unit of area, equal to 0.1 mu (市畝) and equivalent to 0.667 acre or 79.73 square yards d a unit of weight equal to 0.1 qian (錢) or 0.01 liang (兩) 5 fen (equal to one hundredth of a yuan (元)) 六元三角五分 liù yuán sānjiǎo wǔfēn 6.35 yuan 6 minute (equal to one sixtieth of an hour) 7 minute (equal to one sixtieth of a degree of angle or arc) 成 36 度 30分角 chéng 36 dù 30fēn jiǎo form an angle of 36 degrees 30 minutes (36°30′) 東經 129 度 15分 dōngjīng 129 dù 15 fēn 129 degrees 15 minutes (129°15′) east longitude 8 a unit of interest rate a 1% monthly interest 月利一分二釐. yuèlì yī fēn èr lí 1.2% monthly interest b 10% annual interest 年利一分二釐. niánlì yī fēn èr lí 12% annual interest 9 point; mark 六十分為及格。 Liùshí fēnwéi jígé. Sixty is the passing mark. 甲隊罰球連得二分。 Jiǎ duì fáqiú lián de èrfēn. Team A scored two successive points by free throws. 他今天考試得了一百分。 Tā jīntiān kǎoshì déle yībǎi fēn. He got full marks in today’s exam. 10 [for nonphysical things] one-tenth 七分成績, 三分錯誤 Qī fēn chéngjì, sānfēn cuòwù 70 per cent achievements, 30 per cent mistakes 他已經有三分醉了。 Tā yǐjing yǒu sānfēn zuì le. He’s a bit tipsy already. 我的牙痛好了幾分。 Wǒ de yátòng hǎo le jǐ fēn. My toothache has been partly relieved. 這消息使我多了一分希望。 Zhè xiāoxi shǐ wǒ duō le yī fēn xīwàng. The news raised my hopes a little.

noun scenery; landscape 欣賞風景 xīnshǎng fēngjǐng admire the scenery 西湖風景如畫。 Xī Hú fēngjǐngrúhuà. The West Lake is as beautiful as a painting. 桂林以風景優美著稱 Guìlín yǐ fēngjǐng yōuměi zhùchēng. Guilin is famous for its scenic beauty.

verb 1 ought to be; should be 按歲數排, 該老潘排第一。 Àn suìshu pái, gāi lǎo Pān pái dì-yī. By seniority, Old Pan should go first. 2 be sb.'s turn (or duty) to do sth.; fall to sb. 該我了。 gāi wǒ le. It’s my turn now. 你要是聽了他的話, 就該你倒霉。 Nǐ yào shì tīng le tā de huà, jiù gāi nǐ dǎoméi. You’re in for trouble if you’ve followed his advice. 3 deserve; merit; serve sb. right 該打 gāidǎ deserve a good beating 4 must; should; ought to 該罰 gāi fá should be punished 我該走了。 Wǒ gāi zǒu le. I must be off now. 我不該來。 Wǒ bù gāi lái. I shouldn’t have come. 5 [no negative form; not to be used alone in answering a question] will probably; most likely; can be reasonably or naturally expected to; ought to; should 該畢業了 gāi bìyè le due to graduate 他該到了。 tā gāi dàoliǎo. He ought to be here by now. 6 [in exclamatory sentences for emphasis] 這些樹長大成林時, 風景該(有)多美！ Zhèxiē shù zhǎngdà chénglín shí, fēngjǐng gāi duō měi! When these trees grow into a forest, how beautiful the scenery will be!

adjective firm; strong; unyielding; indomitable (opp. 柔) 以柔剋剛 yǐróukègāng overcome hardness with softness 他的性情太剛。 Tā de xìngqíng tài gāng. He has a very strong character. 
adverb 1 just; exactly; precisely 這雙鞋大小剛合適。 Zhè shuāng xié dàxiǎo gāng héshì. This pair of shoes is just the right size (or fits perfectly). 2 barely; only; just; no more than 剛到八點。 gāng dào bā diǎn. It’s just eight o’clock. 他剛十八歲, 有了選舉權。 Tā gāng shíbā suì, yǒu le xuǎnjǔquán. He just turned 18 and has the right to vote. 3 only a short while ago; just 她剛走。 Tā gāng zǒu. She just left. 她剛來過。 Tā gāng lái guò. She was here just now.

verb 1 give; grant; present 給某人顏色看 gěi mǒurén yánsè kàn give sb. a lesson; make it hot for sb. 給我一杯水喝。 Gěi wǒ yī bēi shuǐ hē. Give me a cup of water (to drink). 公司給他一個月的假。 Gōngsī gěi tā yī ge yuè de jià. The company granted him a month’s leave. 杭州給我的印象很好。 Hángzhōu gěi wǒ de yìnxiàng hěn hǎo. Hangzhou left a very good impression on me. 這本書是給你的。 Zhè běn shū shì gěi nǐ de. This book is for you. 我給他一個不理睬。 Wǒ gěi tā yī ge bù lǐcǎi. I just ignored him. 2 let; allow; make 給我看看。 Gěi wǒ kànkan. Let me have a look. 開完運動會, 給我累得夠嗆。 Kāi wán yùndònghuì, gěi wǒ lèi de gòuqiàng. After the sports meet, I was tired out. 
preposition 1 [after a verb, indicating the handing over of sth.] 交給他一封信 jiāo gěi tā yī fēngxìn hand him a letter 我把鑰匙留給你。 Wǒ bǎ yàoshi liúgěi nǐ. I’ll leave the key with you. 2 for the benefit of; for the sake of; for 給旅客送水倒茶 gěi lǚkè sòng shuǐ dàochá bring drinking water and tea for the passengers 我給你當翻譯。 Wǒ gěi nǐ dāng fānyì. I’ll act as interpreter for you. 3 [introducing the recipient of an action] 他給我道歉了。 Tā gěi wǒ dàoqiàn le. He’s apologized to me. 4 [in passive sentence to introduce what has happened] 衣服給汗水濕透了。 yīfugěi hànshuǐ shītòu le. Clothes were soaked with sweat. 
auxiliary [before a verb for emphasis] 我差點兒把這事給忘了。 Wǒ chàdiǎnr bǎ zhè shì gěi wàng le. I almost forgot that. 質量不合格給換。 Zhìliàng bù hégé gěi huàn. Substandard products will be exchanged.

noun heel 腳跟 jiǎogēn heel 高跟鞋 gāogēnxié high-heeled shoes 平跟鞋 píng gēn xié flat(-heeled) shoes 
verb 1 follow 跟我來。 Gēn wǒ lái. Come along with me. or Follow me. 請跟我念。 Qǐng gēn wǒ niàn. Please read after me. 你們走得太快, 我跟不上。 Nǐmen zǒu de tài kuài, wǒ gēnbushàng. You all walk too fast. I can’t keep up with you. 緊跟形勢 jǐngēn xíngshì keep abreast of the current situation 2 (of a woman) marry sb. 他要是老這樣遊手好閒我就不跟他。 Tā yào shì lǎo zhèyàng yóushǒuhàoxián, wǒ jiù bù gēn tā. I won’t marry him if he doesn’t stop fooling around. 
preposition 1 [indicating accompaniment, relationship, involvement, etc.] with 跟父母住一塊兒 Gēn fùmǔ zhù yīkuàir live with one’sparents 這件事跟他沒有關係。 Zhè jiàn shì gēn tā méiyǒu guānxi. It has nothing to do with him. 2 [introducing the recipient of an action] 我有幾句話跟你講。 Wǒ yǒu jǐ jù huà gēn nǐ jiǎng. There’s something I want to talk to you about. 3 [expressing comparison] as; from 跟他一樣高 gēn tā yīyàng gāo as tall as him 跟去年相比, 產量增加了百分之十。 Gēn qùnián xiāngbǐ, chǎnliàng zēngjiā le bǎifēn zhī shí. Output has increased by 10% over last year. 
conjunction and; with 他跟我都是四川人。 Tā gēn wǒ dōu shì Sìchuān rén. He and I are both from Sichuan.
noun 1 state-owned (or office) vehicle (opp. 私車) 2 dialect public bus

noun (public) bus 上公共汽車 shàng gōnggòng qìchē get on the bus 下公共汽車 Xià gōnggòngqìchē get off the bus 雙層公共汽車 shuāngcénggōnggòngqìchē double-decker bus 乘1路公共汽車去西單。 chéng 1 lù gōnggòngqìchē qù xī dān. Take Bus No.1 to Xidan.
noun company; corporation; firm 公司(內部)成員 gōngsī chéngyuán members of a company

adjective enough; sufficient; adequate 你錢夠不夠？ Nǐ qián gòu bù gòu？ Do you have enough money? 我吃夠了。 Wǒ chī gòu le. I’ve had enough. 錢不夠買一本字典。 Qián bù gòu mǎi yī běn zìdiǎn. The money is not enough to buy a dictionary. 只舉一個例子就夠了。 zhǐ jǔ yī ge lìzi jiù gòu le. A single example will suffice. 這活兒夠我們忙幾天的。 Zhè huór gòu wǒmen máng jǐ tiān de. This job will keep us busy for several days. 
adverb enough (to reach a certain extent); sufficiently 夠好了。 Gòu hǎo le. It’s good enough. 今兒夠冷的。 Jīnr gòu lěng de. It’s quite cold today. 今天你們可夠辛苦了。 Jīntiān nǐmen kě gòu xīnkǔ le. You’ve really done a hard day’s work. 
verb 1 reach (sth. by stretching) 我夠不著書架的最上一層。 Wǒ gòu bu zháo shūjià de zuì shàng yī céng. I can’t reach the top shelf of the bookcase. 2 reach (a standard or level) 夠標準 gòu biāozhǔn be up to standard 夠資格 gòu zīgé be qualified
noun 1 dog 2 vulgar damned; cursed 狗東西 gǒu dōngxi that son of a bitch

adjective 1 expensive; costly; dear (opp. 賤) 我買貴了。 Wǒ mǎi guì le. I paid too much for it. 絲綢比棉布貴。 Sīchóu bǐ miánbù guì. Silk is more expensive than cotton. 2 highly valued; valuable 兵貴精, 不貴多。 Bīng guì jīng, bù guì duō. Troops are valued for their quality, not their number. 3 of high rank; noble (opp. 賤) 貴婦人 guìfùrén a noble lady 4 courteous your 貴國 guìguó your (honourable) country 喜得貴子 xǐ de guì zǐ (gratulate you on) having just got your son 請問(您)貴姓？ qǐngwèn guì xìng? May I ask your name? or What’s your name, please? 
noun (Guì) abbreviation Guizhou Province
noun courteous (your honourable) surname 您貴姓？——免貴姓張。 Nín guìxìng? ——Miǎn guìxìng zhāng. May I know your surname? —My family name is Zhang.

noun 1 country; nation; state 大國 dàguó a big country 強國 qiángguó a powerful nation 諸侯國 zhūhóu guó feudal states 保家衛國 bǎojiāwèiguó protect our homes and defend our country 利國利民 lìguólìmín benefit both country and people; good for the country and for the people 2 best of the nation See 22188288國手guo2shou3國手;22186496國色guo2se4國色 3 abbreviation Kuomintang (KMT) 國共兩黨 Guó Gòngliǎngdǎng KMT and CPC 4 (Guó) a surname 
adjective 1 of the state; national See 22161408國花guo2hua1國花 2 of our country; Chinese See 22161664國畫guo2hua4國畫
noun country; nation; state 社會主義國家 shèhuìzhǔyì guójiā a socialist country 母親和兒童受國家的保護。 Mǔqin hé értóng shòu guójiā de bǎohù. Mothers and children are protected by the state.

adverb 1 still; yet 還有一些具體問題要解決。 Háiyǒu yīxiē jùtǐ wèntí yào jiějué. Some specific problems have yet to be solved. 我們還沒有開始。 Wǒmen hái méiyǒu kāishǐ. We haven’t started yet. 夜深了, 他還在學習。 Yèshēn le, tā hái zài xuéxí. It was late at night and he was still studying. 2 even more; still more 今年的收成比去年還要好。 Jīnnián de shōucheng bǐ qùnián hái yào hǎo. This year’s harvest is even better than last year’s. 3 as well; in addition 我們不但要提高產量, 還要保證質量。 Wǒmen bùdàn yào tígāo chǎnliàng, hái yào bǎozhèng zhìliàng. We want not only to increase the quantity of products, but also to ensure the quality. 這本書我還想看一遍。 Zhè běn shū wǒ hái xiǎng kàn yī biàn. I want to read the book once more. 4 passably; fairly 屋子不大, 收拾得倒還幹凈。 Wūzi bùdà, shōushi de dào hái gānjìng. The room is small, but it’s kept quite tidy. 這張畫兒畫得還可以。 Zhè zhāng huàr huà de hái kěyǐ. The painting wasn’t done too badly. or This painting’s not very bad. 5 as early as 還在三年前他們就認識了。 hái zài sān niánqián tāmen jiù rènshi le. They got to know each other three years ago. 他還在讀中學時就開始寫小說。 Tā hái zài dú zhōngxué shí jiù kāishǐ xiě xiǎoshuō. He started to write novels when he was in middle school. 6 even 你跑那麼快還趕不上他, 何況我呢？ Nǐ pǎo nàme kuài hái gǎnbùshàng tā, hékuàng wǒ ne? Even a good runner like you can’t catch up with him, how can I? 7 [for emphasis] 那還用說！ Nà hái yòng shuō! That goes without saying. 這還了得！ Zhè hái liǎode! This is the limit! or This is simply atrocious! 8 [expressing realization or discovery] 他還真有辦法。 Tā hái zhēn yǒu bànfǎ. You’ve got to admit he’s resourceful. or He really is resourceful. 下這麼大的雨, 沒想到你還真準時到了。 Xià zhème dà de yǔ, méi xiǎngdào nǐ hái zhēn zhǔnshí dàoliǎo. I didn’t expect you’d arrive on time as it’s raining so hard.

adjective not bad; passable 不想還好, 一想就生氣。 Bù xiǎng hái hǎo, yī xiǎng jiù shēngqì. It’s all right if I don’t think about it, but whenever I do, I always get angry. 你今天感覺怎樣？——還好。 Nǐ jīntiān gǎnjué zěnyàng？ —— hái hǎo. How are you feeling today? —Not so bad. 你最近很忙吧？ ——還好。 Nǐ zuìjìn hěn máng ba？ —— hái hǎo. Are you very busy these days? —So so. 
adverb fortunately 還好, 電話總算打通了。 Hái hǎo, diànhuà zǒngsuàn dǎtōng le. I was fortunate enough to get through finally. 還好,  這場大水沒有把堤壩沖壞。 Hái hǎo, zhè cháng dà shuǐ méiyǒu bǎ dībà chōng huài. Fortunately, the flood did not break the dyke.

adverb 1 still; yet 廢物還是可以利用的。 Fèiwù háishi kěyǐ lìyòng de. Waste materials can still be made use of. 這次還是他做我們的向導。 Zhècì háishi tā zuò wǒmen de xiàngdǎo. He is still our guide for this trip. 儘管旱情嚴重, 今年的小麥還是豐收了。 Jǐnguǎn hànqíng yánzhòng, jīnnián de xiǎomài háishi fēngshōu le. Despite the serious drought, the wheat harvest this year was good. 2 [expressing a preference for an alternative] 還是坐飛機快。 Hái shi zuò fēijī kuài. It’s much faster to travel by air after all. 還是你來吧, 我在家等你。 Hái shi nǐ lái ba, wǒ zài jiā děng nǐ. It would be better for you to come; I’ll be at home waiting for you. 天冷了, 你還是多穿點兒吧。 Tiān lěng le, nǐ hái shi duō chuān diǎnr ba. It’s getting cold, you’d better put on more clothes. 3 [expressing realization or discovery] 還是厲害的人有辦法。 háishi lìhai de rén yǒu bànfǎ. It’s the pushing type that gets on. 這個人還是真了不起。 Zhège rén hái shi zhēn liǎobuqǐ. This chap is really great. 
conjunction 1 or 你去, 還是他去？ Nǐ qù, háishi tā qù? Are you going or is he? 先去上海還是先去西安還沒有定。 Xiān qù Shànghǎi háishi xiān qù Xī'ān hái méiyǒu dìng. We haven’t decided yet whether we go to Shanghai or Xi’an first. 2 no matter what; whether...or...; regardless of 不管颳風還是下雨, 他天天準時到校。 Bùguǎn guāfēng háishi xiàyǔ, tā tiāntiān zhǔnshí dào xiào. He goes to school on time every day no matter whether it rains or blows. 無論唱歌還是跳舞, 她都行。 Wúlùn chànggē háishi tiàowǔ, tā dōu xíng. Singing or dancing, she is good at both.
noun 1 child 男孩子 Nánháizi boy 女孩子 nǚháizi girl 2 son or daughter; children 她有兩個孩子。 tā yǒu liǎng ge háizi, She has two children.

adjective 1 good; fine; nice (opp. 壞) 好人 hǎorén nice person 祖國的好兒子 Zǔguó de hǎo érzi worthy (or fine) son of our country 莊稼長得真好。 Zhuāngjia zhǎng de zhēn hǎo. The crops are growing well. 2 friendly; kind 好朋友 Hǎo péngyou good (or great) friend 他們對我真好。 Tāmen duì wǒ zhēn hǎo. They are really kind to me. 倆孩子又好了。 Liǎ háizi yòu hǎo le. The two children are friends again. 3 be in good health; get well 你好哇！ Nǐ hǎo wa! How are you? 我的病好了。 Wǒ de bìng hǎo le. I’m well (or all right) now. 4 be ready; done 飯好了。 Fàn hǎo le. The food (or rice) is ready. 5 [after verbs to indicate finishing or finishing satisfactorily] 我把他的病治好了。 Wǒ bǎ tā de bìng zhì hǎo le. I cured his illness. 這件事他做不好。 Zhè jiàn shì tā zuò bù hǎo. He can’t do this job well. 坐好吧, 要開會了。 Zuò hǎo ba, yào kāihuì le. Take your seats, please. The meeting is going to begin. 6 [before verbs to denote what is satisfying] good; easy 好吃 hǎochī good to eat—delicious 暖瓶放在這兒好拿。 Nuǎnpíng fàng zài zhèr hǎo ná. It’s handy to have the thermos here. 這本書可不好買。 Zhè běn shū kě bù hǎo mǎi. This book is not easily available. 這個問題好回答。 Zhège wèntí hǎo huídá. This question is easy to answer. 7 [at the beginning of a sentence or clause, to express agreement, disapproval, surprise, etc.] 好, 就這麼辦。 Hǎo, jiù zhème bàn. OK, it’s settled. 好了, 不要再說了。 Hǎo le, bùyào zài shuō le. All right, no need to say any more. 好！ 那得多少錢！ Hǎo! Nà dé duōshao qián! Gosh! How much money will that cost! 好,  這下可麻煩了。 Hǎo, zhè xià kě máfan le. Well, we’re in for trouble now. 
adverb 1 [before adjectives with exclamatory force] very; quite; so 好大的工程！ Hǎo dà de gōngchéng! What a huge project! 你好大膽子。 Nǐ hǎo dà dǎnzi. You are so daring. 2 dialect [before adjectives in the same way as 多] to what extent; how 火車站離這兒好遠？ Huǒchēzhàn lí zhèr hǎo yuǎn？ How far is the railway station from here? 3 [before indefinite time or numbers] quite 好半天 hǎobàntiān quite a while 好幾個 hǎojǐgè quite a few 好幾天 hǎojǐtiān quite a few days 
verb produce favourable effects 這事可好了他了。 Zhè shì kě hǎo le tā le. This will benefit him. 
auxiliary 1 the better to; in order to; so that 把她的地址告訴我, 我好找她。 Bǎ tā de dìzhǐ gàosu wǒ, wǒ hǎo zhǎo tā. Tell me her address so that I can go and see her. 今兒早點睡, 明兒好早起趕火車。 Jīnr zǎodiǎn shuì, míngr hǎo zǎoqǐ gǎn huǒchē. Let’s turn in early, so as to get up early tomorrow to catch the train. 2 dialect may; can; should 我好進來嗎？ Wǒ hǎo jìnlai ma？ May I come in? 時間不早了, 你好走了。 Shíjiān bù zǎo le, nǐhǎo zǒu le. It’s getting late. You ought to get going.

noun 1 name 綽號 chuòhào nickname 2 assumed (or literary) name; sobriquet 蘇軾字子瞻, 號東坡。 Sū Shì zì Zǐ zhān, hào dōng pō. Su Shi, styled Zizhan, was also known by his literary name Dongpo ( "Eastern Slope" ). 吳鎮(元畫家)字仲圭, 號梅花道人。 Wú zhèn (yuán huàjiā) zì zhòng guī, hào méihuā Dàoren. Wu Zhen (a Yuan painter), whose courtesy name was Zhonggui, had the sobriquet "Taoist of the Plum Blossom". 3 dated business house 銀號 yínhào bank 4 mark; sign; signal 問號 wènhào question mark 舉手為號 Jǔshǒu wéi hào raise one’s hand as a signal 5 number 五號樓 Wǔ hào lóu Building No.5 6 size 大號 dàhào large size 中號 zhōnghào medium size 小號 xiǎohào small size 這鞋小了兩號。 Zhè xié xiǎo le liǎng hào. These shoes are two sizes too small. 7 date 今天幾號？——13號。 jīntiān jǐ hào? ——13 hào. What date is today?—The 13th. 8 person in a special condition 病號 bìnghào patient 
verb 1 make a mark on 把你要的東西都號一號。 Bǎ nǐ yào de dōngxi dōu hào yī hào. Have all the items you want marked. 2 Chinese medicine feel (the pulse) See 22452480號脈hao4mai4號脈 
measure word 1 (for people or business deals) 今天有一百多號人出工。 Jīntiān yǒu yībǎi duō hào rén chūgōng. Over a hundred people went to work today. 一會兒工夫就做了幾號買賣。 Yīhuìr gōngfu jiù zuò le jǐ hào mǎimai. Several deals were clinched in a short time. 2 kind; sort 這號人甭理他。 Zhè hào rén béng lǐ tā. Don’t bother with such a person. 這號生意不能做。 Zhè hào shēngyi bù néng zuò. You can’t do this kind of business. 
noun 1 order 發出號令 Fāchū hàolìng give orders 2 any brass-wind instrument 軍號 jūnhào bugle 小號 xiǎohào trumpet 3 anything used as a horn 螺號 luóhào conch 4 bugle call; any call made on a bugle 起床號 qǐchuánghào reveille

number colloquial more than 幾 "several" 1 [in addition to a multiple of ten] and quite a few 她今年已經三十好幾了。 Tā jīnnián yǐjing sānshí hǎojǐ le. She’s well over thirty this year. 2 [before a measure word, a time word, and the numerals 百,千,萬, etc.] quite a few; a good few 我已經去過好幾次了。 Wǒ yǐjing qù guò hǎojǐ cì le. I’ve already been there many times. 咱們好幾年沒見了。 Zánmen hǎojǐ nián méi jiàn le. We haven’t seen each other for quite a few years. 昨天來了好幾百人。 Zuótiān lái le hǎo jǐ bǎi rén. Several hundred people came yesterday.
long time no see

adjective 1 good-looking; nice 你戴那頂帽子很好看。 Nǐ dài nà dǐng màozi hěn hǎokàn. That hat looks nice on you. 這花布做裙子一定很好看。 Zhè huābù zuò qúnzi yīdìng hěn hǎokàn. This piece of cotton print would surely make a very beautiful skirt. 2 interesting 這本小說很好看。 Zhè běn xiǎoshuō hěn hǎokàn. This novel is very interesting. 3 honoured; proud 兒子立了功, 我這做娘的臉上也好看。 Érzi lì le gōng, wǒ zhè zuò niáng de liǎnshàng yě hǎokàn. My son has won distinction; as his mother, I share the honour. 4 embarrassing 等著吧, 有他的好看。 Děngzhe ba, yǒu tā de hǎokàn. You can be sure he’ll soon find himself on the spot. 讓我上臺表演, 這不是要我的好看嗎？ Ràng wǒ shàngtái biǎoyǎn, zhè bù shì yào wǒ de hǎokàn ma？ Me, on the stage? Do you want me to make a fool of myself?

adjective pleasant to hear (opp. 難聽) 好聽的話 Hǎotīng de huà fine words 說得好聽 shuō de hǎotīng sound beautiful 這支歌很好聽。 Zhè zhī gē hěn hǎo tīng. This is a very pleasant song. 他說的比唱的還好聽。 Tā shuō de bǐ chàng de hái hǎotīng. His glib talk sounds as sweet as a song.

verb 1 drink 喝茶 hēchá drink tea 喝湯 hē tāng drink soup 2 drink liquor 喝醉了 hē zuì le get drunk 愛喝兩盅 ài hē liǎng zhōng be fond of drinking

adverb very; very much; quite 很滿意 Hěn mǎnyì feel very satisfied; feel quite pleased 很有道理 hěn yǒu dàoli contain much truth; be quite correct 這幾天熱得很。 Zhè jǐ tiān rè de hěn. This tripod is made of bronze. 4 take advantage of; accomodate oneself to 我們就這個機會談談。 Wǒmen jiù zhège jīhuì tán tán. We’ll take this opportunity to have a talk. 只好就這塊料子做了。 Zhǐhǎo jiù zhè kuài liàozi zuò le. We’ll have to make do with this little piece of fabric. 我反正有空, 就你的時間吧。 Wǒ fǎnzheng yǒu kòng, jiù nǐ de shíjiān ba. He nibbles peanuts with his drink. 
preposition 1 with regard to; concerning; on 就我所知 jiùwǒsuǒzhī as far as I know 雙方就共同關心的問題進行了會談。 Shuāngfāng jiù gòngtóng guānxīn de wèntí jìnxíng le huìtán. The two sides held talks on matters of common interest. 2 [used to form a set phrase with a passive meaning] 就捕 jiù bǔ be arrested 
adverb 1 at once; right away 我就來。 Wǒ jiù lái. I’ll come right away. or I’m on my way. 我這就去。 Wǒ zhè jiù qù. I’ll go right away. 一會兒就得。 Yīhuìr jiù děi. It’ll be ready in a minute. 2 as early as; already 我星期一就給你錢。 Wǒ Xīngqīyī jiù gěi nǐ qián. I’ll pay you on Monday. 今天我七點鐘就來了。 Jīntiān wǒ qī diǎn zhōng jiù lái le. I was here by 7 o’clock today. 3 as soon as; right after 說幹就幹 shuōgànjiùgàn act without delay 我吃了飯就出去了。 Wǒ chī le fàn jiù chūqu le. As soon as I finished eating, I went out. 我一見他就生氣。 Wǒ yī jiàn tā jiù shēngqì. Whenever I see him, I get angry. 他每天下了課就回家。 Tā měitiān xià le kè jiù huíjiā. He comes home every day right after class. 4 in that case; then 要是你來, 我就高興了。 Yào shì nǐ lái, wǒ jiù gāoxìng le. If you come, (then) I’ll be very happy. 不經過艱苦奮鬥, 就不能勝利。 Bù jīngguò jiānkǔfèndòu, jiù bù néng shènglì. All victories are won through arduous struggle. 5 as much as; as many as 光襯衫他就有二十件。 Guāng chènshān tā jiù yǒu èrshí jiàn. He has as many as 20 shirts. 光回收廢品一項, 他們就給公司節約了二十萬元。 guāng huíshōu fèipǐn yī xiàng, tāmenjiù gěi gōngsī jiéyuē le èrshí wàn yuán. Just by collecting scrap, they saved all of 200,000 yuan for the company. 6 [between two identical elements to express resignation] 丟了就丟了吧, 以後小心點。 Diū le jiù diū le ba, yǐhòu xiǎoxīn diǎn. If it’s lost, it’s lost. Just be more careful from now on. 7 to begin with; as expected 我就料到他會等我們的。 Wǒ jiù liàodào tā huì děng wǒmen de. I knew he’d be waiting for us. 我本來就不懂法語。 Wǒ běnlái jiù bù dǒng fǎ yǔ. I never said I knew any French in the first place. 8 only; merely; just 就這一本了, 看完請馬上還。 Jiù zhè yī běn le, kàn wán qǐng mǎ shàng huán. This is the only copy left. Please return it as soon as you finish reading it. 我就要幾張紙。 Wǒ jiùyào jǐ zhāng zhǐ. I just want a few sheets of paper. 我就去過一次上海。 Wǒ jiù qù guò yī cì Shànghǎi. I’ve been to Shanghai only once before. 我們就等你的決定了。 Wǒmen jiù děng nǐ de juédìng le. All we need is your decision. 9 just; simply 我就不信我們婦女幹不了這一行。 Wǒ jiù bù xìn wǒmen fùnǚ gànbuliǎo zhè yīháng. I just don’t believe we women can’t do this job. 不知道為什麼, 我就不喜歡他。 Bùzhīdào wèishénme, wǒ jiù bù xǐhuan tā. I don’t know why I don’t like him. 10 exactly; precisely 醫務室就在這兒。 Yīwùshì jiù zài zhèr. This is where the clinic is. 
conjunction even if 你就生氣也沒用。 Nǐ jiù shēngqì yě méiyòng. Even getting angry won’t help. 你就不說, 我也會知道的。 Nǐ jiù bù shuō, wǒ yě huì zhīdao de. Even if you don’t tell me, I’ll know anyway.

verb 1 come (to); arrive 來得不巧 Láide bùqiǎo come at an unsuitable time (or moment) 來得正好 láide zhènghǎo come in good time; come just at the right time 就來！ jiù lái! I’m coming. 快來！ Kuài lái! Come along! 來客人了。 Lái kèren le. We have a guest. 客人來了。 Kèren lái le. The guests are here. 他今天來過兩次。 Tā jīntiān lái guò liǎng cì. He came twice today. 他已經來了。 Tā yǐjinglái le. He has already come. 她明天來北京。 Tā míngtiān lái Běijīng. She is coming to Beijing tomorrow. 有空來玩。 Yǒukòng lái wán. Come round when you have time. 遠處來了一條小船。 Yuǎnchù lái le yī tiáo xiǎochuán. A small boat came into view in the distance. 2 cause to come; happen; crop up; take place 問題來了。 Wèntí lái le. A problem has come up. 這事兒怎麼來的？ Zhè shìr zěnme lái de？ How did it come about? 3 obtain; get 這差事來得不容易。 Zhè chāishilái de bù róngyì. This job is hard to come by. 4 [as a substitute for some other verb] 來份糖醋魚。 lái fèn tángcùyú. A sweet-and-sour fish, please. 你來塊糖。 Nǐ lái kuài táng. Have some candy. 再來一個！ Zàilái yī ge! [call for another performance] Encore! 慢慢兒來, 別忙。 Mànmànr lái, bié máng. Take it easy. No hurry. 我累了, 你來吧。 Wǒ lèi le, nǐ lái ba. I’m tired. Why don’t you take over (or carry on). 咱們來一盤棋。 Zánmenlái yī pán qí. Let’s have a game of chess. 你歇歇, 讓我來吧。 Nǐ xiēxie, ràng wǒ lái ba. You take a rest. Let me do it. 我自己來吧, 別客氣。 Wǒ zìjǐ lái ba, bié kèqi. Please don’t bother. I’ll do it myself. 我們打籃球, 你來不來？ Wǒmen dǎ lánqiú, nǐ lái bù lái？ We’re going to play basketball. Will you join in? 5 [with 得 or 不, indicating possibility or impossibility, capability or incapability] 上海話我說不來。 Shànghǎi huà wǒ shuō bù lái. I don’t speak Shanghai dialect. 我吃不來四川菜。 Wǒ chī bù lái Sìchuān cài. I can’t get used to Sichuan cuisine. 西餐我吃得來。 Xīcān wǒ chī de lái. Western food suits me all right. 這道題我做不來。 Zhè dào tí wǒ zuò bù lái. I can’t do this problem. 這個歌我唱得來。 Zhège gē wǒ chàng de lái. I can sing this song. 6 [before a verb, indicating an intended or suggested action] 你來試試。 Nǐ lái shìshi. Have a try. 我來說兩句。 Wǒ láishuō liǎng jù. Let me say a few words. 大家來想辦法。 Dàjiā lái xiǎng bànfǎ. Let’s think of a way (to solve the problem). or Let’s put our heads together and see how to do it. 7 [after a verb or verbal expression] come in order to 他回家探親來了。 Tā huíjiā tànqīn lái le. He’s come home to see his parents. 我們道喜來了。 Wǒmen dàoxǐ lái le. We’ve come to congratulate you (or offer our congratulations). 8 [between two verbs or verbal expressions to indicate the purpose of the former] in order to 想辦法來解決問題 Xiǎng bànfǎ lái jiějué wèntí think of a way to solve the problem 你又能用什麼理由來說服他呢？ Nǐ yòu néng yòng shénme lǐyóu lái shuōfú tā ne？ And what arguments can you use to convince him? 9 (of electricity, tap water, gas, etc.) be on again 來電了。 lái diàn le. The power is on again. 來水了。 lái shuǐ le. There’s running water again. 
auxiliary 1 colloquial [at the end of a sentence to indicate what has happened in the past, same as 來著] 你這是何苦來？ Nǐ zhè shì hékǔlái? Why did you do that (and made yourself unhappy)? 2 [after a time expression, indicating a period of time that extends from the past up to the present] ever since 幾天來 jǐ tiān lái for the last few days 一年來 yī nián lái during the past year 3 [after a round number or after a numeral plus a measure] approximately; about; around; round 二十來個 èrshí lái ge about 20 四十來歲 sìshí lái suì round 40 (years old) 十來塊錢 shí lái kuài qián somewhere over 10 yuan 兩米來高 liǎng mǐ lái gāo about two metres high 百十來裡地 bǎishí lái lǐ dì a distance of about 100 li 4 [after the numerals 一, 二, and 三, indicating points in an explanation or argument] 我不要, 一來我不喜歡,  二來我也沒錢。 Wǒ bùyào, yī lái wǒ bù xǐhuan, èr lái wǒ yě méiqián. I don’t want it. In the first place, I don’t like it; in the second place, I don’t have the money. 
adjective future; coming; next 來月 láiyuè coming month 
noun (Lái) a surname 
auxiliary [as a syllable filler in folk ballads] 正月裡來是新春。 Zhēngyuè lǐ lái shì xīnchūn. The first month is the beginning of spring. 你敲鑼來我打鼓。 Nǐ qiāoluó lái wǒ dǎgǔ. You beat the gong while I play the drum.
noun 1 teacher; schoolmaster 2 courteous [in direct address] professor; Mr. (or Mrs., Miss, Ms.) 數學老師 shùxué lǎoshī maths master (or mistress) 老師再見！ lǎoshī zàijiàn Good-bye, Sir (or Madam, Miss)!

auxiliary 1 [after a verb or an adjective to indicate the completion of an action, at a point in the past or before the beginning of another action, or an expected or presumed action] 把書讀了兩遍 bǎ shū dú le liǎng biàn have read the book twice 我下了班就去。 wǒ xià le bān jiù qù. I’ll go right after work. 水位低了兩米。 Shuǐwèi dī le liǎng mǐ. The water level fell by two metres. 2 [at the end of a sentence, usu. after 了 for completed action, to indicate that sth. has taken place] 小說看了一半了。 Xiǎoshuō kàn le yībàn le. I have read half of the novel. 我等了半天了。 Wǒděng le bàntiān le. I’ve been waiting a long time. 3 [at the end of a sentence to indicate a change of situation or state, whether actual or envisaged] 他胖了。 Tā pàng le. He’s put on weight. 下雨了。 Xiàyǔ le. It’s raining. 東西貴了。 Dōngxi guì le. Things have gone up. or Things are expensive now. 樹葉紅了。 Shùyè hóng le. The leaves are turning red. 今天去不成了。 Jīntiān qù bù chéng le. We can’t go today. (Before the situation changed, we had thought we could go.) 你早來一天就見著他了。 Nǐ zǎo lái yī tiān jiù jiàn zhe tā le. If you’d come a day sooner you would have seen him. 我喝了五杯了, 不能再喝了。 Wǒ hē le wǔ bēi le, bùnéng zài hē le. I have drunk five glasses and can’t drink any more. 4 [after an adjective, with or without 太 “too”, to express an excessive degree, i.e. to indicate that sth. has gone to the extreme] 湯鹹了。 Tāng xián le. The soup is too salty. 袖子長了。 Xiùzi cháng le. The sleeves are too long. 這種工作太累了。 Zhèzhǒng gōngzuò tài lèi le. This job is too fatiguing. 他現在太老了, 不能工作了。 Tā xiànzài tài lǎo le, bù néng gōngzuò le. He’s too old to work now. 5 [in commands or requests in response to a changed situation] 吃飯了！ Chīfàn le! Let’s eat now. 別說話了！ Bié shuōhuà le! Stop talking! 走了, 不能再等了！ Zǒu le, bùnéng zài děng le! Let’s go. We can’t wait any longer.

adjective 1 cold; chilly (opp. 熱) 冷極了 lěng jíle be extremely (or bitterly) cold 冷徹骨髓 lěngchègǔsuǐ chilled to the bone 冰冷 bīnglěng ice-cold; freezing cold 冷熱交替。 lěng rè jiāotì. Cold and heat succeed each other. 你冷不冷？ Nǐ lěng bù lěng？ Do you feel cold? 2 cold in manner; frosty; icy 冷冷地點點頭 lěnglěng dìdiǎn diǎntóu nod one’s head coldly; give sb. a cold nod 待人很冷 dàirén hěn lěng be cold towards people; treat others coldly 3 unfrequented; deserted; out-of-the-way See 25547264冷清leng3qing5冷清 4 strange; rare See 25556224冷字leng3zi4冷字 5 receiving little attention; unwelcomed See 25538816冷貨leng3huo4冷貨 6 shot from hiding 打冷拳 dǎ lěng quán hit sb. from behind 7 figurative discouraged; disappointed 學校的新政策讓老師們心冷了半截兒。 xuéxiào de xīn zhèngcè ràng lǎoshī men xīn lěng le bànjiér. The school’s new policy made teachers feel rather disappointed. 
verb 1 dialect (of food) cool 太燙了, 冷一下再吃。 Tài tàng le, lěng yīxià zài chī. It’s too hot. Let it cool off before you eat it. 2 dishearten; discourage; disappoint; dampen 事情冷下來了。 shìqinglěng xiàlai le. The matter has cooled off. 她對我的熱情冷了下來。 Tā duì wǒ de rèqíng lěng le xiàlai. Her passion for me has cooled off. 3 ignore 冷他一陣子 lěng tā yīzhènzi ignore him for a while

verb 1 leave; part from 離京赴穗 lí jīng fù suì leave Beijing for Guangzhou 遠離家鄉 yuǎnlí jiāxiāng go far away from home 農民離土不離鄉, 發展鄉鎮企業。 nóngmín lí tǔ bù lí xiāng, fāzhǎn xiāng-zhèn qǐyè. number 1 [number or figure 〇] nought; zero; nil 零比零 Líng bǐ líng no score; love all 零的突破 líng de tūpò grow out of nothing 零點零一 líng diǎn líng yī 0.01 (point nought one) 二比零 èr bǐ líng two to nil; two to nothing 從零開始 cóng líng kāishǐ start from scratch 一減一等於零。 Yī jiǎn yī děngyú líng. The horse has a fine coat of hair. 2 (of humans) hair; beard 眉毛 méimáo eyebrows 3 plant; crop 不毛之地 bùmáozhīdì barren land 4 wool 毛襪 máowà woollen stocks 這件夾克衫是棉的還是毛的？ Zhè jiàn jiákè shān shì mián de hái shì máo de？ Is this jacket cotton or woollen? 5 mildew; mould 長了毛的麵包 Zhǎng le máo de miànbāo mouldy bread 6 (Máo) a surname 
adjective 1 rough; semi-finished See 26568448毛坯mao2pi1毛坯 2 gross See 26566400毛利mao2li4毛利 3 little; small 毛賊 máozéi petty thief; pilferer 4 thin See 26569472毛渠mao2qu2毛渠 
adjective 1 careless; crude; rash 毛頭毛腦 máotóumáonǎo rash; impetuous 2 panic; scared; nervous 發毛 fāmáo flustered 嚇毛了 xiàmáole scared 3 dialect get angry; lose one's temper 把他惹毛了 bǎ tā rě máo le made him angry

measure word colloquial mao (a fractional unit of money in China, equal to 1/10 yuan or 10 fen) 一毛錢 Yī máo qián one mao 這支筆幾毛錢？——四毛。 Zhè zhī bǐ jǐ máo qián？ —— sì máo. How much is this pen?—Four mao.

adverb 1 at once; immediately; straight away; right away 馬上集合！ Mǎshàng jíhé! Fall in immediately! 你馬上就走嗎？ Nǐ mǎshàng jiù zǒu ma？ Are you leaving right away? 我馬上就回來。 Wǒ mǎshàng jiù huílai. I won’t be a minute. or I’ll be back in a minute. 我們馬上動手。 Wǒmen mǎshàng dòngshǒu. We’ll start working straight away. 演出馬上就要開始了。 Yǎnchū mǎshàng jiùyào kāishǐ le. The performance is about to begin. 2 in the near future; soon 馬上就要高考了。 Mǎshàng jiùyào gāokǎo le. The college entrance examinations are coming up soon.

verb colloquial 1 not have 沒病 méi bìng in good health; not bad 沒朋友 méi péngyou have no friends 2 there is not; be without 用沒了。 Yòng méi le. It’s all used up. 票賣沒了。 Piào mài méi le. The tickets are all sold out. 這兒沒人。 Zhèr méi rén. There’s nobody here. 鋼筆沒水了。 gāngbǐ méi shuǐ le. The pen has run dry. 3 be not as ... as 我沒你高。 Wǒ méi nǐ gāo. I’m not so tall as you. 誰都沒他會說話。 Shuí dōu méi tā huì shuōhuà. No one is more eloquent than him. 4 less than; not more than 他去了沒多大工夫。 Tā qù le méi duō dà gōngfu. He wasn’t gone for long. 
adverb colloquial have not; did not 你買了嗎？——沒買。 Nǐ mǎi le ma？ —— méi mǎi. Did you buy it? — No, I didn’t. 銀行昨天沒開門。 Yínháng zuótiān méi kāimén. The bank was closed yesterday.

adjective 1 beautiful; pretty (opp. 醜) 風景多美啊！ Fēngjǐng duō měi a! What beautiful scenery! 她長得很美。 Tā zhǎng de hěn měi. She’s very pretty. 2 very satisfactory; good; pleasing See 66674147美酒mei3jiu3美酒 
noun 1 abbreviation American continent 南美 Nán Měi South America 2 abbreviation America; the United States of America; the US 美鈔 Měichāo US banknote; United States notes; greenback

pronoun every; each; per 每次 měicì each time 每小時 měi xiǎoshí per hour 每星期五 měi xīngqī wǔ every Friday 每兩周開一次會 měi liǎng zhōu kāi yī cì huì hold a meeting every other week 每人一張票 měirén yī zhāng piào a ticket for each person 每四小時服一次 měi sì xiǎoshí fú yī cì to be taken once every four hours 
adverb 1 on each occasion; each time; per 每逢春節, 我都要去看老師。 Měiféng Chūnjié, wǒ dōu yào qù kàn lǎoshī. I always go to see my teachers during the Spring Festival. 2 literary often 春秋佳日, 每作郊遊。 Chūnqiū jiā rì, měi zuò jiāoyóu. On fine spring and autumn days, we often go for outings in the country.

no problem

noun 1 (of a building, vehicle or vessel) entrance 請走南門。 Qǐng zǒu nánmén. Please use the south entrance. 2 door; gate; entrance 校門 xiàomén school gate 3 any opening 櫃門兒 guì ménr cabinet door 爐門兒 lúménr stove door 4 valve; switch 電門 diànmén power switch 氣門 qìmén gas valve 5 orifice in the human body 肛門 gāngmén anus 6 way to do sth.; knack; method; access 對使用計算機已經摸著門兒 duì shǐyòng jìsuànjī yǐjing mō zhe mén r have learned how to use a computer 7 branch of a family or clan; family 豪門 háomén prominent family 8 (religious) sect; school (of thought) 佛門 Fómén Buddhism 9 study with the same teacher 同門 tóngmén fellow disciple 10 position in a gambling game (relative to where one sits or where one lays a stake) 11 class; category; branch of study 門門精通 ménmén jīngtōng proficient in everything 分門別類 fēnménbiélèi categorize 12 biology phylum 亞門 yàmén subphylum 脊椎動物門 jǐzhuī dòngwù mén Vertebrata 13 computing gate “非”門 “fēi”mén NOT gate “與”門 “yǔ”mén AND gate 14 (Mén) a surname 
measure word 1 [for subjects of study or field of technical training] 兩門功課 liǎng mén gōngkè two subjects; two courses 這門學問 zhè mén xuéwen this area of study 2 [for language] 兩門外語 liǎng mén wàiyǔ two foreign languages 3 [for cannon] 一門大炮 yī mén dàpào one piece of artillery; one cannon; one gun 4 [for marriage] 一門親事 yī mén qīnshì a marriage 5 [for relatives] 一門親戚 Yī mén qīnqi a set of relatives

noun 1 face 面帶笑容 miàndài xiàoróng with a smile on one’s face 面無懼色 miàn wú jùsè look dauntless; fearless look 2 surface; top; face 鐘面 zhōngmiàn clock face; dial 面兒磨得很光。 Miànr mó de hěn guāng. The surface has been polished shiny bright. 3 side 這種紙一面光。 Zhèzhǒng zhǐ yī miàn guāng. This kind of paper is smooth on one side. 這本書有多少面？ Zhè běn shū yǒu duōshao miàn？ How many pages are there in this book? 4 right side; cover; outside 書面兒 shūmiànr cover of a book 夾襖的面兒 jiá'ǎo de miànr outer shell of a lined jacket 這塊布做裡兒, 那塊布做面兒。 Zhè kuài bù zuò lǐr, nà kuài bù zuò miànr. Use this piece of cloth for the lining and that piece for the outside. 5 mathematics surface 立方體有六個面。 Lìfāngtǐ yǒu liù ge miàn. A cube has six surfaces. 6 overall; entire area (as opposed to individual points) 部長下去蹲點兒了, 面上的工作他讓我來抓。 Bùzhǎng xiàqu dūndiǎnr le, miàn shàng de gōngzuò tā ràng wǒ lái zhuā. The minister has gone to spend time in a grass-roots unit and left me in charge of overall business. 7 extent; range; scale; scope 知識面廣 Zhīshi miàn guǎng have a wide range of knowledge 知識面窄 Zhīshimiàn zhǎi have a narrow range of knowledge 這次討論涉及的面很廣。 Zhè cì tǎolùn shèjí de miàn hěn guǎng. The discussion covered a wide range of topics. 8 face; feelings 看在我的面上, 饒了他這一回吧。 Kàn zài wǒ de miàn shàng, ráo le tā zhè yī huí ba. Please let him off this time for my sake. 
verb 1 meet; come out See 66915299面市mian4shi4面市 2 face (a certain direction) 這房子面南坐北。 Zhè fángzi miàn nán zuò běi. The house faces south. 
measure word 1 [for flat things] 一面鏡子 yī miàn jìngzi a mirror 兩面旗子 liǎng miàn qízi two flags 2 [for the number of times people meet each other] 我們只見過一面。 wǒmen zhǐjiàn guò yī miàn. We have only met once. 
affix [suffix for location or direction] 前面 qiánmiàn in front; at the head; ahead 外面 wàimiàn outside; out 
adverb directly; face-to-face 面告 miàngào tell sb. personally
noun 1 tomorrow 2 near future 光輝燦爛的明天 Guānghuīcànlàn de míngtiān bright future

noun next year

noun 1 mother 母女 mǔ-nǚ mother and daughter 老母 lǎomǔ one’s old mother 2 one's female elders 伯母 bómǔ aunt; wife of father’s elder brother 祖母 zǔmǔ (paternal) grandmother 3 female (animal) (opp. 公) 母狼 mǔláng she-wolf 母象 mǔxiàng female elephant 你的狗是公的還是母的？ Nǐ de gǒu shì gōng de háishi mǔ de？ Is your dog male or female? 4 nut (so called because of the female screw thread) 螺母 luómǔ (screw) nut 5 origin; parent 母結構 mǔ jiégòu parent structure
noun mother 母親河 mǔqinhé mother river

pronoun 1 [in questions] which; what 你學的是哪國語言？ Nǐ xué de shì nǎ guó yǔyán？ What foreign language are you studying? 我們這裡有兩位姓張的, 您要找的是哪一位？ Wǒmen zhèlǐ yǒu liǎng wèi xìng zhāng de, nín yào zhǎo de shì nǎ yī wèi？ We’ve got two Zhangs here. Which one do you want? 2 [in statements to indicate sth. indefinite] whichever; any that 哪天有空就請過來。 Nǎ tiān yǒukòng jiù qǐng guòlai. Come over whenever you are free. 你喜歡哪件就拿哪件。 Nǐ xǐhuannǎ jiàn jiù ná nǎ jiàn. Take whichever you prefer. 
adverb [in rhetorical questions to express negation] 哪有這樣的事？ Nǎ yǒu zhèyàng de shì？ Nothing of the sort (or kind)! 沒有昨天的流血犧牲, 哪有今天的幸福生活？ Méiyǒu zuótiān de liúxuè xīshēng, nǎ yǒu jīntiān de xìngfú shēnghuó? Without past sacrifices how could we have such a happy life today?

pronoun 1 where 你哪裡不舒服？ Nǐ nǎli bù shūfu？ What is bothering you? or Where do you feel pain? 你到哪裡去？ Nǐ dào nǎli qù？ Where are you going? 你是哪裡人？ Nǐ shì nǎli rén？ Where are you from? 2 wherever; where 哪裡最艱苦就在哪裡幹 nǎli zuì jiānkǔ jiù zài nǎli gàn go where is hardest 哪裡有壓迫, 哪裡就有反抗。 Nǎli yǒu yāpò, nǎli jiù yǒu fǎnkàng. Where there is oppression, there is resistance. 3 [in rhetorical questions to express negation] 我哪裡知道他會改變主意的？ Wǒ nǎli zhīdao tā huì gǎibiàn zhǔyi de？ How was I to know he should change his mind? 4 polite expression [a polite reply to a compliment] 你的英語說得真好。——哪裡, 哪裡。 Nǐ de Yīngyǔ shuō de zhēn hǎo. —— Nǎli, nǎli. You speak very good English. — I’m flattered. 你對我們幫助很大。——哪裡, 哪裡。 Nǐ duì wǒmen bāngzhù hěn dà. —— Nǎli, nǎli. You helped us a lot. — It was nothing.

adjective 1 difficult; hard; troublesome (opp. 易) 很難想象 Hěn nán xiǎngxiàng (it’s) hard to imagine 山路難走。 Shānlù nán zǒu. Mountain paths are hard to travel. 說起來容易做起來難。 Shuō qǐlai róngyì zuò qǐlai nán. Easier said than done. 這道題很難解。 zhè dào tí hěn nán jiě. This problem is hard to solve. 2 hardly possible; unavoidable See 27188992難免nan2mian3難免 3 bad; unpleasant 這種啤酒真難喝。 zhèzhǒng píjiǔ zhēn nán hē. This beer tastes really bad. 
verb put sb. into a difficult position 這問題一下子把我難住了。 Zhè wèntí yīxiàzi bǎ wǒ nán zhù le. The question put me on the spot.

auxiliary 1 [at the end of a special, alternative, or rhetorical question] 你剛纔到哪兒去了呢？ Nǐ gāngcái dào nǎr qù le ne？ Where were you just now? 你到底認不認得她呢？ Nǐ dào dǐ rèn bù rèn de tā ne？ Do you know her or not? 你對這件事是贊成呢, 還是反對呢？ Nǐ duì zhè jiàn shì shì zànchéng ne, hái shì fǎnduì ne？ Are you for or against this? 他們都有任務了, 我呢？ Tāmen dōu yǒu rènwu le, wǒ ne? They’ve got assignments, what about me? 我錯在哪兒呢？ Wǒ cuò zài nǎr ne？ What is my mistake? 我怎麼能不記得呢？ Wǒ zěnme néng bù jìde ne？ How could I forget this? 這點子事, 何必大驚小怪呢？ Zhè diǎnzi shì, hébì dàjīngxiǎoguài ne？ Why get so excited over such a little thing? 2 [at the end of a declarative sentence to reinforce the assertion] 遠得很, 有好幾千里地呢。 Yuǎn de hěn, yǒu hǎo jǐqiān lǐ dì ne. It’s a long way off—thousands of li away. 3 [at the end of a declarative sentence to indicate the continuation of an action or a state] 他還在生氣呢。 Tā hái zài shēngqì ne. He’s still angry. 張先生, 有人找你呢。 Zhāng xiānsheng, yǒurén zhǎo nǐ ne. Mr Zhang, somebody is looking for you. 4 [used to mark a pause] 不下雨呢, 就去;下雨呢, 就不去。 Bù xià yǔ ne,  jiù qù ； xiàyǔ ne, jiù bù qù. If it doesn’t rain, we’ll go; if it does, we won’t. 如今呢, 可比以往任何時候都要強。 Rújīn ne, kě bǐ yǐwǎng rènhé shíhou dōu yào qiáng. As for the present, things are far better than at any time in the past.
1 over there 2 yonder

pronoun those 那些蘋果 nàxiē píngguǒ those apples 那些高樓是最近幾年蓋的。 nàxiē gāolóu shì zuìjìn jǐ nián gài de. Those skyscrapers were built in recent years. 奶奶愛把那些事兒講給孩子們聽。 Nǎinai ài bǎ nàxiē shìr jiǎng gěi háizi men tīng. Grandma liked talking about the past to the kids.

noun 1 ability; capability; skill 技能 jìnéng technical skill 無能 wúnéng incompetent 2 physics energy 波能 bō néng wave energy 風能 fēngnéng wind energy 
verb 1 can do; be able to; be capable of 他好多了, 能下床了。 Tā hǎo duō le, néng xià chuáng le. He’s much better and can get up now. 她一分鐘能打七十個字。 Tā yī fēnzhōng néng dǎ qīshí ge zì. She can type 70 words a minute. 我幹這個工作能行嗎？ Wǒ gàn zhège gōngzuò néng xíng ma？ Am I really fit for the job? 2 possibly 天這麼晚了, 他能來嗎？ Tiān zhème wǎn le, tā néng lái ma？ It’s already very late. Can he possibly come tonight? 這件事她能一點兒也不知道嗎？ Zhè jiàn shì tā néng yīdiǎnr yě bùzhīdào ma? How could she know nothing of this? or Could she be completely in the dark? 3 [between 不…不 to express obligation, certainty or great probability] 不能不 bùnéngbù must; have to; cannot but 4 may; can; have the permission to 這兒能停車嗎？——能停(不能停)。 Zhèrnéng tíngchē ma? ——néng tíng. Can we park here?—Yes, you can. (No. Parking is forbidden here.) 
adjective able; capable 她可能呢, 穿的衣服都是自己做的。 Tā kěnéng ne, chuān de yīfu dōu shì zìjǐ zuò de. She’s very clever with her hands and makes all her own clothes.

pronoun 1 you [second person singular] 你爸 nǐ bà your Dad 你帶了多少錢？ Nǐ dài le duōshao qián？ How much money do you have on you? 2 you [second person plural] 你方 nǐ fāng your side; you 你校 nǐ xiào your school 3 [referring to any person] you; one; anyone 碰到這麼一個人, 你有什麼辦法？ Pèngdào zhème yī ge rén, nǐ yǒu shénme bànfǎ？ What can you do with a person like that? 4 [with 我 or 他 in parallel structures to indicate several or many people behaving the same way] 三個人你看看我, 我看看你, 誰也不說話。 Sān ge rén nǐ kànkan wǒ,  wǒ kàn kàn nǐ, shuí yě bù shuōhuà. The three of them kept looking at each other without saying a word. 你一言, 我一語, 大家談得很熱鬧。 Nǐ yī yán,  wǒ yī yǔ, dàjiā tán de hěn rènao. A lively conversation ensued with everybody joining in.

noun 1 year 年復一年 niánfùyīnián year after year; year in year out 三年 Sān nián three years 2 annual; yearly See 67485923年產量nian2chan3liang4年產量 3 age 年過六十 nián guò liùshí over sixty (years old) 4 period in one's life 老年 lǎonián old age 童年 tóngnián childhood 5 period in history 近年來 jìnniánlái in recent years 明朝初年 míngzhāo chū nián at the beginning of the Ming Dynasty 6 harvest 豐年 fēngnián rich harvest 7 New Year 過年 guònián celebrate the New Year 8 of or for the New Year See 27329792年貨nian2huo4年貨 9 archaic relationship between candidates who passed the same imperial examinations See 67505635年兄nian2xiong1年兄;67506403年誼nian2yi4 年誼 10 (Nián) a surname

noun 1 thought; idea 雜念 zániàn distracting thoughts 百念俱灰 Bǎi niàn jù huī feel hopeless at all 2 (Niàn) a surname 
verb 1 think of; miss 我們老念著你。 Wǒmen lǎo niàn zhe nǐ. We miss you very much. 2 consider; take into account 念他是個病人, 不跟他計較。 niàn tā shì ge bìngrén, bù gēn tā jìjiào. Since he’s sick, I won’t blame him for what he has done. 
verb 1 read aloud 她把賀電念給大家聽。 Tā bǎ hèdiàn niàn gěi dàjiā tīng. She read out the congratulatory message. 2 attend school 他念過中學。 Tā niàn guò zhōngxué. He has been to middle school. 
number twenty [used for the numeral 廿 on cheques, etc. to avoid mistakes or alterations]
verb 1 read 2 study; attend school 他在北大念書。 Tā zài Běi Dà niànshū. He studies at Beijing University.

pronoun 1 you [second person plural] 你們幹護士工作的真是夠辛苦的。 nǐmen gàn hùshi gōngzuò de zhēnshì gòu xīnkǔ de. You nurses are really working very hard. 這就是你們的責任所在。 Zhè jiùshì nǐmen de zérèn suǒzài. This is where your responsibility lies. 2 colloquial [in the same way as 你 1 2] 你們奶奶多大歲數了？ Nǐmen nǎinai duō dà suìshu le？ How old is your grandmother? 你們組最近情況怎麼樣？ Nǐmen zǔ zuìjìn qíngkuàng zěnmeyàng？ How is your group getting along these days?

verb 1 sit 請坐。 Qǐngzuò. Please sit down. 請進來坐坐。 Qǐng jìnlai zuò zuò. Please come in and sit for a while. 他忽然坐起來了。 Tā hūrán zuò qǐlai le. He sat up suddenly. 我願意站著, 你坐下吧。 Wǒ yuànyi zhànzhe, nǐ zuòxia ba. I’ll love to stand, you sit. 2 travel by or on (any conveyance except those which are straddled) 坐火車去 zuò huǒchē qù go by train 坐公共汽車 zuò gōnggòng qìchē ride on a bus 坐電梯上去 zuò diàntī shàng qù go up by lift; take the elevator 3 (of a building) have its back towards 這所房子坐北朝南。 Zhè suǒ fángzi zuò běi cháo nán. This house faces south. 4 put (a pan, pot, kettle, etc.) on a fire 把壺坐上 Bǎ hú zuò shàng put the kettle on (the fire) 5 (of a building) sink; subside 這個房子向后坐了。 Zhège fángzi xiàng hòu zuò le. This house is beginning to lean backwards. 6 (of rifles, guns, etc.) recoil; kick back See 37131008坐力zuo4li4坐力 7 bear (fruit) See 37127168坐果zuo4guo3坐果 8 be punished See 20743680反坐fan3zuo4反坐 9 contract (or have) a disease; suffer from a disease 年輕時坐下了腿寒的毛病 niánqīng shí zuòxià le tuǐ hán de máobing got one’s cold legs during one’s youth

verb 1 go; go to (a place) 我去。 Wǒ qù. I’ll go. 他已經去了。 Tā yǐjing qù le. He has already gone. 我要去南京了。 Wǒ yào qù Nánjīng le. I’m going to Nanjing. 我想去南京一趟。 Wǒ xiǎng qù Nánjīng yī tàng. I think I’ll take a trip to Nanjing. 我要去車站接人。 Wǒ yào qù chēzhàn jiē rén. I’m going to the station to meet someone. 他去了三天, 還沒回來。 Tā qù le sān tiān, hái méi huílai. He’s been away for three days, and hasn’t come back yet. 昨天已經去了三個人。 Zuótiān yǐjing qù le sān ge rén. Three people went there yesterday. 我去了好幾趟, 都沒碰到他。 Wǒ qù le hǎojǐ tàng, dōu méi pèngdào tā. I went there several times, but never saw him. 2 cause to go; send there 給她去個電話。 Gěi tā qù ge diànhuà. Give her a call. 我給他去過兩封信。 Wǒ gěi tā qù guò liǎng fēng xìn. I sent him two letters. 我們只去了個代表。 Wǒmen zhǐ qù le ge dàibiǎo. We only sent a representative. 已經去了一個電報。 Yǐjing qù le yī ge diànbào. A telegram has been sent (to him). 3 remove; get rid of 去頭屑 Qù tóu xiè get rid of dandruff 去殖民化 qù zhímínhuà decolonize 去了皮再吃。 Qù le pí zài chī. Peel it before you eat it. 汽油能去油跡。 Qìyóu néng qù yóujì. Gas is good for taking out oil stains. 裙子太長了, 去兩公分吧。 qúnzi tài cháng le, qù liǎng gōngfēn ba. The skirt is too long—shorten it by two centimetres. 這句話去幾個字就簡潔了。 Zhè jù huà qù jǐ ge zì jiù jiǎnjié le. Take out one or two words and the sentence will be more concise. 4 [before and / or after a verb] go in order to; be going to (do sth. there) 咱們去看電影。(= 咱們看電影去。= 咱們去看電影去。) Zánmen qù kàn diànyǐng. (or) zánmen kàn diànyǐng qù. (or) zánmen qù kàn diànyǐng qù. Let’s go to see a movie. 這件事我去辦吧。 Zhè jiàn shì wǒ qù bàn ba Let me (go and) arrange this. 你去打水, 我來生爐子。 Nǐ qù dǎ shuǐ, wǒ lái shēng lúzi. You get some water and I’ll light the stove. 你別管, 讓他自己去想辦法。 Nǐ bié guǎn, ràng tā zìjǐ qù xiǎng bànfǎ. Don’t bother, let him figure it out for himself. 你們去研究研究, 看該怎麼辦。 Nǐmen qù yánjiū yánjiū, kàn gāi zěnme bàn. Go and make a study of it, and see what’s the best thing to do. 5 [between two verbal expressions, and / or after the second expression] in order to (do sth. there) 用科學的觀點去觀察事物 Yòng kēxué de guāndiǎn qù guānchá shìwù look at things from a scientific point of view 他回家吃飯去了。 Tā huíjiā chī fàn qù le. He went home to eat. 她上街去買東西了。(= 她上街買東西去了。= 她上街去買東西去了。) Tā shàngjiē qù mǎi dōngxi le. (or) tā shàngjiē mǎi dōngxi qù le. (or) tā shàngjiē qù mǎi dōngxi qù le. She went to the market to do some shopping. 他提了一桶水去澆花。 Tā tí le yī tǒng shuǐ qù jiāo huā. He took a bucket of water to water the flowers. 6 literary be apart from in space or time 去今五十年 Qù jīn wǔshí nián 50 years ago 兩地相去四十裡。 Liǎng de xiāng qù sìshí lǐ. The two places are 40 li apart. 7 literary depart from; leave See 28802304去國qu4guo2去國 8 euphemistic pass away; die 老太太昨夜去了。 lǎotàitai zuóyè qù le. The old lady died last night. 
noun abbreviation VARIANT OF 28804096去聲qu4sheng1去聲 1 falling tone (third of the four tones in classical Chinese pronunciation) 2 falling tone (fourth of the four tones in modern standard Chinese pronunciation) 
adjective just gone (or elapsed) 去秋 qù qiū last autumn 去冬今春 qùdōng jīnchūn last winter and this spring 
adverb dialect [with 了 as an intensive complement to certain adjectives with了] very; extremely 他家遠了去了。 Tā jiā yuǎn le qù le. His home is far far away. 那片林子可大了去了。 Nà piàn línzi kě dà le qù le. That’s a really huge forest. 他到過的地方多了去了。 Tā dào guò de dìfang duō le qù le. He’s been to a great many places. 
verb play (a part or character) 他在京劇《鬧天宮》裡去猴王。 Tā zài Jīngjù 《Nào Tiāngōng》 lǐ qù hóuwáng. He played the Monkey King in the Beijing opera Trouble in Heaven.

noun 1 heat 摩擦產生熱。 Mócā chǎnshēng rè. Friction produces heat. 2 steam or water heat 供熱 gōngrè heating 3 fever; temperature 這孩子有點兒熱(= 在發熱)。 Zhè háizi yǒudiǎnrrè. The child is running a fever. 4 craze; fad 旅遊熱 lǚyóu rè tourism craze; intense popular interest in tourism
