During the dogdays it’s very hot. 2 ardent; warmhearted; enthusiastic; intimate 熱話 rè huà affectionate words 3 in great demand; popular See 69312227熱貨re4huo4熱貨 4 envious; eager 熱念 rèniàn intense desire 5 noisy See 28950784熱鬧re4nao5熱鬧 6 thermal; thermo- See 28942848熱核re4he2熱核

noun 1 human being; person; people 活人 huórén living person 人對自然界的認識 Rén duì zìránjiè de rènshi man’s knowledge of nature 團結得像一個人 tuánjié de xiàng yī ge rén (of many people) be united as one 來人了。 lái rén le. Someone has come. or There come some people. 他家有幾口人？ Tā jiā yǒu jǐ kǒu rén？ How many people are there in his family? 屋裡有人嗎？ Wū lǐ yǒurén ma？ Is there anyone inside? 2 adult human being 長大成人 zhǎngdà chéngrén grow up into an adult; be grown to manhood 3 other people; other(s) 他待人誠懇。 Tā dàirén chéngkěn. He’s sincere in his dealings with people. 這個座位有人嗎？ Zhè ge zuòwèi yǒurén ma？ Is this seat occupied? 自己做錯了事, 不應該怪人。 Zìjǐ zuò cuò liǎoshì, bù yīnggāi guàirén. When one has done something wrong one should not blame it on others. 4 [used rhetorically in place of the first personal pronoun, often expressing displeasure] 別小看人！ Bié xiǎokàn rén! Don’t look down on me! 真叫人著急。 Zhēn jiào rén zháojí. It really worries me. 5 person considered as a worker or employee; hand; manpower 人來了嗎？ rén lái le ma? Have they come? 我們這裡正缺人。 Wǒmen zhèlǐ zhèng quē rén. We are short-handed at the moment. 6 physical, psychological, or moral quality or condition of a given individual; personality 他人很好。 Tā rén hěn hǎo. He’s a very nice man. 這兩天我人不太舒服。 Zhè liǎng tiān wǒ rén bù tài shūfu. I haven’t been feeling very well lately. 他人在那兒, 心卻想著別的事。 Tā rén zài nàr, xīn què xiǎngzhe bié de shì. He was there all right, but his mind was elsewhere. 7 everybody; each 人各有所喜。 rén gè yǒusuǒ xǐ. Everyone has his liking. 8 [as a suffix] person of certain places, jobs or properties; person engaging in certain activity 四川人 Sìchuān rén native of Sichuan 文化人 wénhuàrén man of letters; intellectual 音樂人 yīnyuèrén musician; person engaging in music 他是你什麼人？ Tā shì nǐ shénmerén? What is your relation with him? 9 real person; true man; man of integrity 是人就得說人話。 Shì rén jiùděi shuō rén huà. A real man should talk like a real man. 這是人做的事嗎？ Zhè shì rén zuò de shì ma? Can this be the behaviour of a true man?
Japan

adjective 1 easy 好(不)容易 hǎobùróngyì not at all easy; in a hard way 容易的題先做。 Róngyì de tí xiān zuò. Do the easy problems first. 說起來容易做起來難。 Shuō qǐlai róngyì zuò qǐlai nán. It’s easier said than done. 2 likely; liable; apt 他容易生病。 Tā róngyì shēngbìng. He often gets ill. 這容易引起誤會。 Zhè róngyì yǐnqǐ wùhuì. This is liable to cause misunderstanding. 人們容易把這兩個問題混淆起來。 Rénmen róngyì bǎ zhè liǎng ge wèntí hùnxiáo qǐlai. People are apt to confuse the two issues.

number 1 three 三原色 sānyuánsè three primary colours 三支筆 sān zhī bǐ three pens 三棲明星 sānqī míngxīng star engaged in three fields of performing arts, i.e. singing, television, and film 三年制高中 sān nián zhì gāozhōng three-year senior high school 一加二等於三。 yī jiā èr děngyú sān. One and two is three. 2 more than two; several; many 三彎九轉 sānwānjiǔzhuàn (full of) twists and turns 3 few; less; not many 你騙不了我。我可不是三歲的孩子。 Nǐ piàn bùliǎo wǒ. Wǒ kěbushì sān suì de háizi. You can’t fool me. I wasn’t born yesterday. 4 the third 三樓 sān lóu the second floor (UK); the third floor (US) 三等獎 sān děng jiǎng third prize 
meaningful bound form tri- 三胺 sān àn triamine 三核 sān hé trinucleus 三磺 sān huáng trisulphon 三氨基 sān ānjī triamino 三氯苯 sān lǜ běn trichlorobenzene

noun 1 [used alone, esp. in contrast to 下] 上不封頂 shàngbùfēngdǐng impose no ceiling 上至國家主席, 下至普通百姓 shàng zhì guójiā zhǔxí, xià zhì pǔtōng bǎixìng from the state president down to the common people 這個詞是舊時下對上的稱呼。 Zhège cí shì jiù shíxià duì shàng de chēnghu. This word was used in the old days to address one’s superiors. 2 [after a preposition] 往上看 Wǎng shàng kàn look up (at sth.) 向上拉 xiàng shàng lā pull it up 這頭朝上 zhè tóu cháo shàng this side up 向上反映情況 xiàng shàng fǎnyìng qíngkuàng report the situation to the higher-ups 
adjective 1 upper; higher; better; superior 上臂 shàngbì upper arm 上半截 shàngbànjié upper half 在書架的最上一層 zài shūjià de zuì shàng yī céng on the top shelf 中上水平 zhōng shàng shuǐpíng above the average; better than the average 報上一級黨委 bào shàng yījí dǎngwěi report to the Party committee immediately above 2 most recent; last; former 上次 shàngcì last time 上兩批 shàng liǎng pī the last two groups 上星期四 shàng Xīngqīsì last Thursday 上一季度 shàng yī jìdù the previous quarter 3 first (of sth. divided into two or three parts) 上集 shàngjí Volume I; Part I 上一段 shàng yī duàn the preceding (or above, foregoing) paragraph 上半學期 Shàng bàn xuéqī the first half of the term 二十世紀上半葉 èrshí shìjì shàngbàn yè the first half of the 20th century 這部詞典分上, 中, 下三冊。 zhè bù cídiǎn fēn shàng, zhōng, xià sān cè. This dictionary is in three volumes, first, second, and third. 4 dated [referring to the emperor] See 29625344上諭shang4yu4上諭 
verb 1 come (or go) up; ascend 上岸 shàng'àn go ashore 上樓 shànglóu go (or come) upstairs; ascend the stairs 上山 shàngshān go (or climb) up a mountain 上一個臺階 shàng yī ge táijiē reach a higher level 溯流而上 sùliú'érshàng sail (or go) upstream 2 get on (a conveyance); mount; board 上船 shàngchuán go aboard a ship; go on board 上飛機 shàng fēijī board a plane 上公共汽車 shàng gōnggòng qìchē get on a bus 3 go to; leave for 上廁所 shàng cèsuǒ go to toilet 你上哪兒？ Nǐ shàng nǎr？ Where are you going? 我明天上南京。 Wǒ míngtiān shàng Nánjīng. I’m leaving for Nanjing tomorrow. 4 be engaged (in work, study, etc.) at a fixed time 上機 shàngjī use the computer 上哨 shàngshào go on sentry 我今天上中班。 Wǒ jīntiān shàng zhōngbān. I’m on the middle shift today. 她上大學了。 Tā shàng dàxué le. She’s now in college. 明天的語文課還上不上？ Míngtiān de yǔwénkè hái shàng bù shàng？ Shall we have our Chinese lessons tomorrow or not? 5 advance; forge ahead; go ahead 見困難就上 Jiàn kùnnan jiù shàng advance where there are difficulties to overcome 快上, 投籃！ Kuài shàng, tóulán! Go ahead. Quick! Shoot! 6 improve; increase 上品種 shàng pǐnzhǒng increase the variety of products 上質量 shàng zhìliàng improve the quality of products 7 sports enter the court (or field) 換人！ 三號下, 四號上。 Huàn rén! Sān hào xià, sì hào shàng. Substitution: Player No. 4 for No. 3. 這一盤你上。 Zhè yī pán nǐ shàng. You play this game. 8 fill; supply; serve 請給我們上點兒茶。 Qǐng gěi wǒmenshàng diǎnr chá. Will you please serve us with some tea? 9 place sth. in position; fix 上刀具 Shàng dāojù fix a cutting tool 我正在上螺絲呢。 Wǒ zhèng zài shàng luósī ne. I’m fixing the screws in place. 10 apply; paint; smear 上藥膏 Shàng yàogāo apply ointment 給門窗上漆 gěi mén-chuāng shàng qī paint the door and windows 給機器上油 gěi jīqì shàng yóu oil (or grease) the machine 11 apply for 上牌照 shàngpáizhào apply for a license 12 be put on record; be carried (in a publication) 上《吉尼斯世界紀錄大全》 shàng «jí ní sī shìjiè jìlù dàquán» get into the Guinness Book of Records 小王的先進事跡上了電視。 xiǎo wáng de xiānjìnshìjì shàng le diànshì. Xiao Wang’s model deeds have been reported on TV. 13 wind; screw; tighten 錶該上了。螺絲沒有上緊。 Biǎo gāi shàng le. Luósī méiyǒu shàng jǐn. The watch needs winding. 螺絲沒有上緊。 Luósī méiyǒu shàng jǐn. The screw hasn’t been tightened. 14 be up to; as many as 上百輛小汽車 shàng bǎi liàng xiǎoqìchē up to a hundred cars 出席人數已上萬。 Chūxí rénshù yǐ shàngwàn. There are as many as ten thousand present. or There is an attendance of 10,000 or so. 15 [ in stage directions] appear on the stage; enter 二戰士左上。 Èr zhànshì zuǒ shàng. Enter left two soldiers. 
noun abbreviation shàngshēng 
noun music note of the scale in gongchepu (工尺譜), corresponding to 1 in numbered musical notation

verb go to work; start work; be on duty (opp. 下班兒) 她上班去了。 Tā shàngbān qù le. She’s gone to work. 下午不上班。 Xiàwǔ bù shàngbān. We’ll take the afternoon off. or No work this afternoon. 我們每天早上八點鐘上班。 Wǒmen měitiān zǎoshang bā diǎn zhōng shàngbān. We start work at 8 every morning. 他一般騎車上下班。 Tā yībān qíchē shàngxiàbān. He usually rides bike to and from work.
noun shop; store 日夜商店 rìyè shāngdiàn around-the-clock shop; day-and-night shop 體育用品商店 tǐyù yòngpǐn shāngdiàn sports store

verb 1 attend class; go to class (opp. 下課) 你昨天怎麼沒來上課？ Nǐ zuótiān zěnme méi lái shàngkè？ Why didn’t you come to class yesterday? 今天下午我們不上課。 Jīntiān xiàwǔ wǒmen bù shàngkè. We have no classes this afternoon. 2 conduct a class; give a lesson (or lecture) 八點開始上課。 bā diǎn kāishǐ shàngkè. Classes begin at 8.

noun 1 above; over; on top of; on the surface of 上面就是琉璃塔了。 Shàngmian jiùshì liúlítǎ le. Further up is the glazed-tile pagoda. 飛機在雲層上面飛行。 Fēijī zài yúncéng shàngmian fēixíng. The plane flew above the clouds. 運河上面架了一座橋。 Yùnhé shàngmian jià le yī zuò qiáo. A bridge has been built across the canal. 你的行李袋就在我的箱子上面。 Nǐ de xínglǐdài jiù zài wǒ de xiāngzi shàngmian. Your bag is on top of my suitcase. 大橋上面走汽車, 下面走火車。 Dà qiáo shàngmian zǒu qìchē, xiàmian zǒu huǒchē. The upper deck of the bridge is for motor vehicles, the lower deck for trains. 2 abovementioned; aforesaid; foregoing 上面幾個發言 shàngmian jǐ ge fāyán the speeches you’ve just heard; the previous speeches 上面所舉的例子 Shàngmian suǒ jǔ de lìzi the above-mentioned example 上面這幾條理由 shàngmian zhè jǐ tiáo lǐyóu the aforesaid reasons 3 higher authorities; higher-ups 上面有指示。 Shàngmian yǒu zhǐshì. There are instructions from above. 4 aspect; respect; regard 他在外語上面下了很多功夫。 Tā zài wàiyǔ shàngmian xià le hěn duō gōngfu. He has put a lot of effort into his study of foreign languages. 5 elder generation of one's family; one's elders
noun morning; forenoon (opp. 下午)

verb 1 be short of; lack (opp. 多) 少管閒 shǎoguǎnxiánshì keep one’s nose out of other people’s affairs (or business) 缺醫少藥 quēyīshǎoyào be short of doctors and medicine 我們還少兩把椅子。 Wǒmen hái shǎo liǎng bǎ yǐzi. We’re still two chairs short. 咱們少一個好的守門員。 Zánmen shǎo yī ge hǎo de shǒuményuán. We lack a good goalkeeper. 2 owe 還少一百塊。 hái shǎo yībǎi kuài. There are still 100 yuan owing. 他還少我半年的房租。 Tā hái shǎo wǒ bànnián de fángzū. He still owes me half year’s rent. 3 lose; be missing 看看少不少人。 Kànkan shǎo bùshǎo rén. See if anyone is missing. 少了誰地球也轉。 shǎo le shuí dìqiú yě zhuǎn. No man is indispensable. 羊群裡少了幾只羊。 Yángqún lǐ shǎo le jǐ zhī yáng. A few sheep have been lost from the flock. 這裡肯定少了一個字。 Zhèlǐ kěndìng shǎo le yī ge zì. Surely, there’s a word missing here. 4 stop; quit 少廢話！ Shǎo fèihuà! Stop talking rubbish! 少給我裝蒜！ Shǎo gěi wǒ zhuāngsuàn! Stop pretending! 少來這一套。 Shǎo lái zhè yī tào. Cut it out. or Quit that! 
adjective few; little; less (opp. 多) 少吃多餐 shǎochīduōcān have many meals but little food at each 少得可憐 shǎo de kělián miserably little (or few) 少勞少得 shǎoláoshǎodé less pay for less work 少生優生 shǎoshēng-yōushēng have fewer but healthier babies 少生優育 shǎo shēng yōuyù fewer births and sound child care practice 少走彎路 shǎozǒuwānlù avoid detours in one’s progress 少花錢, 多辦事 Shǎo huāqián, duō bàn shì. accomplish more with less money 少講空話, 多做實事 shǎo jiǎng kōnghuà, duō zuò shíshì forsake empty talk in favour of practical work 以少勝多 yǐshǎoshèngduō defeat the many with the few 最近我們很少見到他。 Zuìjìn wǒmen hěn shǎo jiàndào tā. We’ve seen very little of him lately. 
adverb a little while; a moment 請少候。 Qǐng shǎo hòu. Wait a moment, please.

(shuí) pronoun 1 who 他是誰？ Tā shì shéi？ Who is he? 他在跟誰說話？ Tā zài gēn shéi shuōhuà？ Who is he talking to? 這是誰的意見？ Zhè shì shéi de yìjian？ Whose idea is this? 2 [in rhetorical questions] who 誰不說他好？ Shéi bù shuō tā hǎo？ Who wouldn’t speak well of him? 誰言寸草心, 報得三春暉。(孟郊《遊子吟》) Shéi yán cùncǎo xīn, bào de sānchūn huī. Such kindness of warm sun, can’t be repaid by grass. 3 someone; anyone 你要找誰嗎？ Nǐ yào zhǎo shéi ma？ Are you looking for someone? 我沒跟誰說話。 Wǒ méi gēn shéi shuōhuà. I didn’t talk to anyone. 有誰能幫助我就好了。 Yǒu shéi néng bāngzhù wǒ jiù hǎo le. If only someone would help me! 4 [before 都 or 也] everyone; anyone 誰也不要。 Shéi yě bùyào. Nobody wants it. 誰都喜歡他。 Shéi dōu xǐhuan tā. Everybody likes him. 5 [repeated in two phrases] whoever 誰污染誰治理的原則 shéi wūrǎn shéi zhìlǐ de yuánzé principle of keeping pollution controlled by whoever making it 誰先到, 誰先吃。 Shéi xiān dào, Shéi xiān chī. Whoever arrives first will eat first. 大家看誰合適就選誰。 Dàjiā kàn shéi héshì jiù xuǎn shéi. You may elect whoever you think is suitable. 6 [as both subject and object to indicate two different people] 他們倆誰也說不服誰。 Tāmen liǎ shéi yě shuō bù fú shéi. Neither of them could convince the other.

pronoun 1 [before a noun or by itself] what 什麼時候啦？ Shénme shíhou la？ What time is it? 什麼叫超現實主義？ Shénme jiào chāoxiànshízhǔyì？ What is surrealism? 你找什麼？ Nǐ zhǎo shénme？ What are you looking for? 你找什麼人？ Nǐ zhǎo shénme rén？ Who are you looking for? 她喜歡做什麼工作？ Tā xǐhuan zuò shénme gōngzuò？ What sort of job would she like to take? 什麼風把你吹來的？ shénme fēng bǎ nǐ chuī lái de? What fortunate breeze blew you here? 2 something; anything 我想吃點兒什麼。 Wǒ xiǎng chī diǎnrshénme. I want something to eat. 沒有什麼, 您不必介意。 Méiyǒu shénme, nín bùbì jièyì. Never mind, it’s nothing. 你讀過他的什麼作品嗎？ Nǐ dú guò tā de shénme zuòpǐn ma？ Have you read any of his books? 我講不出什麼新鮮玩意兒。 Wǒ jiǎng bù chū shénme xīnxiān wányìr. There won’t be anything new in my story. 種什麼花結什麼果。 zhòng shénme huājié shénme guǒ. As the flower so the fruit. 3 [before 也 or 都] any; every 他什麼都不怕。 Tā shénme dōu bù pà. He’s afraid of nothing. 經理正忙著, 什麼人也不見。 Jīnglǐ zhèng mángzhe, shénme rén yě bù jiàn. The manager is too busy to see anybody. 時間比什麼都寶貴。 Shíjiān bǐ shénme dōu bǎoguì. Time is more precious than anything else. 4 [used correlatively with another 什麼] whatever 有什麼, 咱們就吃什麼。 Yǒu shénme, zánmen jiù chī shénme. We’ll eat whatever we can find. 我有什麼說什麼, 絕對沒有保留。 Wǒ yǒu shénme shuō shénme, juéduì méiyǒu bǎoliú. I’ll just say what’s on my mind, withholding nothing. 5 [expressing anger, surprise, censure or negation] 什麼！ 沒有水？ Shénme! Méiyǒu shuǐ？ What! No water? 他知道什麼！ Tā zhīdao shénme! What the hell does he know? 你說的是什麼話！ Nǐ shuō de shì shénme huà! You’re talking sheer nonsense! 笑什麼？有什麼可笑的？ Xiào shénme？ Yǒu shénme kěxiào de？ What’s so funny? 你說呀！ 裝什麼啞巴？ Nǐ shuō ya! Zhuāng shénme yǎba？ Speak up! Stop playing dumb. 你嚷嚷什麼！ 有話好好兒的對她說嘛。 Nǐ rāngrang shénme! Yǒu huà hǎohāor de duì tā shuō ma. Stop shouting! Speak to her nicely. 6 [expressing disapproval or disagreement] 什麼不懂！ 裝糊塗就是了。 Shénme bù dǒng! Zhuāng hútu jiùshìle. What do you mean—not understand? You’re just pretending. 年輕什麼呀, 我都五十多了。 Niánqīng shénme ya, wǒ dōu wǔshí duō le. Young indeed! I’m past 50 already. 給您添麻煩了！ —— 麻煩什麼！ Gěi nín tiān máfan le! —— Máfan shénme! Sorry to have troubled you.—It’s nothing. 7 things like; such as; and so on; and what not 什麼縫縫補補, 洗洗涮涮, 都是奶奶的事兒。 Shénme féngféngbǔbǔ,  xǐ xǐ shuàn shuàn, dōu shì nǎinai de shìr. In our house it’s Grandma who does all the sewing, mending, washing and what not. 什麼乒乓球啊, 羽毛球啊, 籃球啊, 他都會玩。 Shénme Pīngpāngqiú a,  yǔmáoqiú a,  lánqiú a, tā dōu huì wán. He can play table tennis, badminton, basketball, anything.
at what time; when

noun business; trade 生意虧本 shēngyi kuīběn business running at loss 搶生意 qiǎngshēngyi undercut; hustle 做生意 zuòshēngyi do business 生意蕭條。 Shēngyi xiāotiáo. Business is dull (or stagnant). 生意興隆。 Shēngyi xīnglóng. Trade is brisk. or Business is booming. 他是做藥品生意的。 tā shì zuò yàopǐn shēngyi de. He’s in the drug business.
number 1 ten 十倍 Shí bèi ten times; tenfold 十幾 shíjǐ about a dozen 2 topmost; complete; full 十成 shíchéng 100 per cent

noun 1 matter; affair; thing; business 國家大事 guójiā dàshì state affairs 這事兒不好辦。 zhè shì r bù hǎobàn. This matter is hard to manage. 這是怎麼回事兒？ Zhè shì zěnme huí shì r? What’s this all about? or What’s happening? 2 trouble; accident 出事 chūshì meet with a mishap; have an accident 3 job; work 她找到事兒了。 Tā zhǎo dào shìr le. She’s got a job. or She’s found a job. 4 responsibility; involvement 沒你的事。 Méi nǐ de shì. It’s none of your business. 這件案子裡還有他的事兒呢。 Zhè jiàn ànzi lǐ hái yǒu tā deshì r ne. He was involved in this case too. 有我什麼事兒, 幹嗎怪我？ Yǒu wǒ shénmeshì r, gànmá guài wǒ? I had nothing to do with it, so why blame me? 
verb literary 1 wait upon; serve 事父母 shì fùmǔ wait upon one’s parents 2 be engaged in 不事營生 bù shì yíngsheng lead an idle life

noun 1 type; style 西式 xīshì Western style 雷鋒式的人物 Léi Fēng shì de rénwù people like Lei Feng 2 pattern; form 程式 chéngshì form; pattern 3 ceremony; ritual 開幕式 kāimùshì opening ceremony 4 formula 分子式 fēnzǐshì molecular formula 5 linguistics mood; mode 敘述式 xùshùshì indicative mood

noun 1 (the duration of) time 農忙的時候 nóngmáng de shíhou busy farming season 戰爭的時候 Zhànzhēng deshíhou during the war 2 (a point in) time; moment 就在這時候 jiù zài zhèshí hou just at this moment 時候不早了。 shíhou bù zǎo le. It’s getting late. 到時候我來叫你。 Dào shíhou wǒ lái jiào nǐ. I’ll call you when it’s time. 現在是什麼時候了？ Xiànzài shì shénme shíhou le？ What time is it?

noun 1 (the concept of) time 時間與空間 Shíjiān yǔ kōngjiān time and space 時間就是金錢。 shíjiān jiùshì jīnqián. Time is money. 時間過得真快呀, 不知不覺三年過去了。 shíjiān guò de zhēn kuài ya, bùzhībùjué sān nián guòqule. Where has the time gone! Three years have slipped by unnoticed. 2 (the duration of) time 時間掌握得好 shíjiān zhǎngwò de hǎo good timing; well-timed 費時間 fèi shíjiān time-consuming 辦公時間 bàngōng shíjiān office hours 不給對手喘息的時間 bù gěi duìshǒu chuǎnxī de shíjiān give one’s opponent no breathing space 時間到了。 Shíjiān dào le. Time’s up. 時間緊, 任務重。 shíjiān jǐn, rènwu zhòng. Time is pressing and the task heavy. 你做這事用了多少時間？ Nǐ zuò zhè shì yòng le duōshaoshíjiān? How much time did you spend on this? 3 (a point in) time 北京時間十九點整 Běijīng shíjiān shíjiǔ diǎn zhěng 19 hours Beijing Time 現在的時間是四點(零)五分。 Xiànzài deshíjiān shì sì diǎn wǔfēn. The time now is five minutes past four.

noun 1 book 一本關於中國曆史的新書 yī běn guānyú Zhōngguó lìshǐ de xīnshū a new work on Chinese history 2 style of calligraphy; script 楷書 kǎishū regular script 3 literary letter 家書 jiāshū letter from home 4 document 證書 zhèngshū certificate; credential 
verb literary write 振筆直書 zhènbǐzhíshū take up the pen and write vigorously
noun bookshop; bookstore; bookseller's 新華書店 Xīnhuá Shūdiàn Xinhua Bookstore
noun penmanship; calligraphy
noun 1 study 2 dated private school; family school

noun 1 water 請給我一杯水。 Qǐng gěi wǒ yī bēi shuǐ, Give me a glass of water, please. 2 river 漢水 Hànshuǐ Hanshui River 3 general term for rivers, lakes, seas, etc.; water 水陸運輸 shuǐ-lù yùnshū land and water transportation 水平如鏡。 Shuǐpíngrújìng. The surface of the water is as smooth as a mirror. 水往低處流。 shuǐ wǎng dīchù liú. Water seeks its own level. 4 liquid 汽水 qìshuǐ soft drink; soda water 5 extra charges or incomes 外水 wàishuǐ extra income 6 (Shuǐ) a surname 
adjective dialect poorly made; shoddy 這鞋做得太水了。 Zhè xié zuòdé tài shuǐ le. These shoes are very shoddily made. 
measure word washing (of a garment) 這件襯衫洗了三水了。 Zhè jiàn chènshān xǐ le sān shuǐ le. This shirt has gone through three washings.

verb sleep 睡不著 shuìbuzháo cannot fall asleep 睡過了頭 shuì guò le tóu oversleep 睡一會兒 shuì yīhuìr get a short sleep; sleep a while 一睡就睡到大天亮 Yī shuì jiù shuì dào dà tiānliàng sleep like a log till broad daylight 他睡了。 Tā shuì le. He’s gone to bed. 他睡著了。 Tā shuì zháo le. He’s asleep. 他睡得早, 起得也早。 tā shuì de zǎo, qǐ de yě zǎo. He goes to bed early and gets up early.
verb sleep 該睡覺了。 Gāi shuìjiào le. It’s time to go to bed. or It’s time for bed. 馬上上床, 好好地睡一覺。 Mǎshàng shàng chuáng, hǎohāo de shuì yī jiào. Get straight into bed and have a good sleep.

verb 1 speak; talk; say 說風涼話 shuōfēngliánghuà make irresponsible and carping comments 說得多做得少 Shuō de duō zuò de shǎo talk much but do little 說的比唱的好聽 shuō de bǐ chàng de hǎo tīng mouth high-sounding words 說得好不如做得好。 shuō de hǎo bùrú zuòdé hǎo. Better to do well than to say well. 他說法語。 Tā shuō Fǎyǔ. He speaks French. 你說得很對。 Nǐ shuō de hěn duì. What you say is quite true. 那未免說得太輕了。 Nà wèimiǎn shuō de tài qīng le. That’s putting it too mildly. 2 explain 說不通 shuōbùtōng cannot hold water; do not make sense 我一說他就明白了。 Wǒ yī shuō tā jiù míngbai le. I told him how and he caught on at once. 他說了又說, 我還是不懂。 Tā shuō le yòu shuō, wǒ háishi bù dǒng. He explained and explained, but I still couldn’t understand. 3 scold 他父親說了他一頓。 Tā fùqin shuō le tā yī dùn. His father gave him a scolding (or talking-to). 4 act as matchmaker 給他說個媳婦兒 Gěi tā shuō ge xífùr find a wife for him 5 refer to; indicate 你的話是說誰呢？ Nǐ de huà shì shuō shuí ne？ Who did your remarks refer to? 
noun theory; teachings; doctrine 著書立說 zhùshūlìshuō write books to expound a theory

verb 1 speak; talk; say 說話和氣 Shuōhuà héqi speak politely 說話算數 shuōhuà suànshù honour one’s word; mean what one says; every promise being trustworthy 說話的權利 shuōhuà de quánlì right to speak 說話不算話 Shuōhuà bù suàn huà go back on one’s word 他不愛說話。 Tā bù ài shuōhuà. He doesn’t like to talk. 我們說話是算數的。 Wǒmen shuō huà shì suànshù de. What we say counts. 還是讓事實來說話吧。 Háishi ràng shìshí lái shuōhuà ba. Let the facts speak for themselves. 她感動得說不出話來。 tā gǎndòng de shuōbuchū huà lái. She was too moved to say anything. 2 chat; talk 我找他說話去。 Wǒ zhǎo tā shuōhuà qù. I’d like to have a chat with him. 我們正說著話, 他進來了。 Wǒmen zhèng shuō zhe huà, tā jìnlai le. We were talking when he came in. 3 gossip; talk 你這樣幹, 別人當然要說話。 Nǐ zhèyàng gàn, biéren dāngrán yào shuōhuà. Considering what you’ve done, it’s natural that people should be talking. 4 figurative show (one's ability, strength, etc.); demonstrate 得靠實力說話。 Děi kào shílì shuōhuà. What really counts is your strength. 
adjective willing to help; obliging 他這人不大好說話。你還是找別人幫忙吧。 Tā zhè rén bùdà hǎo shuōhuà. Nǐ háishi zhǎo biéren bāngmáng ba. He’s not so obliging. You’d better find someone else for help. 
noun 1 dialect word; talk 他這句說話很有道理。 Tā zhè jù shuōhuà hěn yǒu dàoli. What he said was quite right. 2 a kind of storytelling popular in Tang and Song times 
adverb dialect in a jiffy; in a minute; right away 說話就得。 Shuōhuà jiù děi. It’ll be ready in a jiffy.
noun desk; writing desk

number four 四連冠 sì liánguàn quadruple crown; fourth consecutive championship 四輪驅動 sìlúnqūdòng four-wheel drive 四世同堂 sìshìtóngtáng four generations living under one roof 
noun music note of the scale in gongchepu (工尺譜), corresponding to 6 in numbered musical notation

noun 1 place 住所 zhùsuǒ dwelling place; residence 2 office; bureau; institute 指揮所 zhǐhuīsuǒ command post 3 dated troop station in the Ming Dynasty 
measure word [for houses, schools, hospitals, etc.] 兩所學校 liǎng suǒ xuéxiào two schools 一所房子 Yī suǒ fángzi a house 這所醫院 zhè suǒ yīyuàn this hospital 
auxiliary literary 1 [noun or pronoun＋所＋verb] a [with 的 to modify a noun] 我所認識的人 wǒ suǒ rènshi de rén the people I know 大家所提的意見 dàjiā suǒ tí de yìjian the opinions various people put forward b [with 的 as a noun] 他所說的未必確實。 Tā suǒ shuō de wèibì quèshí. What he says is not necessarily true. 我所知道的就這些。 Wǒ suǒ zhīdao de jiù zhèxiē. That’s all I know. c [as a noun without 的, esp. when the verb is monosyllabic] 所到之處 suǒdàozhīchù wherever one goes 所見所聞 suǒjiànsuǒwén what one sees and hears 盡我所能 jìn wǒ suǒ néng do all I can 據你所說 jù nǐ suǒ shuō from what you say 2 [所＋verb] a [with 的 to modify a noun] 所需的費用 suǒ xū de fèiyong necessary expenses 所用的方法 suǒ yòng de fāngfǎ the methods which are used b [with 的 as a noun] 所需的並不多。 Suǒ xū de bìng bù duō. What is needed is not much. 我們所考慮的正是這一點。 wǒmensuǒ kǎolǜ de zhèngshì zhè yīdiǎn. That’s just what we have under consideration. c [as a noun without 的, esp. in set phrases in which the verb is monosyllabic] 各盡所能 gèjìnsuǒnéng from each according to his ability 3 [為 or 被＋ noun or pronoun ＋所＋ verb, expressing a passive meaning] 為人所笑 wéi rén suǒ xiào be laughed at by other people 被表面現象所迷惑 bèi biǎomiàn xiànxiàng suǒ míhuo be misled by outward appearances 4 [所＋ verb used as the object of 有 or 無] a [as the object of 有] 有所創造 yǒusuǒ chuàngzào create something or other 有所準備 yǒusuǒ zhǔnbèi be prepared in some way or other b [as the object of 無, esp. in set phrases] 無所準備 wú suǒ zhǔnbèi need do nothing in preparation for it 無所用心 wúsuǒyòngxīn not give serious thought to anything

conjunction 1 [introducing a clause of result, preceded by a clause of reason or cause with or without an introductory 因為 or 由於] as a result; so; therefore 天太冷, 所以我不去了。 Tiān tài lěng, suǒyǐ wǒ bù qù le. It’s too cold, so I’m not going. 因為熊貓是珍稀動物, 所以要盡一切努力保護它。 Yīnwèi xióngmāo shì zhēnxī dòngwù, suǒyǐ yào jìn yīqiè nǔlì bǎohù tā. Pandas are very rare; therefore we should do our best to protect them. 2 [between the subject and the predicate of a clause of result, followed by a clause of reason or cause introduced by 是因為 or 是由於] the reason why 我們(之)所以沒有去, 是因為我們得到通知太晚了。 Wǒmensuǒyǐ méiyǒu qù, shì yīnwèi wǒmen dédào tōngzhī tài wǎn le. The reason why we didn’t go was that we were notified too late. 3 [in the pattern 是…所以…的原因, preceded by a clause of reason or cause] that's why 我和他在一起工作過兩三年, 這就是我所以對他比較熟悉的原因。 Wǒ hé tā zài yīqǐ gōngzuò guò liǎng sān nián, zhè jiùshì wǒ suǒyǐ duì tā bǐjiào shúxī de yuányīn. He and I have worked together for a couple of years. That’s why I know him pretty well. 4 colloquial that's just the reason; that's just the point 所以呀, 要不我怎麼會這麼說呢？ Suǒyǐ ya, yào bù wǒ zěnme huì zhème shuō ne？ That’s just the point; otherwise I wouldn’t have said it. 
noun literary [in certain set phrases as the object of the verb, to refer to sth. indefinite but understood] 不明所以 bù míng suǒ yǐ not know why it is so

pronoun 1 he; him; his 他哥 tā gē his elder brother 他倆 tāliǎ the two of them; both 他老婆 tā lǎopo his wife 他家在農村。 Tā jiā zài nóngcūn. His home is in the countryside. 他家是新搬來的。 Tā jiā shì xīn bān lái de. He and his family moved here recently. 他剛纔給你送票來了。 Tā gāng cái gěi nǐ sòng piào lái le. He came just now with a ticket for you. 誰沒有票, 問他要。 Shuí méi yǒu piào, wèn tā yào. Anyone without a ticket can ask him for one. 2 [for either sex when it is either unknown or unimportant] 從遠處看不出他是男是女。 cóng yuǎnchù kànbuchū tā shì nán shì nǚ. I can’t tell if it’s a man or a woman from a distance. 每個孩子都講了他學習(雷鋒)的收穫。 Měi ge háizi dōu jiǎng le tā xuéxí Léi Fēng de shōuhuò. Each child described what he or she had learnt (from Lei Feng). 3 [before or after a person's name for emphasis] 老王他也提前到了。 Lǎo wáng tā yě tíqián dào le. Lao Wang also came early. 這事兒成與不成就看他老張了。 Zhè shìr chéng yǔ bù chéng jiù kàn tā lǎo zhāng le. The success or failure of this all depends on Lao Zhang alone. 4 [used as a meaningless object, for emphasis or in fun] 好好睡他一覺 Hǎohāo shuì tā yī jiào have a good sleep 咱們喝他幾杯去。 Zánmen hē tā jǐ bēi qù. Let’s go and have a few drinks. 你寫他兩三本書, 就出名了。 Nǐ xiě tā liǎng sān běn shū, jiù chūmíng le. If you can publish a couple of books, you’ll become famous. 5 usually literary other; another; some other 別無他求 Bié wú tā qiú have no other request 留作他用 liú zuò tāyòng keep for other uses 此人早已他去。 Cǐ rén zǎoyǐ tā qù. He has long since left. 
noun (Tā) a surname
pronoun she; her 她好久沒來這兒了。 Tā hǎojiǔ méi lái zhèr le. She hasn’t been here for a long time. 我明天找她去。 Wǒ míngtiān zhǎo tā qù. I’m going to see her tomorrow.

adjective 1 highest; greatest 太空 tàikōng outer space 2 re-motest 太古 tàigǔ remote antiquity 3 more or most senior 太老伯 tàilǎobó grand-uncle; great-uncle 太老師 tàilǎoshī one’s teacher’s father; one’s father’s teacher 
adverb 1 excessively; too; over 那太過分了。 Nà tài guòfèn le. That’s going too far. 你太誇獎了。 Nǐ tài kuājiǎng le. You flatter me. 您太客氣了。 Nín tài kèqi le. You are being too modest. or You are too kind. 你太相信這家伙了。 Nǐ tài xiāngxìn zhè jiāhuo le. You place too much trust in this fellow. 你車開得太快, 不安全。 Nǐ chē kāi de tài kuài, bù ānquán. You’re driving too fast, it's not safe. 水太熱, 燙手。 Shuǐ tài rè, tàng shǒu. The water is scalding to the touch. 他太堅持己見了。 Tā tài jiānchí jǐjiàn le. He is much too stubborn in his opinions. 這座城市人口太多。 Zhè zuò chéngshì rénkǒu tài duō. The city is over-populated. 2 [expressing admiration or exclamation with 了 at the end of a sentence] 長城太偉大了。 Chángchéng tài wěidà le. The Great Wall is really amazing. 哥兒倆長得太像了。 Gērliǎ zhǎng de tài xiàng le. The two brothers are very much alike. 她的發音太好了。 Tā de fāyīn tài hǎo le. Her pronunciation is excellent. 我太感激你了。 Wǒ tài gǎnjī nǐ le. I can’t thank you enough. 又見到您, 太高興了。 Yòu jiàndào nín, tài gāoxìng le. I’mso happy to see you again. 3 [before another adverb 不 to emphasize negation] 你太不虛心了。 Nǐ tài bù xūxīn le. You’re too proud. 這太不好了。 Zhè tài bù hǎo le. This is terrible. 這太不像話了！ Zhè tài bù xiànghuà le! This is simply outrageous! or This is too much! 這個人太不講道理。 Zhège rén tài bù jiǎng dàoli. This man is absolutely unreasonable. 4 [after 不 to soften the tone of negation] 不太好 Bù tài hǎo not very good 你這樣做不太合適吧。 Nǐ zhèyàng zuò bù tài héshì ba. That’s probably not very appropriate. 他不太願意結交新朋友。 Tā bù tài yuànyi jiéjiāo xīn péngyou. He’s reluctant to make new friends. 這車看起來不太漂亮, 可就是快。 Zhè chē kàn qǐlai bù tài piàoliang, kě jiù shì kuài. The car isn’t much to look at, but it’s fast.
noun Taiwan

noun 1 Mrs; Madame 王太太 wáng tàitai Mrs Wang; Madame Wang 2 mistress of a household; madam; lady 3 [usu. preceded by a personal pronoun] wife 我太太 wǒ tàitai my wife 4 dialect (paternal) great-grandmother or great-grandfather

noun weather 天氣要變。 Tiānqì yào biàn. The weather is changing. 天氣轉晴。 Tiānqì zhuǎn qíng. It’s clearing up. 初春天氣, 早晨還有些涼意。 Chūchūn tiānqì, zǎochen hái yǒuxiē liáng yì. It’s early spring now—still a bit chilly in the morning. 不管天氣如何, 也要繼續施工。 Bùguǎn tiānqì rúhé, yě yào jìxù shīgōng. Construction will go on no matter what the weather is like (or in all weathers).
verb 1 dance (in a performance) 2 dance (socially)

verb 1 listen; hear 聽廣播 Tīng guǎngbō listen to the radio 聽, 好像有人敲門。 tīng, hǎoxiàng yǒurén qiāo mén. Listen, it sounds like someone knocking at the door. 聽聲音不像他。 Tīng shēngyīn bù xiàng tā. The voice didn’t sound like him. 請聽我說完。 Qǐng tīng wǒ shuō wán. Please hear me out. 請聽一下電話。 Qǐng tīng yī xià diànhuà. Answer the phone, please. 廠長要你聽電話。 Chǎngzhǎng yào nǐ tīng diànhuà. The director wants you on the phone. 打開收音機聽聽新聞。 Dǎkāi shōuyīnjī tīngtīng xīnwén. Turn on the radio and listen to the news. 到群眾中走一走, 聽聽他們的意見。 Dào qúnzhòng zhōng zǒu yī zǒu, tīngtīng tāmen de yìjian. Go among the people and hear what they have to say. 你聽著, 我在給你講呢！ Nǐ tīng zhe, wǒ zài gěi nǐ jiǎng ne! Listen to me, I’m talking to you! 他的話聽起來不誠懇。 Tā de huà tīng qǐlai bù chéngkěn. He did not sound sincere. or His words rang hollow. 他的四川口音我聽不出來。 Tā de Sìchuān kǒuyin wǒ tīng bù chūlai. I can’t detect his Sichuan accent. 他唆了半天, 我實在聽不下去了。 Tā suō le bàntiān, wǒ shízài tīng bùxià qùle. He rambled on for hours and I could stand it no longer. 我沒聽過這樣好的音樂。 Wǒ méi tīng guò zhèyàng hǎo de yīnyuè. I’ve never heard such beautiful music before. 這一句我沒聽清。 Zhè yī jù wǒ méi tīng qīng. I didn’t quite catch that sentence. 這些話聽起來倒也有些道理。 Zhèxiē huà tīng qǐlai dào yě yǒuxiē dàoli. That actually sounds quite reasonable. 2 heed; obey; listen to 對批評聽不進去 Duì pīpíng tīng bù jìnqu turn a deaf ear to criticism 聽我的沒錯兒。 Tīng wǒ de méicuòr. Do as I say and you won’t go wrong. 我勸他別去, 他不聽。 Wǒ quàn tā bié qù, tā bù tīng. I advised him not to go, but he wouldn’t listen. 家裡的事我都聽她的。 Jiālǐ de shì wǒ dōu tīng tā de. When it comes to household matters, I listen to her. 工地上一切都聽他指揮。 Gōngdì shàng yīqiè dōu tīng tā zhǐhuī. Everything on the construction site is under his command. 老了, 胳膊腿兒不聽使喚了。 Lǎo le, gēbo tuǐr bù tīng shǐhuan le. I’m getting old. My limbs don’t obey me anymore 她要聽了我的話, 哪會有今天。 Tā yào tīng le wǒ dehuà, nǎ huì yǒu jīntiān. If she’d heeded me, things would be different today. 3 administer; manage 聽政 tīngzhèng conduct a hearing; hold count 
verb allow; let 聽由老闆擺布 tīng yóu lǎobǎn bǎibu be at the mercy of the boss 
measure word transliteration tin; can 六聽啤酒 liù tīng píjiǔ six cans of beer 三聽咖啡 Sān tīng kāfēi three tins of coffee

verb 1 stop; cease; halt; pause 停下工作 tíngxià gōngzuò stop work 雨停了。 Yǔ tíng le. The rain has stopped. 他不停地寫著。 Tā bù tíng de xiě zhe. He kept on writing. 蟋蟀叫個不停。 Xīshuài jiào ge bù tíng. The crickets are chirping endlessly. 她停了一會兒, 又接著講下去。 Tā tíng le yīhuìr, yòu jiēzhe jiǎng xiàqu. She paused a moment before continuing the story. 演奏完序曲, 樂隊停下來調了調音。 Yǎnzòu wán xùqǔ, yuèduì tíng xiàlai diào le tiáoyīn. After the overture, the orchestra stopped to tune up again. 2 stop over; stay 我在杭州停了五天。 Wǒ zài Hángzhōu tíng le wǔ tiān. I stopped over at Hangzhou for five days. 火車在這些小站只停一分鐘。 Huǒchē zài zhèxiē xiǎo zhàn zhǐ tíng yī fēnzhōng. The train stops for only one minute at these small stations. 3 (of cars) parked; (of ships) lie at anchor; (of a dead body or coffin) placed 船停在江心。 Chuán tíng zài jiāngxīn. The ship anchored in the middle of the river. 靈柩停在中央大廳內。 Língjiù tíng zài zhōngyāng dàtīng nèi. The coffin was placed in the central hall. 門口停著一輛轎車。 Ménkǒu tíng zhe yī liàng jiàochē. Parked in front of the gate was a sedan. 汽車停在哪兒？ Qìchē tíng zài nǎr？ Where can we park the car? 輪船在港口已停了三天。 Lúnchuán zài gǎngkǒu yǐ tíng le sān tiān. The steamship has been in the harbour for three days. 4 ready; settled See 31556864停妥ting2tuo3停妥 
measure word colloquial part (of a total); portion 十停兒有九停兒是好的。 Shí tíngr yǒu jiǔ tíngr shì hǎo de. Nine out of ten are good.

verb 1 stop; pull up 下一站停車十分鐘。 Xià yī zhàn tíngchē shí fēnzhōng. At the next station there will be a ten-minute stop. 2 park (a car) 此處不准停車！ Cǐchù bù zhǔn tíngchē! No Parking! 3 (of a machine) stall; stop working 機器停車了, 得加點兒油。 Jīqì tíngchē le, děi jiā diǎnr yóu. The machine’s stalled. It needs oiling. 三號車間停車修理。 Sān hào chējiān tíngchē xiūlǐ. No.3 Workshop has stopped work for repairs.

verb be told; hear of 聽說老王病得很重。 tīngshuō lǎo wáng bìng de hěn zhòng. I heard that Lao Wang is very ill. 你聽說過李一這個人沒有？ Nǐ tīngshuō guò lǐ yī zhège rén méiyǒu？ Have you heard of someone called Li Yi? 她明天走。——我聽說了。 Tā míngtiān zǒu. —— Wǒ tīngshuō le. She’s leaving tomorrow.—So I’ve been told. 我聽人說她到南方去了。 Wǒ tīng rén shuō tā dào nánfāng qù le. I hear she has gone to the South. 這只不過是聽說而已。 Zhè zhǐ buguò shì tīngshuō éryǐ. This is only hearsay. or It’s nothing but rumour. 這種事從沒聽說過。 zhèzhǒng shì cóngméi tīngshuō guò. We’ve never heard of such a thing. 
adjective dialect heed what an elder or superior says; be obedient
noun library 國家圖書館 guójiātúshūguǎn national library

verb 1 ask; inquire (opp. 答) 問個問題 wèn ge wèntí ask (or pose) a question 不懂就問。 Bù dǒng jiù wèn. Ask when you don’t know. 他在食堂問了一下開飯的時間。 Tā zài shítáng wèn le yīxià kāifàn de shíjiān. He inquired about meal times at the canteen. 2 ask (or inquire) after 他信裡問起你。 Tā xìn lǐ wèn qǐ nǐ. He asks after you in his letter. 幫我問教授們好。 bāng wǒ wèn jiàoshòu men hǎo. Please give my regards to the professors. 3 interrogate; examine 審問 shěnwèn interrogate; question 4 hold responsible; intervene 出了事唯你是問。 Chū le shì wéi nǐ shì wèn. noun 1 question; problem; issue 我提個問題行嗎？ Wǒ tí ge wèntí xíng ma？ May I ask a question? 2 problem; contradiction; issue 關鍵問題 Guānjiàn wèntí key problem 家庭問題 jiātíng wèntí family problem 研究新問題 yánjiū xīn wèntí study new problems 3 key; crucial point 他的能力沒問題。 Tā de nénglì méi wèntí. There’s no question about his ability. 這是個用法問題。 Zhè shì ge yòng fǎ wèntí. This is a matter of usage. 那不是問題之所在。 Nà bù shì wèntí zhī suǒzài. That’s not the issue. 問題是我們去還是不去。 Wèntí shì wǒmen qù hái shì bù qù. The thing is, shall we go or not. 4 trouble; mishap 那臺車床出問題了。 Nà tái chēchuáng chū wèntí le. Something has gone wrong with that lathe. 一路上沒出問題。 Yīlù shàng méi chū wèntí. The trip went off without mishap.

noun 1 [used alone, esp. in contrast to 上] below 上有父母, 下有兒女 Shàng yǒu fùmǔ, xià yǒu ér-nǚ have parents above and children below—have a large family to care for 上至市長, 下至一般市民 shàng zhì shìzhǎng, xià zhì yībān shìmín from the mayor down to ordinary townsfolk 2 [after a preposition] down; downward 往下看 wǎng xià kàn look down 他將帽沿向下拉了拉。 Tā jiāng mào yán xiàng xià lā le lā. He pulled his hat down slightly. 3 [after a noun] under 山下 shān xià at the foot of a hill 樹下 shù xià under a tree 零下五度 língxià wǔ dù five degrees below zero 在月光下散步 zài yuèguāng xià sànbù take a walk in the moonlight 4 [usu. before a noun] lower (in position, rank, or quality) 分為上, 中, 下三等 fēnwéi shàng, zhōng, xià sānděng divided into three grades: upper, middle and lower 那本書在書架的最下一層。 Nà běn shū zài shūjià de zuì xià yī céng. The book is on the bottom shelf. 5 next (in time or order); latter; second 下次 xiàcì next time 下禮拜 xiàlǐbài next week 下兩批 xià liǎng pī next two batches 下個世紀 xià ge shìjì next century 下一班車 xià yī bānchē next bus or train 6 the second of two, or the last of three 下集 xiàjí Volume Two or Three; Vol. II or III 下半學期 Xià bàn xuéqī second (or latter) half of the term 這部詞典分上, 中, 下三冊。 zhè bù cídiǎn fēn shàng, zhōng, xià sān cè. This dictionary comes in three volumes. 7 [before a verb] downward; down 防止圓木下滑 fángzhǐ yuán mù xiàhuá prevent the logs from rolling down 8 [indicating scope, state, condition, etc.] 在黨的領導下 zài dǎng de lǐngdǎo xià under the leadership of the Party 在這種情況下 zài zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng xià under these circumstances 在朋友們的幫助下 Zài péngyou men de bāngzhù xià with the help of friends 9 [in certain expressions of time] 時下 shíxià nowadays 年下 niánxià colloquial the lunar new year 10 [after numerals to indicate location or direction] 四下 sìxià far and near; all around 兩下裡 liǎngxiàli colloquial both parties; both sides 
verb 1 proceed down from; descend 下床 xiàchuáng get out of bed 下樓 xiàlóu descend the stairs; go or come downstairs 下山 xiàshān descend the mountain; come or go down a mountain 順流而下 shùnliú'érxià sail or go downstream 2 get off or get out of (a conveyance); alight; disembark 下車 xiàchē get off a car or bus 下電梯 xià diàntī get off an elevator 下飛機 xià fēijī get off a plane; alight from a plane; disembark 3 (of rain, snow, etc.) come down; fall 下雨 xiàyǔ rain 下雪 xiàxuě snow 下雹子了。 Xià báozi le. It’s hailing. 下霜了。 Xià shuāng le. There is frost. 下霧了。 Xià wù le. There’s a fog. 雪下得很大。 Xuě xià de hěn dà. A heavy snow is falling. or It’s snowing hard. 4 issue (an order, etc.); deliver; send out (an invitation, etc.) 下命令 xià mìnglìng issue (or give) orders 下請帖 xià qǐngtiě send an invitation 我們早下過通知了。 Wǒmen zǎo xià guò tōngzhī le. We have already sent out notices. 下訂單 xiàdìngdān place an order 5 go to (a place usu. thought of as lower or below) 下地獄 xià dìyù go to hell 下館子 xià guǎnzi go to eat in a restaurant; eat out 廠長下車間了。 Chǎngzhǎng xià chējiān le. The factory director has gone to the workshop. 6 leave (the stage, field, etc.); exit 這場戲你從右邊的旁門下。 Zhè chǎng xì nǐ cóng yòubian de pángmén xià. In this scene, you exit stage right. 換人, 四號下, 三號上。 Huànrén,  sì hào xià, sān hào shàng. Substitution, No. 3 on, No. 4 off. 7 put in (ingredients or components of food, fertilizer, poison, capital, etc.); cast 下肥料 xià féiliào apply fertilizer 下麵條 xiàmian tiáo place noodles in a pot of boiling water; cook noodles in boiling water 下作料 Xià zuóliao put in the condiments; add seasonings; season 下網撈魚 xià wǎng lāo yú cast a net to catch fish 8 play (a board game); make a move (in a board game) 下圍棋 xià wéiqí play go 該你下了。 Gāi nǐ xià le. Your move. 9 take down or off; dismantle; unload 下了歹徒的槍 xià le dǎitú de qiāng disarm the brigand 把紗窗下下來 bǎ shāchuāng xià xiàlai take the screen window off 船上的貨還沒下完。 Chuánshàng de huò hái méi xià wán. The cargo is not fully unloaded yet. 10 give (a definition, conclusion, etc.) 下定義 xià dìngyì give a definition；define 下結論 xià jiélùn draw a conclusion 下決心 xià juéxīn make a resolution;determine;resolve to 11 apply; use 下刀 xià dāo cut; slice; put a knife to 下力氣 xià lìqi apply strength; make an effort; exert oneself 12 (of animals) give birth to; drop (a litter); lay (eggs) 下了一窩小豬 xià le yī wō xiǎo zhū give birth to (or drop) a litter of piglets 13 capture (a city); take 連下數城 lián xià shù chéng take several cities in succession 14 give in 相持不下 xiāngchíbùxià deadlock 15 get off (work); get out of (class) 下夜班 xià yèbān come off night duty 課早下了。 Kè zǎo xià le. The class was over a long time ago. 16 [in the negative] less than; at least 參加大會的不下三千人。 Cānjiā dàhuì de bù xià sānqiān rén. No less than 3,000 people attended the conference. or At least 3,000 people came to the conference. 
measure word 1  a [for verbs of action] stroke; time(s) 敲三下門 qiāo sān xià mén give three knocks on the door 推了我一下 Tuī le wǒ yīxià gave me a push 打了孩子幾下 dǎ le háizi jǐ xià spanked the child a couple of times 搖了幾下旗子 yáo le jǐ xià qízi waved the flag a few times b [for the capacity of a container] dialect 瓶子裡裝了半下墨水。 Píngzi lǐ zhuāng le bàn xià mòshuǐ. The bottle is half full of ink. 這麼大碗麵條, 他足足吃了三下。 Zhème dà wǎn miàntiáo, tā zúzú chī le sān xià. He wolfed down three large bowls of noodles. 2 [after 兩 or 幾] skill; ability; capability 我就會這麼兩下。 Wǒ jiù huì zhème liǎng xià. That’s all I can do. 想不到他還有幾下。 Xiǎng bù dào tā háiyǒu jǐ xià. I never expected him to be so capable.
noun summer (season)

verb 1 get out of class; finish class (opp. 上課) 下課後(= 下了課)再去。 xiàkè hòu zài qù. Go there after class. 現在下課。 Xiànzài xiàkè. The class is dismissed. or The class is over. 2 lay off; terminate 那支足球隊的主教練已正式下課。 Nà zhī zúqiúduì de zhǔjiàoliàn yǐ zhèngshì xiàkè. The chief coach of that football team has been formally laid off. 這種產品沒有競爭力, 只好下課。 zhèzhǒng chǎnpǐn méiyǒu jìngzhēnglì, zhǐhǎo xiàkè. This product is not competitive and has been terminated.

noun 1 below; under; underneath 大橋下面 dà qiáo xiàmian under the bridge 圖表下面的說明 túbiǎo xiàmian de shuōmíng caption below the chart 褥子下面鋪著一領席。 Rùzi xiàmian pū zhe yī lǐng xí. There is a mat underneath the mattress. 2 next in order; following 下面一個 xiàmian yī ge next one 下面該誰了？ Xiàmian gāi shuí le？ Who’s next? 必須記住下面幾點。 Bìxū jìzhu xiàmian jǐ diǎn. Bear in mind the following points. 下面請老李談談。 Xiàmian qǐng lǎo lǐ tán tán. Now it’s Lao Li’s turn to speak. 這個問題我下面還要談到。 Zhège wèntí wǒ xiàmian hái yào tán dào. I’ll come back to this point later. 3 lower level; subordinate 了解下面的情況 liǎojiě xiàmian de qíngkuàng find out how things are at the lower levels 細心傾聽下面的意見 Xìxīn qīngtīng xiàmian de yìjian listen carefully to the views of one’s subordinates
photo

verb 1 think; ponder; consider 想辦法 xiǎng bànfǎ think of a way; seek a solution (or a way out) 想問題 xiǎng wèntí think over a problem 讓我想一想。 Ràng wǒ xiǎng yī xiǎng. Let me think it over. or Let me see. 你想得真周到。 Nǐ xiǎng de zhēn zhōudao. You have really thought of everything. 你想清楚了沒有？ Nǐ xiǎng qīngchu le méiyǒu？ Have you thought it out (or through)? 我們也要想想困難。 Wǒmen yě yào xiǎngxiǎng kùnnan. We must also anticipate difficulties. 我在想下一步棋該怎麼走。 Wǒ zài xiǎng xià yī bù qí gāi zěnme zǒu. I’m considering my next (chess) move. 2 think back; try to remember; recall; recollect 回想往事 huí xiǎng wǎngshì recall the past 你好好想想鑰匙擱哪兒了。 Nǐ hǎohāo xiǎngxiǎng yàoshi gē nǎr le. Think back carefully where you could have put the key. 3 suppose; reckon; consider; think 我想不至於吧。 Wǒ xiǎng bùzhìyú ba. I don’t believe things could get that bad. or Surely as bad as that! 我想我該走了。 Wǒ xiǎng wǒ gāi zǒu le. I’m afraid I must be going now. 你想他能買到票嗎？ Nǐ xiǎng tā néng mǎi dào piào ma？ Do you suppose he can get the tickets? 我想他今天不會來。 Wǒ xiǎng tā jīntiān bù huì lái. I don’t think he’ll come today. 4 want to; wish to; feel like (doing sth.) 我也想試試。 Wǒ yě xiǎng shìshi. I’d like to try too. 他很想上大學。 Tā hěn xiǎng shàng dàxué. He longs to go to college. 你想看足球賽嗎？ Nǐ xiǎng kàn zúqiúsài ma？ Do you want to see (or feel like seeing) a football match? 她不想跟我們去。 Tā bù xiǎng gēn wǒmen qù. She doesn’t wish to come with us. 5 remember with longing; miss 你走了以後, 我們都很想你。 Nǐ zǒu le yǐhòu, wǒmen dōu hěn xiǎng nǐ. After you left, we all missed you. 王大娘想女兒都想病了。 Wáng dàniáng xiǎng nǚ'ér dōu xiǎng bìng le. Auntie Wang misses her daughter so much she’s fallen ill.
