adjective 1 small; little; petty; minor (opp. 大) 小國 xiǎoguó small country 小河 xiǎohé small river 小事 xiǎoshì small matter 小屋 xiǎowū small room (or house) 小姑娘 xiǎogūniang little girl 小手術 xiǎoshǒushù minor operation 小問題 xiǎo wèntí minor question 風小些了。 Fēng xiǎo xiē le. The wind has dropped a little. 那個數量很小。 Nàge shùliàng hěn xiǎo. That’s a very small amount. 你的聲音太小。 Nǐ de shēngyīn tài xiǎo. Your voice is too soft. 鞋小了點兒。 xié xiǎo le diǎnr. These shoes are a bit too tight. 2 young (opp. 大, 老) 你也不小了。 Nǐ yě bù xiǎo le. You’re not young any more. 她比我小。 Tā bǐ wǒ xiǎo. She is younger than I am. 他還小呢。 Tā hái xiǎo ne. He’s still young. 3 the last in order of seniority; youngest 小兒子 xiǎo'érzi the youngest son 他是我的小弟弟。 Tā shì wǒ dexiǎo dìdi. He is my youngest brother. 4 [before names of animals to indicate the young] 小狗 xiǎo gǒu pup; puppy 小雞 xiǎojī chick 小鹿 xiǎolù deerlet; fawn 小馬 xiǎomǎ pony; foal; colt 小貓 xiǎomāo kitten; kitty 小牛 xiǎoniú calf; heifer 小鴨 xiǎoyā duckling 小羊 xiǎoyáng lamb; kid 小豬 xiǎozhū piggy; piglet; shoat 小老虎 xiǎolǎohǔ tiger cub 5 [before family name, given name, etc.] 小強 xiǎo qiáng Xiao Qiang 小三兒 xiǎo sānr Xiao Sanr (childhood name for one’s third child) 小張 xiǎo zhāng Xiao Zhang 6 self-deprecating my; our 小店 xiǎodiàn my store 小女 xiǎonǚ my daughter 
adverb of short duration; for a while 小坐片刻 xiǎozuòpiànkè sit for a while
noun 1 dated young (unmarried) lady 2 Miss 張小姐 zhāng xiǎojie Miss Zhang 3 euphemistic prostitute; street girl
noun 1 primary (or elementary) school 2 dated philological studies
noun summer 這裡的夏天特別熱。 Zhèlǐ de xiàtiān tèbié rè. It’s very hot here in summer. or Summers here are very hot.
noun afternoon (opp. 上午) 下午見！ Xiàwǔ jiàn! See you this afternoon! 下午有場電影。 Xiàwǔ yǒu chǎng diànyǐng. There’s a movie this afternoon.

verb 1 write 寫封信 xiě fēng xìn write a letter 寫副對聯 Xiě fù duìlián write a couplet 寫得一手好字 xiě de yī shǒu hǎo zì have good handwriting; write a good hand 我喜歡寫鋼筆字, 不喜歡寫毛筆字。 Wǒ xǐhuan xiě gāngbǐ zì, bù xǐhuan xiě máobǐ zì. I like to write with a pen and not with a writing-brush. 這支筆不好寫。 Zhè zhī bǐ bù hǎo xiě. This pen doesn’t write well. 2 compose; write (as an author, reporter, etc.) 寫詩 xiěshī compose a poem 寫論文 xiě lùnwén write a paper (or thesis) 寫日記 xiě rìjì make an entry in one’s diary; keep a diary 寫小說 Xiě xiǎoshuō write a novel 文章寫成了嗎？ Wénzhāng xiě chéng le ma？ Have you finished writing the article? 3 describe; depict 寫人物的心理活動 xiě rénwù de xīnlǐ huódòng depict the characters’ mental activities 這個人物叫他寫活了。 Zhège rénwù jiào tā xiě huó le. His portrayal of the character is vivid and true to life. 4 paint; draw See 33305344寫生xie3sheng1寫生
verb thank 謝謝！ Xièxie! Thanks! or Thank you! 謝謝你的好意。 Xièxie nǐ de hǎo yì. Thank you for your kindness. 請替我謝謝他。 Qǐng tì wǒ xièxie tā. Please pass on my thanks to him.
to write characters

verb like; love; be fond of; be keen on 喜歡看電視 Xǐhuan kàn diànshì like watching TV 我喜歡熱鬧。 Wǒ xǐhuan rènao. I like company. 這孩子真討人喜歡。 Zhè háizi zhēn tǎo rén xǐhuan. What a lovable child! 她最不喜歡吹吹拍拍。 Tā zuì bù xǐhuan chuī chuī pāipāi. She loathes bragging and flattery. 
adjective happy; elated; filled with joy 聽到勝利的消息好不喜歡 Tīngdào shènglì de xiāoxi hǎo bù xǐhuan great elation at the news of victory 快把這好消息告訴奶奶, 讓她老人家喜歡喜歡。 Kuài bǎ zhè hǎo xiāoxi gàosu nǎinai, ràng tā lǎorenjia xǐhuan xǐhuan. Quick, tell Grandma the good news and make her happy.
1 abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆Xīnjiāng [新疆] or Singapore 新加坡Xīnjiāpō [新加坡] 2 surname Xin

noun behaviour; conduct 品行 pǐnxíng moral conduct 言行 yánxíng words and deeds 
verb 1 literary go; walk; travel 非洲之行 Fēizhōu zhī xíng a trip to Africa 日行百裡 rì xíng bǎi lǐ cover a hundred li a day 日行三千步 rì xíng sānqiān bù walk three thousand steps a day (for exercise) 兒行千里母擔憂。 Ér xíng qiān lǐ mǔ dānyōu. When children travel far from home, mothers never stop worrying. 2 be current; circulate 發行 fāxíng issue; publish; distribute; put on sale 3 do; perform; carry out 簡便易行 jiǎnbiàn yìxíng simple and easy to do 4 [before a disyllabic verb, indicating the performance of some action] 即行通知 jí xíng tōngzhī notify sb. at once 另行安排 lìngxíng ānpái make separate arrangements 5 be all right; will do 沒有鉛絲, 用繩子也行。 Méiyǒu qiānsī, yòng shéngzi yě xíng. If there is no wire, a cord will do. 你替我到郵局跑一趟, 行嗎？——行！ Nǐ tì wǒ dào yóujú pǎo yī tàng, xíng ma？ -- xíng! Would you run over to the post office for me? — OK! or All right! 在快車道上騎車可不行。 Zài kuàichēdào shàng qíchē kě bùxíng. Cycling along the motorway is not allowed. 咱們走著去, 行不行？ Zánmen zǒuzhe qù, xíng bù xíng？ Will it be all right if we go on foot? 6 (of medicine) take effect 感覺藥性已行 Gǎnjué yàoxìng yǐ xíng feel that medicine is taking effect 
adjective 1 temporary; makeshift See 33510656行營xing2ying2行營;33511936行灶xing2zao4 行灶 2 capable; competent 不要認為只有自己才行。 Bùyào rènwéi zhǐyǒu zìjǐ cái xíng. Don’t think you’re the only capable one. 老王, 你真行！ Lǎo wáng, nǐ zhēn xíng! Lao Wang, you are really terrific (or something great)! 你看他幹這工作行嗎？ Nǐ kàn tā gàn zhè gōngzuò xíng ma？ Do you think he is up to it? 
adverb literary soon 別來行復四年。 Bié lái xíng fù sì nián. It is four years since we parted.

noun surname; family (or clan) name “張”是大姓。 “zhāng” shì dà xìng. “Zhang” is a common Chinese surname. 
verb be surnamed 他姓王。 Tā xìng wáng. He is surnamed Wang. or His surname is Wang. 您貴姓？——敝姓陳。 Nín guìxìng？ —— bì xìng chén. May I know your surname? — (My surname is) Chen. 姓“資”還是姓“社” xìng “zī” háishixìng “shè” socialist or capitalist; pertaining to socialism or capitalism
noun 1 week 三個星期 Sān ge xīngqī three weeks 2 [before 日, 一, 二, 三, 四, 五, 六, 幾] day of the week 今天星期幾？ Jīntiān xīngqī jǐ？ What day (of the week) is it today? 3 abbreviation Sunday (Sun.)
noun New Year 新年獻詞 Xīnnián xiàncí New Year message 新年好！ Xīnnián hǎo! Happy New Year!

verb 1 have (or take) a rest; rest; have a break 休息一會兒 xiūxi yīhuìr rest for a while; have a rest 課間休息 kèjiān xiūxi break (between classes) 幕間休息 mùjiān xiūxi intermission 2 have a holiday (or vacation) 休息一天 xiūxi yī tiān have (or take) a day off 百貨公司元旦不休息。 Bǎihuò gōngsī Yuándàn bù xiūxi. The department store is open as usual on New Year’s Day.

noun 1 learning; knowledge 博學 bóxué learned; erudite 2 subject of study; branch of learning 數學 shùxué mathematics 文學 wénxué literature 3 school; college 大學 dàxué university; college 上學 shàngxué go to school; attend school; be at school 
verb 1 study; learn 學外語 xué wàiyǔ learn (or study) a foreign language 學文化 xué wénhuà acquire an elementary education; learn to read and write 學先進 xué xiānjìn emulate the advanced 學游泳 xué yóuyǒng learn swimming 把新技術學到手 bǎ xīn jìshù xué dào shǒu master a new skill 學而不化, 不如不學。 xué ér bù huà, bùrú bù xué. Better unlearned than ill-learned. 學而不思則罔；思而不學則殆。(《論語》) xué ér bù sī zé wǎng; sī ér bù xué zé dài. Learning without thought means labour lost; thought without learning is perilous. 2 imitate; mimic 這孩子學他爸爸走路的樣子。 Zhè háizi xué tā bàba zǒulù de yàngzi. The boy imitates his father’s way of walking.
noun school term; term; semester 學期論文 xuéqī lùnwén term paper

noun 1 student; pupil 醫科學生 yīkē xuésheng medical student 學生勤奮學習, 就是對老師的報答。 xuésheng qínfèn xuéxí, jiùshì duì lǎoshī de bàodá. A diligent scholar, and the master paid. 2 disciple; follower 3 dialect boy; lad
noun school; educational institution 高等學校 gāoděng xuéxiào institution of higher learning 師範學校 shīfàn xuéxiào teachers’ (or normal) school 專業學校 zhuānyè xuéxiào specialized (or vocational) school

noun main points; essentials 擇要記錄 Zéyào jìlù note down the essential points 
adjective important; essential 要法 yào fǎ important method; necessary way 上述規定希嚴格執行為要。 Shàngshù guīdìng xī yángé zhíxíng wéi yào. It is imperative that the above rules be strictly observed. 
verb 1 want; ask for; wish; desire 誰沒有票, 問她要。 Shuí méi yǒu piào, wèn tā yào. Anyone without a ticket can ask her for one. 他要一架手風琴。 Tā yào yī jià shǒufēngqín. He wants an accordion. 我要了兩個菜。 Wǒ yào le liǎng ge cài. I ordered two dishes. 這雙鞋我還要呢。 Zhè shuāng xié wǒ háiyào ne. I want to keep these shoes. 2 ask (or want) sb. to do sth. 不是你要我來的嗎？ Bù shì nǐ yào wǒ lái de ma？ Wasn’t it you who asked me to come? 3 need; take 這活兒要不了這麼多人。 Zhè huór yàobuliǎo zhème duō rén. You don’t need so many people for this job. 這項任務要十天才能完成。 Zhè xiàng rènwu yào shí tiān cái néng wánchéng. It will take ten days to get the work done. 
verb 1 must; should; it is necessary (or imperative, essential) 借東西要還。 Jiè dōngxi yào huán. One should return what one borrows. 我要不要留下來？ Wǒ yào bù yào liú xià lái？ Shall I stay? 這個問題要仔細考慮。 Zhège wèntí yào zǐxì kǎolǜ. This question calls for careful consideration. 2 shall; will; be going to 要下雨了。 Yào xià yǔ le. It’s going to rain. 他快要回來了。 Tā kuàiyào huílai le. He will soon be back. 天要黑了, 快走吧。 Tiān yào hēi le, kuài zǒu ba. It’s getting dark. Let’s hurry up! 會議要到月底才能結束。 Huìyì yào dào yuèdǐ cái néng jiéshù. The conference will not end till the end of the month. 3 want to; wish to 他要學游泳。 Tā yào xué yóuyǒng. He wants to learn swimming. 我還有幾句話要說。 Wǒ háiyǒu jǐ jù huà yào shuō. I’d like to say a few more words. 4 [in comparisons to indicate an estimate] 樹蔭底下比屋子裡要涼快些。 shùyīn dǐxia bǐ wūzi lǐ yào liángkuai xiē. It is cooler under the tree than in the room. 
conjunction 1 if; suppose; in case 明天要下雨, 我們就不去了。 Míngtiān yào xiàyǔ, wǒmen jiù bù qù le. If it rains tomorrow, we won’t go. 他要來不了呢？ Tā yào láibuliǎo ne？ Suppose he can’t come? 我要趕不回來, 你替我說一聲。 Wǒ yào gǎn bù huílai, nǐ tì wǒ shuō yī shēng. In case I can’t get back in time, please apologize for me. 這有什麼可怕的, 要我就不怕。 Zhè yǒu shénme kěpà de, yào wǒ jiù bù pà. What is there to be afraid of? I wouldn’t be afraid if I were you. 2 [usu. with 就 or 就是] or; either... or... 要就去跳舞, 要就去聽音樂, 別處我不去。 Yào jiù qù tiàowǔ,  yào jiù qù tīng yīnyuè, biéchù wǒ bù qù. Let’s go either to the dance or to the concert. I won’t go anywhere else.

auxiliary classical 1 [at the end of a sentence, indicating an explanation or a judgment] 陳勝者, 陽城人也。(《史記》) Chén shèng zhě, yáng chéng rén yě. Chen Sheng was a native of Yangcheng. 何其毒也！ Héqídúyě! How pernicious! 2 [at the end of a question or rhetorical question] 何也？ Hé yě？ How is that? or Why so? 是可忍, 孰不可忍也？ Shì kě rěn, shú bùkě rěn yě? If this can be tolerated, what cannot? 3 [in the middle of a sentence, marking off a sentence element about which there is to be a statement] 大道之行也, 天下為公。(《禮記》) Dàdào zhī xíng yě, tiānxiàwéigōng. (《Lǐjì》) When the Great Tao prevailed, the whole world was one community. 
adverb 1 also; too; as well; either 你不去, 我也不去。 Nǐ bù qù, wǒ yě bù qù. If you’re not going, I’m not going either. 我妹妹也是售貨員。 Wǒ mèimei yě shì shòuhuòyuán. My sister is a shop assistant too. 中國是一個社會主義國家, 也是一個發展中國家。 Zhōngguó shì yī ge shèhuìzhǔyì guójiā, yě shì yī ge fāzhǎnzhōng guójiā. China is a socialist country, and a developing country as well. 2 [for emphasis, often before a negative expression] 她一天假也沒請過。 Tā yī tiān jià yě méi qǐng guò. She has never asked for leave, not even for a day. 他忙得連飯也顧不上吃。 Tā máng de lián fàn yě gù bù shàng chī. He is so busy that he can’t even stop for a meal. 3 [used correlatively with 雖然, 即使, etc.] still; yet 你不說我也知道。 Nǐ bù shuō wǒ yě zhīdao. You don’t have to tell me. I know already. 我雖然沒見過, 也聽人說過。 Wǒ suīrán méi jiàn guò, yě tīng rén shuō guò. I’ve heard about it, though I have never seen it. 我怎麼想也想不起來。 Wǒ zěnme xiǎng yě xiǎng bù qǐlai. I simply couldn’t recall it however hard I tried. 4 [in a hesitant or guarded statement] 也只好這樣了。 Yě zhǐhǎo zhèyàng le. We’ll have to leave it at that. 他的英語也還可以。 Tā de Yīngyǔ yě hái kěyǐ. His English is passable. 這袋土豆也就一百公斤。 Zhè dài tǔdòu yě jiù yībǎi gōngjīn. This sack of potatoes weighs a hundred kilos at most.

noun night; nighttime; evening (opp. 日, 晝) 夜深沉 yèshēnchén dead of night 夜未央 Yèwèiyāng. the night is yet young; the night is not yet spent 冬天晝短夜長。 Dōngtiān zhòu duǎn yè cháng. In winter the days are short and the nights long. 三天三夜講不完。 Sān tiān sān yè jiǎng bù wán. It would take days to tell it all. 
verb dialect get dark; grow dark 天夜了。 Tiān yè le. The night is falling. or It’s getting dark.
noun at night

number 1 one 一萬一 yīwàn yī eleven thousand 一匹馬 yī pǐ mǎ a horse 一瓶牛奶 yī píng niúnǎi one bottle of milk 2 first 一級 yījí of first rate 一路車 yī lù chē No. 1 bus 一營一連 yī yíng yīlián First Company of the First Battalion 3 single; alone; only one 一槍就打中了目標 yī qiāng jiù dǎ zhōng le mùbiāo hit the target with a single shot 你一個人行嗎？ Nǐ yī ge rén xíng ma？ Can you manage all by yourself? 4 same 一根藤上的苦瓜 Yī gēn téng shàng de kǔguā bitter gourds from the same vine—people with a similar bitter past 意見不一。 Yìjian bùyī. Opinions differ. 這不是一碼事。 Zhè bù shì yī mǎ shì. This is another pair of shoes. 這姑娘跟她媽媽一個模樣。 Zhè gūniang gēn tā māma yī ge múyàng. The girl is the image of her mother. 5 whole; all; throughout 一冬 Yīdōng the whole winter; all winter; throughout the winter 他一臉的土。 Tā yī liǎn de tǔ. His face was covered with dust. 一包在內花了二百塊錢。 yī bāo zàinèi huāle èrbǎi kuài qián. I spent 200 yuan, fares, hotel, meals all included. 一屋子的人都歡騰起來。 Yī wūzi de rén dōu huānténg qǐlai. Everybody in the house was overjoyed. 6 every time 大家一提起那艱苦創業的日子, 總有說不完的話。 Dàjiā yī tíqǐ nà jiānkǔ chuàngyè de rìzi, zǒng yǒu shuō bù wán de huà. Every time we talk about the hard pioneering days, we have so much to say that we can’t get it all out. 7 also; otherwise 汞溴紅一名紅汞。 Gǒngxiùhóng yī míng hónggǒng. Merbromin is also known as mercurochrome. 8 concentrated; wholehearted 專心一意 zhuānxīnyīyì single-minded; concentrated 9 [indicating that the action occurs just once or lasts for a short time] a [in the middle of a reduplicated verb] 等一等 děng yī děng wait a bit 歇一歇 xiēyīxiē have a rest 笑一笑 xiàoyīxiào give a smile b [between a verb and a verbal measure] 咳一聲 hāi yī shēng give a cough 瞧一眼 Qiáo yī yǎn take a look 咬一口 yǎo yī kǒu take a bite 打他一巴掌 dǎ tā yī bāzhang give him a slap 10 [before a verb or a verbal measure to indicate an action to be followed by a result] 一查到底 yī chá dàodǐ investigate fully 一跳跳了過去 yī tiào tiào le guòqu get over in one jump 經他這麼一說, 大家又都有信心了。 Jīng tā zhème yī shuō, dàjiā yòu dōu yǒu xìnxīn le. His words restored our confidence. 醫生一檢查, 果然是肺炎。 Yīshēng yī jiǎnchá, guǒrán shì fèiyán. The doctor’s check-up confirmed that it was pneumonia. 11 [before a verb or an adjective, indicating the suddenness or thoroughness of an action or a change in the situation] 那馬猛然一驚, 直立起來。 Nà mǎ měngrán yī jīng, zhí lì qǐlai. All of a sudden the horse shied and reared in fright. 這部電影值得一看。 Zhè bù diànyǐng zhíde yī kàn. This movie is well worth seeing. 
adverb once; as soon as 他一回來我就告訴他。 Tā yī huílai wǒ jiù gàosu tā. I will tell him as soon as he comes back. 
preposition per; a 一班十個人 yī bān shí gèrén ten in a class 一小時六十公里 yī xiǎoshí liùshí gōnglǐ (at) 60 kilometres per hour 
auxiliary literary [before certain words for emphasis] 事態之嚴重一至於此！ Shìtài zhī yánzhòng yī zhì yú cǐ! To think that things should have come to such a pass! 吏呼一何怒, 婦啼一何苦。(杜甫《石壕吏》) lì hū yī hé nù, fù tí yī hékǔ. The officer’s shouting, how angry it was; | The woman’s cry, how mournful and bitter! 
noun music note of the scale in gongchepu (工尺譜), corresponding to 7 in numbered musical notation
number 1 hundred million 一億分之一 Yī yì fēnzhī yī one over a hundred million 2 archaic hundred thousand

noun 1 a bit; a little 有一點累 Yǒu yīdiǎn lèi feel a bit tired 這事我知道一點。 zhè shì wǒ zhīdaoyīdiǎn. I know a little (or something) about it. 還有一點希望。 Hái yǒu yīdiǎn xīwàng. There is still a gleam of hope. 2 [after 這麼 or 那麼, or with a negative expression] the least bit 一點也不累 yīdiǎn yě bù lèi not feel the least bit tired 一點都不知道 yīdiǎn dōu bùzhīdào have not the faintest idea 一點用處也沒有 yīdiǎn yòngchu yě méiyǒu utterly useless

adjective 1 fixed; specified; definite; regular 勘探隊員成天在野外作業, 沒有一定的住處。 Kāntàn duìyuán chéngtiān zài yěwài zuòyè, méiyǒu yīdìng de zhùchù. The prospectors are always out in the field and never settle down in a fixed place. 她一忙起來, 吃飯睡覺都沒有一定的時間了。 Tā yī máng qǐlai, chīfàn shuìjiào dōu méiyǒu yīdìng de shíjiān le. When she gets really busy, she doesn’t keep regular hours for eating or sleeping. 2 given; particular; certain 在一定程度上 zài yīdìng chéngdu shàng to a certain degree 在一定條件下 zài yīdìng tiáojiàn xià under given conditions 在一定意義上 Zài yīdìng yìyì shàng in a certain sense 3 proper; fair; due 達到一定水平 dádào yīdìng shuǐpíng reach a fairly high level 給以一定的重視 gěiyǐ yīdìng de zhòngshì attach due importance to 作出了一定的貢獻 zuò chū le yīdìng de gòngxiàn have made some contributions 具有一定規模的工廠 jùyǒu yīdìng guīmó de gōngchǎng fair-sized factory 4 necessarily; surely 兩者沒有一定的聯繫。 liǎngzhě méiyǒu yīdìng de liánxì. The two are not necessarily associated with each other. 
adverb certainly; surely; necessarily 星期天一定來啊。 Xīngqītiān yīdìng lái a. Be sure to come on Sunday. 告訴他一定不能說出去。 Gàosu tā yīdìng bù néng shuō chūqu. Tell him that under no circumstances is he to let it out. 我們的目的一定要達到。我們的目的一定能夠達到。 Wǒmen de mùdì yīdìng yào dádào. Wǒmen de mùdì yīdìng nénggòu dádào. Our goal must be attained. Our goal can unquestionably be attained. 他一定是被什麼要緊事拖住了。 Tā yīdìng shì bèi shénme yàojǐn shì tuōzhù le. He must have been held up by some urgent business. 可以口頭彙報, 不一定要寫成書面材料。 Kěyǐ kǒutóu huìbào, bù yīdìng yào xiě chéng shūmiàn cáiliào. An oral report will do; it isn’t necessary to put it in writing.
noun clothing; clothes 衣服裡子 yīfu lǐzi lining 外邊冷, 多穿些衣服。 Wàibian lěng, duō chuān xiē yīfu. It’s cold outside. Put on more clothes.
adverb altogether; in all; all told 一共多少人？ Yīgòng duōshao rén？ How many are there altogether? 一共二十個。 Yīgòng èrshí ge. There are twenty in all (or all told).

adverb already 已經兩點了。 Yǐjīng liǎng diǎn le. It’s already two o’clock. 這樣已經不錯了。 Zhèyàng yǐjīng bù cuò le. It’s good enough as it is. or It could be worse. 這點前面已經說過了。 Zhè diǎn qiánmian yǐjīng shuō guò le. This has been dealt with before. 我們已經十年不見了。 Wǒmen yǐjīng shí nián bù jiàn le. It’s ten years since we last saw each other.
1 one block 2 one piece 3 one (unit of money) 4 together 5 in the same place 6 in company
verb [as aux.] should; ought to 你應該知道。 Nǐ yīnggāi zhīdao. You ought to know. 你應該冷靜些。 Nǐ yīnggāi lěngjìng xiē. You should cool down. 事情就應該這樣。 Shìqing jiù yīnggāi zhèyàng. This is as it should be.
noun Britain; England; UK 英國護照 Yīngguó hùzhào British passport
noun English (language) 英文書 Yīngwén shū English books

conjunction because; as 因為天冷, 奶奶今天沒有出門。 yīnwei tiān lěng, nǎinai jīntiān méiyǒu chūmén. Grandma didn’t go out today because it was cold. 因為治療及時, 他的傷好得很快。 yīnwei zhìliáo jíshí, tā de shāng hǎo de hěn kuài. His wound healed quickly because of timely treatment. 
preposition because of; on account of; owing to 因為天氣的關係, 飛機不能按時起飛。 yīnwei tiānqì de guānxi, fēijī bù néng ànshí qǐfēi. Because of bad weather, the plane didn’t take off on time. 這花兒因為缺水死了。 Zhè huā'ér yīnwei quēshuǐ sǐ le. The flowers died for lack of water.

adverb 1 in the same place 住在一起 Zhù zài yīqǐ live in the same place 2 together; in company 我不跟他一起走。 Wǒ bù gēn tā yīqǐ zǒu. I won’t go along with him. 讓我們團結在一起, 戰鬥在一起, 勝利在一起。 Ràng wǒmen tuánjié zài yīqǐ,  zhàndòu zài yīqǐ, shènglì zài yīqǐ. Let us stand together, fight together and win together. 3 dialect altogether; in all 這幾件東西一起多少錢？ Zhè jǐ jiàn dōngxi yī qǐ duōshao qián？ How much is that altogether? 
noun dialect same group; same side 你們是一起的嗎？ Nǐmen shì yīqǐ de ma? Are you of the same group?

noun one time; once 一下拍死兩個蒼蠅 yīxià pāi sǐ liǎng ge cāngying kill two flies with one swat 拍一下他的肩膀 pāi yī xià tā de jiānbǎng give him a pat on the shoulder 親一下孩子的臉 qīn yīxià háizi de liǎn give the baby a kiss on the cheek 
adverb in a short while; all at once; all of a sudden 不能指望人們把舊觀念一下都拋掉。 bùnéng zhǐwang rénmen bǎ jiù guānniàn yīxià dōu pāo diào. One cannot expect people to get rid of their old ideas overnight. 天一下陰了下來。 Tiān yī xià yīn le xiàlai. It became overcast all of a sudden. 這天氣, 一下冷, 一下熱。 Zhè tiānqì,  yīxià lěng, yīxià rè. Look at this weather. It’s cold one moment and hot the next.

noun 1 meaning; idea 文章的中心意思 wénzhāng de zhōngxīn yìsi central idea of an article 你這是什麼意思？ Nǐ zhè shì shénme yìsi？ What do you mean by that? 我不明白你的意思。 Wǒ bù míngbai nǐ de yìsi. I don’t understand what you mean. 這個字的意思是什麼？ Zhège zì de yìsi shì shénme？ What is the meaning of this word? 2 opinion; wish; desire 我的意思是走著去。 Wǒ de yìsi shì zǒuzhe qù. In my opinion, (or I think) we should walk. 你是不是有意思跟她見見面？ Nǐ shì bù shì yǒu yìsi gēn tā jiàn jiànmiàn？ Do you wish to meet her? 3 token of affection, appreciation, gratitude, etc. 這是我的一點兒意思, 請收下吧。 Zhè shì wǒ de yīdiǎnryìsi, qǐng shōuxia ba. Please accept this little gift as a token of my appreciation. 4 suggestion; hint; trace 天有點兒要下雨的意思。 Tiān yǒudiǎnr yào xiàyǔ deyìsi. It looks like rain. 5 interest; fun 打橋牌很有意思。 Dǎ qiáopái hěn yǒu yìsi. Bridge is a lot of fun. 他這個人沒意思。 Tā zhège rén méi yìsi. He’s dull. 董事會鬧派系, 真沒意思。 Dǒngshìhuì nào pàixì, zhēn méi yìsi. All this factionalism in the board is so silly. 他覺得年畫展覽很有意思。 Tā juéde niánhuà zhǎnlǎn hěn yǒu yìsi. He found the exhibition of New Year pictures very interesting. 
verb colloquial [usu. reduplicated] as a mere token 她要走了, 咱們送她一條絲巾意思意思。 Tā yào zǒu le, zánmen sòng tā yī tiáo sī jīn yìsi yìsi. She’s leaving. Let’s give her a silk kerchief as a token of our friendship.
measure word a number of; certain; some; a few; a little 有一些國家 yǒu yīxiē guójiā some (or a number of) countries 作一些適當的調整 zuò yīxiē shìdàng de tiáozhěng make certain appropriate readjustments
noun chair

verb 1 have; possess; own 有辦法 yǒubànfǎ be resourceful; have a way 有背景 yǒu bèijǐng have powerful connections 有奔頭 yǒu bèntóu have a bright prospect 有出息 yǒu chūxī be promising 有版權的作品 yǒu bǎnquán de zuòpǐn work in private domain 有百利而無一弊 Yǒu bǎi lì ér wú yī bì have every advantage and no drawback 有兒才知父母恩。 yǒu r cái zhī fùmǔ ēn. Only when one has children does he know what parental love is. 她有熱情, 有朝氣。 Tā yǒu rèqíng, yǒu zhāoqì. She is full of vigour and enthusiasm. 2 there is; exist; contain 有必要 yǒu bìyào oblige; be necessary 有電話找你。 yǒu diànhuà zhǎo nǐ. A phone call for you. 有飯大家吃。 yǒu fàn dàjiā chī. If there is food, let everyone share it. 屋裡有人嗎？ Wū lǐ yǒurén ma？ Anybody in the room? 這座位有人嗎？ Zhè zuò wèi yǒu rén ma？ Is this seat taken? 還有許多工作要做。 Háiyǒu xǔduō gōngzuò yào zuò. Much still remains to be done. 3 [making an estimate or a comparison] 他有十歲了吧？ Tā yǒu shí suì le ba？ He is about ten, I guess. 問題有那麼嚴重嗎？ Wèntí yǒu nàme yánzhòng ma？ Is the problem that serious? 我不知道魚還有那麼貴。 Wǒ bù zhīdao yú háiyǒu nàme guì. I didn’t know fish was that expensive. 4 [indicating action] 有很大進步 yǒu hěn dà jìnbù make great progress 一有問題就去解決 yī yǒu wèntí jiù qù jiějué deal with a problem as soon as it crops up 有消息就通知我。 yǒu xiāoxi jiù tōngzhī wǒ. Keep me informed. 形勢有了新發展。 Xíngshì yǒu le xīn fāzhǎn. There are new developments in the situation. 5 [denoting condition or concession] 有水便有魚。 yǒu shuǐ biànyǒu yú. If there’s water, there must be fish. 6 [expressing the idea of having plenty of or lasting a long period] 有本事 yǒu běnshi be capable 有經驗 yǒu jīngyàn be experienced 有學問 yǒuxuéwèn be well-learned; be a scholar 有了年紀 yǒu le niánjì be getting on in years 她結婚可有些年頭了。 Tā jiéhūn kě yǒu xiē niántóu le. She has married for years. 7 [expressing an indefinite reference] 有保留 yǒu bǎoliú with a hook at the end 有時候 yǒushíhou sometimes 有人說可以, 有人說不可以。 Yǒurén shuō kěyǐ, yǒurén shuō bù kěyǐ. Some say yes, some say no. 有些事還需要商量。 Yǒuxiē shì hái xūyào shāngliang. Certain things are still open to discussion. 有一天我在街上碰見他了。 Yǒu yī tiān wǒ zài jiēshang pèngjiàn tā le. One day I ran into him in the street. 這個措施有地方適用, 有地方不適用。 Zhège cuòshī yǒu dìfang shìyòng, yǒu dìfang bù shìyòng. This measure is suited to some localities, but not to others. 8 [after certain monosyllabic verbs to form single words] 這家伙懷有不可告人的目的。 Zhè jiāhuo huáiyǒu bùkěgàorén de mùdì. That fellow has an underhand scheme. 這種水果含有多種維生素。 Zhèzhǒng shuǐguǒ hányǒu duōzhǒng wéishēngsù. This fruit contains vitamins. 9 [expressing politeness] See 35079936有勞you3lao2有勞;35090944有請you3qing3有請 10 [answering a roll call] here; present “王鋼！”“有！” “wáng gāng!” “yǒu!” “Wang Gang!” “Present!” 
auxiliary dialect have 我有去過那裡。 Wǒ yǒu qù guò nàli. I have been there. 
affix literary [before the names of certain dynasties] 有夏 Yǒuxià the Xia Dynasty 有宋一代 yǒu Sòng yīdài the Song period 詩至有唐為極盛。 Shī zhì yǒu táng wéi jí chéng. During the Tang period poetry attained the acme of its development.

pronoun some 有的這樣說, 有的那樣說。 Yǒude zhèyàng shuō, yǒude nàyàng shuō. Some say one thing, some say another. 這些衣服有的好看, 有的不太好看。 Zhèxiē yīfuyǒude hǎokàn, yǒude bùtài hǎokàn. Some of these clothes look nice, some don’t.

adjective well-known; famous; celebrated 有名的產品 yǒumíng de chǎnpǐn brand name product 有名的地方 yǒumíng de dìfang well-known place 有名的科學家 yǒumíng de kēxuéjiā celebrated scientist 特別有名的跳水運動員 tèbié yǒumíng de tiàoshuǐ yùndòngyuán tremendously famous diver 他是個有名的調皮鬼。 tā shì ge yǒumíng de tiáopíguǐ. He held the reputation of being naughty.

adjective rich; wealthy 有錢有勢 yǒuqiányǒushì be wealthy and powerful; have money and power 有錢出錢, 有力出力 yǒu qián chū qián , yǒu lì chū lì let everyone do his best 有錢難買老來瘦。 yǒuqián nán mǎi lǎolái shòu. A thin body for an old man is beyond all money value. 有錢能使鬼推磨。 yǒuqián néng shǐ guǐ tuīmò With money you can make the devil turn the millstone. or Money makes the mare go. 有錢買馬, 沒錢置鞍。 figurative yǒuqián mǎi mǎ, méiqián zhì ān. One can afford for the horse but not for the saddle.— be willing to spend a large sum on something, but not a little extra to make it work; be penny-wise and pound-foolish
1 a bit 2 a little

verb take a fancy to; be attracted sexually 她對你有意思, 你難道沒覺出來？ tā duì nǐ yǒuyìsi, nǐ nándào méi jué chūlai? Aren’t you conscious of the attachment she has formed for you? 
adjective 1 significant; meaningful 他說的話很有意思。 Tā shuō de huà hěn yǒu yìsi. What he said was significant. 2 interesting; enjoyable; amusing 今天的晚會很有意思。 Jīntiān de wǎnhuì hěn yǒu yìsi. The party this evening was most enjoyable.

noun rain 雨夾雪 yǔjiāxuě sleet 雨打日曬 yǔdǎrìshài exposed to rain and sunshine 躲雨 duǒyǔ take shelter from the rain 被雨淋 bèi yǔ lín be wet with rain 雨小了。 yǔ xiǎo le. The rain has subsided. 雨下得很大。 Yǔ xià de hěn dà. It’s raining hard. 明天有雨。 Míngtiān yǒu yǔ. It will rain tomorrow

adjective 1 (of space or time) far away; distant; remote 遠山 yuǎnshān distant mountain 離這兒多遠？ Lí zhèr duō yuǎn？ How far is it from here? 到山頂上挺遠的。 Dào shāndǐng shàng tǐng yuǎn de. It’s a long way to the top of the mountain. 誰能看得這麼遠？ Shuínéng kànde zhèmeyuǎn? Who could have seen so far ahead? 遠在公元十一世紀, 中國已使用火藥。 Yuǎn zài gōngyuán shíyī shìjì, Zhōngguó yǐ shǐyòng huǒyào. Gunpowder was used in China as far back as the 11th century. 2 (of blood relationship) distant 遠表 yuǎn biǎo distant cousin 3 (of mind, learning, etc.) abstruse; profound 遠奧 yuǎn'ào abstruse; recondite 
verb keep away from; keep at a distance 遠避 yuǎnbì avoid and keep away from 他這個人很危險, 你最好遠著他一點兒。 Tā zhège rén hěn wēixiǎn, nǐ zuì hǎo yuǎn zhe tā yīdiǎnr. He is quite dangerous; you’d better keep away from him. 親賢臣, 遠小人, 此先漢所以興隆也; 親小人, 遠賢臣, 此後漢所以傾頹也。(諸葛亮《出師表》) qīn xiánchén, yuǎn xiǎorén, cǐ xiān Hàn suǒyǐ xīnglóng yě; qīn xiǎorén, yuǎn xiánchén, cǐhòu Hàn suǒyǐ qīngtuí yě. Attracting worthy men and repelling mean men—this achieved the glory of the Former Han; attracting mean men and repelling worthy men—this ruined the Later Han. 
adverb (of difference) by far; far and away 遠遠超過 yuǎnyuǎn chāoguò far exceed 我遠不及我姐姐聰明。 Wǒ yuǎn bùjí wǒ jiějie cōngming. I’m nowhere near as clever as my sister. 這個問題遠比那個重要。 Zhège wèntí yuǎn bǐ nàge zhòngyào. This problem is far more important than that. 城裡這家飯店遠比別家好。 Chénglǐ zhè jiā fàndiàn yuǎn bǐ bié jiā hǎo. This is by far the best hotel in town.

noun 1 moon 月下散步 yuè xià sànbù take a walk in the moonlight 2 month 本月 běnyuè this month; the current (or present) month 隔月 géyuè every other month 逐月 zhúyuè month by month 月是故鄉明。 yuè shì gùxiāng míng. Nowhere as in our native place is the moon so bright. 這孩子才兩個月(大)。 Zhè háizi cái liǎng ge yuè. The baby is only two months old. 3 monthly 月(收)入 yuèshōurù monthly income 月(津)貼 yuètiē monthly allowance 月產量 yuèchǎnliàng monthly output 4 fullmoon-shaped; round See 35452672月餅yue4bing5月餅
noun meteorology rainy season; monsoon (opp. 旱季)

verb 1 exist; be alive 人在人情在。 Rén zài rénqíng zài. Friendship lasts as long as the person remains. 他父親還在, 母親早就不在了。 Tā fùqin hái zài, mǔqin zǎo jiù bù zài le. His father is still alive, but his mother passed away long ago. 她人已去, 但精神永在。 tā rén yǐqù, dàn jīngshén yǒng zài. She is gone, but her spirit lives on. 問題還在, 並沒有解決。 Wèntí hái zài, bìng méiyǒu jiějué. The problem still exists and is not resolved yet. 2 be at, in, or on (a place) 你去那兒找他, 他準在。 Nǐ qù nàr zhǎo tā, tā zhǔn zài. Go and see him; he’s sure to be there. 他在家, 不在這兒。 Tā zài jiā, bù zài zhèr. He’s at home, not here. 你的鋼筆在桌子上呢。 Nǐ de gāngbǐ zài zhuōzi shàng ne. Your pen is on the table. 我父母在農村。 Wǒ fùmǔ zài nóngcūn. My parents are in the countryside. 3 depend on; rest with 去不去在你自己。 Qù bù qù zài nǐ zìjǐ. It’s up to you whether to go or not. 收不收他在學校領導。 Shōu bù shōu tā zài xuéxiào lǐngdǎo. His admittance rests with the school authorities. 學習好, 主要在自己努力。 Xuéxí hǎo, zhǔyào zài zìjǐ nǔlì. Getting good results in one’s studies depends mainly on one’s own efforts. 4 lie in; consist in 工作人員不在多, 而在有效率。 Gōngzuò rényuán bù zài duō, ér zài yǒu xiàolǜ. A staff need not be large but it must be efficient. 她美就美在那雙眼睛。 Tā měi jiù měi zài nà shuāng yǎnjing. Her charm lies in her eyes. 我們的希望在青年一代。 Wǒmen de xīwàng zài qīngnián yīdài. Our hopes lie in the younger generation. 學習貴在堅持。 Xuéxí guì zài jiānchí. Persistence is vital to study. 這首詩妙在含蓄而不明言。 Zhè shǒu shī miào zài hánxù ér bù míng yán. The appeal of this poem lies in inference rather than direct statement. 5 join or belong to an organization; be a member of an organization 在組織 Zài zǔzhī belong to a certain organization 6 be on the job or at the post See 35602688在職zai4zhi2在職 
preposition 1 at, in, or on (a place or time) 在會上發言 Zài huì shàng fāyán speak at a meeting 狗在地上打滾兒。 Gǒu zài dìshang dǎgǔnr. The dog rolled on the ground. 他在工廠工作。 Tā zài gōngchǎng gōngzuò. He works in a factory. 事情發生在去年。 Shìqing fāshēng zài qùnián. It happened last year. 陽光照射在水面上。 Yángguāng zhàoshè zài shuǐmiàn shàng. The sunlight fell on the water. 運動會安排在四月份。 Yùndònghuì ānpái zài Sìyuè fèn. The sports meet will be some time in April. 2 according to; in terms of 在黨內 zài dǎngnèi within (or inside) the Party 在此期間 zài cǐ qījiān during this period 在理論上 zài lǐlùn shàng in theory; theoretically 在我看來 Zài wǒ kànlai in my opinion; as I see it 在這方面 zài zhè fāngmiàn in this respect 在國際事務中 zài guójì shìwù zhōng in international affairs 在全國範圍內 zài quánguó fànwéi nèi throughout the country 在這種情況下 zài zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng xià under these circumstances 在黨中央的領導下 zài dǎngzhōngyāng de lǐngdǎo xià under the leadership of the Party Central Committee 在和平共處五項原則的基礎上 zài hépíng gòngchǔ wǔ xiàng yuánzé de jīchǔ shàng on the basis of the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence 
adverb 1 [indicating action in progress] 他在看電視。 Tā zài kàn diànshì. He’s watching TV. 他在幹什麼？——他還在睡覺呢。 Tā zài gàn shénme？ —— tā hái zài shuìjiào ne. What’s he doing? —He’s still sleeping. 她在游泳。 Tā zài yóuyǒng. She is swimming. 2 [used together with 所 (suǒ) and often followed by 不 (bù) to indicate emphasis] See 35597056在所不辭zai4suo3bu4ci2在所不辭;35597312在所不惜zai4suo3bu4xi1 在所不惜
verb polite expression goodbye; see you again

noun (early) morning 從早到晚 cóngzǎodàowǎn from morning till night 
adjective 1 early; in advance; beforehand 早兩天我還看見他的。 Zǎo liǎng tiān wǒ hái kànjian tā de. I saw him a couple of days ago. 早知如此, 我就不回去了。 Zǎo zhī rúcǐ, wǒ jiù bù huíqu le. If I’d know this beforehand I would not have gone back. 電影離開演還早哩。 Diànyǐng líkāi yǎn hái zǎo li. The film won’t start for a while yet. 火車早到了十分鐘。 Huǒchē zǎo dào le shí fēnzhōng. The train was ten minutes early. 你早點兒來。 Nǐ zǎo diǎnr lái. Come early. 他來得比我早。 Tā lái de bǐ wǒ zǎo. He came earlier than I. 爺爺睡得早。 Yéye shuì de zǎo. Grandfather goes to bed early. 2 polite expression good morning 
adverb long ago; as early as; for a long time 早在二十世紀初 Zǎo zài èrshí shìjì chū at the beginning of the twentieth century; in the early twentieth century 他早走了。 Tā zǎo zǒu le. He left a long time ago. 我早就想來看你了。 Wǒ zǎojiù xiǎng lái kàn nǐ le. I’ve been wanting to see you for a long time. 我早知道了。 Wǒ zǎo zhīdao le. I knew that long ago. or That’s not news to me.
noun breakfast
noun (early) morning 早上好。 Zǎoshang hǎo. Good morning.

pronoun 1 how; what; why 怎麼辦？ Zěnme bàn？ What’s to be done? or Now what? 怎麼你不告訴他？ Zěnme nǐ bù gàosu tā？ Why don’t you tell him? 你怎麼啦？ Nǐ zěnme la？ What’s the matter with you? or Is anything the matter? 你怎麼不去？ Nǐ zěnme bù qù？ Why aren’t you going? 你怎麼搞的！ Nǐ zěnme gǎo de! See what you’ve done! 你是怎麼來的？ Nǐ shì zěnme lái de？ How did you get here? 這是怎麼回事？ Zhè shì zěnme huí shì？ What’s all this about? or What’s happening? 這個字怎麼寫？ Zhège zì zěnme xiě？ How do you write this character? 我怎麼沒聽說過這事兒？ Wǒ zěnme méi tīngshuō guò zhè shìr？ How come I never heard of it? 2 in a certain way; in any way; no matter how 該怎麼辦就怎麼辦 Gāi zěnme bàn jiù zěnme bàn do what must be done 你怎麼說, 我就怎麼做。 Nǐ zěnme shuō, wǒ jiù zěnme zuò. I’ll do just as you say. or I’ll do whatever you say. 不知道怎麼一來我就滑倒了。 Bù zhīdao zěnme yī lái wǒ jiù huá dǎo le. Somehow I just slipped and fell. 健康的重要性, 怎麼強調也不過分。 Jiànkāng de zhòngyàoxìng, zěnme qiángdiào yě bù guòfèn. The importance of good health cannot be emphasized too strongly (or cannot be overemphasized). 他把怎麼來怎麼去都告訴了大家。 Tā bǎ zěnme lái zěnme qù dōu gàosu le dàjiā. He told us everything, from beginning to end. 這本詞典怎麼貴我也要買。 Zhè běn cídiǎn zěnme guì wǒ yě yào mǎi. I’ll buy the dictionary no matter how expensive. 3 [used in the negative as an understatement] (not) very; (not) much; (not) quite; (not) too 那個不怎麼貴。 Nàge bùzěnme guì. That’s not very expensive. 他不怎麼說話。 Tā bù zěnme shuōhuà. He doesn’t talk much. 今天我不怎麼舒服。 Jīntiān wǒ bù zěnme shūfu. I’m not very well today. 這個地方我不怎麼熟。 Zhège dìfang wǒ bù zěnme shú. I’m not very familiar with the place. 這首歌我還沒怎麼學會。 Zhè shǒu gē wǒ hái méi zěnme xué huì. I haven’t quite learnt the song yet. 4 [used by itself at the beginning of a sentence to show surprise] what 怎麼連你都不知道！ Zěnme lián nǐ dōu bù zhīdao! What? Even you don’t know! 怎麼, 他還沒來嗎？ Zěnme, tā hái méi lái ma？ What? Isn’t he here yet?
what's to be done

pronoun colloquial 1 how; what 你覺得怎麼樣？ Nǐ juéde zěnmeyàng？ How are you feeling? 你能把他怎麼樣？ Nǐ néng bǎ tā zěnmeyàng？ What can you do to him? or You can’t touch him! 後來這孩子怎麼樣了？ Hòulái zhè háizi zěnmeyàng le？ What became of the child? 演出的情況怎麼樣？ Yǎnchū de qíngkuàng zěnmeyàng？ How was the performance? 2 what's it like; how are things; what do you think 怎麼樣, 忙嗎？抽支煙吧。 Zěnmeyàng, máng ma？ Chōu zhī yān ba. How are things, busy? Have a cigarette. 騎車去怎麼樣？ Qíchē qù zěnmeyàng？ How (or What) about going by bike? 四個菜, 一個湯, 怎麼樣？ Sì ge cài,  yī ge tāng, zěnmeyàng？ Four dishes and one soup—what do you think? 3 in a certain way; in any way; no matter how 人家怎麼樣做, 你也怎麼樣做。 Rénjia zěnmeyàng zuò, nǐ yě zěnmeyàng zuò. Do as everybody does. 我怎麼樣做都不對。 Wǒ zěnmeyàng zuò dōu bù duì. No matter what I do, I’m always wrong. 4 [used in the negative as a mild understatement] (not) up to much 她唱歌不怎麼樣。 Tā chànggē bù zěnmeyàng. She’s not much of a singer. 這個電影不怎麼樣。 Zhège diànyǐng bù zěnmeyàng. The film is pretty lousy. 他一時不小心, 我們也不好把他怎麼樣。 Tā yīshí bù xiǎoxīn, wǒmen yě bù hǎo bǎ tā zěnmeyàng. We couldn’t be too hard on him because he was just careless.

verb 1 look for; try to find; seek 找礦 Zhǎo kuàng look for mineral deposits 找出路 zhǎo chūlù seek a way out 找答案 zhǎo dá'àn search for the answer 找工作 zhǎo gōngzuò look (or hunt) for a job 找機會 zhǎo jīhuì look for (or seek) an opportunity 找到油田 zhǎodào yóutián discover an oil field 2 want to see; call on; approach; ask for 找我有什麼事？ Zhǎo wǒ yǒu shénme shì？ What can I do for you? or What do you want to see me about? 有人找你。 Yǒu rén zhǎo nǐ. Someone wants to see you. 明天再來找你。 Míngtiān zài lái zhǎo nǐ. I’ll call on you again tomorrow. 出了問題可得找你。 Chū le wèntí kě dé zhǎo nǐ. If anything goes wrong, we’ll hold you responsible. 幹嗎不去找老楊幫忙？ Gànmá bù qù zhǎo lǎo yáng bāngmáng？ Why not go and ask Lao Yang for help? 
verb give change 甭找了。 Béng zhǎo le. Keep the change. [as a tip] 她找我二十元。 Tā zhǎo wǒ èrshí yuán. She gave me 20 yuan change (or in change).

noun 1 photograph; picture 小照 xiǎozhào one’s own small photo 2 license; permit 禁止無照行車。 Jìnzhǐ wú zhào xíngchē. No driving without a license. 
verb 1 shine; illuminate; light up 拿手電照路 Náshǒu diàn zhào lù light the way with a torch 車燈把大路照得通亮。 Chēdēng bǎ dàlù zhào de tōng liàng. The headlights lit up the road. 金色的太陽照在天安門城樓上。 Jīnsè de tàiyáng zhào zài Tiān'ānmén chénglóu shàng. The golden sun shines upon the gate tower of Tian’An Men. 2 reflect; mirror 照鏡子 zhào jìngzi look in the mirror 湖面照出了她的倒影。 Húmiàn zhào chū le tā de dàoyǐng. Her image was reflected in the lake. 3 take a picture (or photograph); photograph; film; shoot 這鏡頭可不容易照。 Zhè jìngtóu kě bù róngyì zhào. This scene is difficult to shoot. 這張照片裡我沒照好。 Zhè zhāng zhàopiàn lǐ wǒ méi zhào hǎo. I don’t come out well in this photo. or I don’t look good in this picture. 4 take care of; look after See 35899136照看zhao4kan4照看 5 notify 知照 zhīzhào inform 6 contrast 對照 duìzhào compare and contrast 7 understand 心照不宣 xīnzhàobùxuān understand each other without saying anything; tacit understanding 
preposition 1 in the direction of; towards 照這個方向走。 Zhào zhège fāngxiàng zǒu. Go in that direction. 2 according to; in accordance with 照規章辦事 zhào guīzhāng bànshì follow the regulations 照他們的說法 zhào tāmen de shuōfa according to what they say 照我看, 線路有毛病。 Zhào wǒ kàn, xiànlù yǒu máobing. I think there’s something wrong with the circuit.

adjective worried; excited; anxious 別著急, 安心養病。 Bié zháojí, ānxīn yǎngbìng. Just get better and don’t worry about anything. 冷靜點兒, 別著急。 Lěngjìng diǎnr, bié zháojí. Keep calm. Don’t get excited. 你著什麼急呢？不會有什麼問題的。 Nǐ zháo shénme jí ne？ Bù huì yǒu shénme wèntí de. What are you worrying about? Everything will be all right.
verb give change 售貨員找了我錢。 Shòuhuòyuán zhǎo le wǒ qián. The shop assistant gave (or handed) me my change. 這是找給你的錢。 Zhè shì zhǎo gěi nǐ de qián. Here’s your change.

noun camera 立體照相機 lìtǐ zhàoxiàngjī stereoscopic (or stereo) camera 全景照相機 quánjǐng zhàoxiàngjī panoramic camera 傻瓜照相機 shǎguā zhàoxiàngjī foolproof camera; fully automatic camera 數碼照相機 shùmǎzhàoxiàngjī digital camera 小型照相機 xiǎoxíng zhàoxiàngjī miniature camera; minicamera; minicam 製版照相機 zhìbǎn zhàoxiàngjī process camera 反射式照相機 fǎnshè shì zhàoxiàngjī reflex camera 折疊式照相機 zhédié shì zhàoxiàngjī folding camera

pronoun 1 this 這地方 zhè dìfang this place 這一回 zhè yī huí this time 這就對了。 Zhè jiù duì le. Now you’re on the right track. or Now that’s better. 這是新產品。 zhè shì xīnchǎnpǐn. These are new products. 這究竟是怎麼回事？ Zhè jiūjìng shì zěnme huí shì？ What’s all this about? 這才是好孩子！ Zhè cái shì hǎo háizi! That’s a good boy (girl)! or That’s a dear! 這消息我知道了。 Zhè xiāoxi wǒ zhīdao le. I’ve heard that news already. or Yes, so I’ve heard. 2 now 我這就走。 Wǒ zhè jiù zǒu. I’m leaving right now. 他這才知道鍛煉身體的好處。 Tā zhè cái zhīdao duànliàn shēntǐ de hǎochu. Only now does he see the benefit of exercise.

pronoun this side; here 到這邊來。 Dào zhèbiān lái. Come over here. 正義在我們這邊。 Zhèngyì zài wǒmen zhè biān. Justice is on our side. 踏遍青山人未老, 風景這邊獨好。(毛澤東) Tà biàn qīngshān rén wèi lǎo, fēngjǐng zhèbiān dú hǎo. (Máo Zédōng) Crossing these blue hills adds nothing to one’s years, | The landscape here is beyond compare.
pronoun these 這些日子我們特別忙。 Zhèxiē rìzi wǒmen tèbié máng. We’ve been particularly busy these last few days.
pronoun here 我們這裡一年種兩季稻子。 Wǒmen zhèlǐ yī nián zhòng liǎng jì dàozi. We grow two crops of rice a year here.

adjective 1 true; real; genuine (opp. 假,偽) 我真的要走了。 Wǒ zhēn de yào zǒu le. It’s true I’m leaving. 這幅宋人的畫是真的。 Zhè fú Sòng rén de huà shì zhēn de. This is a genuine Song painting. 2 clear; unmistakable 字音咬得真 zìyīn yǎo de zhēn pronounce words distinctly 你看得真麼？ Nǐ kàn de zhēn me？ Can you see clearly? 
adverb really; truly; indeed 真有你的！ Zhēn yǒu nǐ de! That was a smart! 他真信了。 Tā zhēn xìn le. He actually believed it. 你真不害臊。 Nǐ zhēn bù hàisào. You’ve got some nerve! 我真不知道。 Wǒ zhēn bù zhīdao. I really don’t know. 演出真精彩。 yǎnchū zhēn jīngcǎi. The performance was just splendid. 時間過得真快。 Shíjiān guò de zhēn kuài. How time flies! 這家伙真能說。 Zhè jiāhuo zhēn néng shuō. That fellow is very glib. 你通過了考試, 真行！ Nǐ tōngguò le kǎoshì, zhēn xíng! You’ve passed the exams—good for you! 給你添了不少麻煩, 真過意不去。 Gěi nǐ tiān le bùshǎo máfan, zhēn guòyìbùqù. I’m very sorry to have put you to so much trouble. 
noun 1 abbreviation calligraphy regular script 2 portrait; image; exact copy of sth. 寫真 xiězhēn portrait 傳真 chuánzhēn fax 3 literary natural instincts (or character, disposition); nature; inherent quality; origin See 59954659返璞歸真fan3pu2gui1zhen1返璞歸真

noun branch; twig 柳枝 liǔzhī willow branches 
measure word 1 [for flowers with stems intact] 一枝梅花 yī zhī méihuā a spray of plum blossoms 2 VARIANT OF 36123392支zhi1支2 II 1 [for long, thin, inflexible objects]

verb know; realize; aware of 我不知道這事兒。 Wǒ bù zhīdao zhè shìr. I know nothing about it. 你的意思我知道。 Nǐ de yìsi wǒ zhīdao. I know what you mean. or I see your point. 他們知道問題的嚴重性。 Tāmen zhīdao wèntí de yánzhòngxìng. They realize the seriousness of the problem. 我們知道在前進的路上還會有困難。 Wǒmen zhīdao zài qiánjìn de lùshang hái huì yǒu kùnnan. We know there will still be difficulties ahead.

noun 1 biology species 本地種 běndì zhǒng endemic (or local) species 外地種 wàidì zhǒng exotic (or foreign) species 老虎是貓科的一種。 Lǎohǔ shì māo kē de yī zhǒng. The tiger belongs to the cat family. 2 race; stock See 23077888黃種huang2zhong3黃種;17052160白種bai2zhong3白種 3 branch; division; kind; sort; type 工種 gōngzhǒng work category; type of work (in production) 語種 yǔzhǒng languages; language type 4 seed; strain; breed 麥種 Mài zhǒng wheat seeds 這水稻是什麼種？ Zhè shuǐdào shì shénme zhǒng？ Which variety of rice is this? 5 guts; grit 沒種 méizhǒng gutless; cowardly See 35119104有種you3zhong3有種 
measure word kind; sort; type 各種儀器 gèzhǒng yíqì all kinds of instruments 這種論調 zhèzhǒng lùndiào this sort of argument 一種現象 yī zhǒng xiànxiàng a phenomenon 四十種鋼材 sìshí zhǒng gāngcái forty types of rolled steel 他有(一)種以前從未有過的感覺。 Tā yǒu yī zhǒng yǐqián cóngwèiyǒuguò de gǎnjué. He felt something he’d never felt before.

noun China 中國大陸 Zhōngguó dàlù Chinese mainland; mainland of China 中國畫 Zhōngguóhuà traditional Chinese painting 中國話 Zhōngguóhuà Chinese (language) 中國結 zhōngguójié traditional Chinese knot 中國熱 Zhōngguórè Sinomania (great interest in Chinese culture) 中國人 Zhōngguórén Chinese 中國網 Zhōngguó wǎng Chinaweb 中國學 zhōngguóxué Sinology 中國字 zhōngguózì Chinese characters; Chinese writing 中國餐館 Zhōngguó cānguǎn Chinese restaurant 中國象棋 Zhōngguó xiàngqí Xiangqi; Chinese chess 中國猿人 Zhōngguó yuánrén Peking Man 中國概念股 Zhōngguó gàiniàn gǔ “China Concept” shares (sold on the Hong Kong stock market by a large Hong Kong firm whose business is based in China) 中國工程院 Zhōngguó Gōngchéngyuàn Chinese Academy of Engineering 中國共產黨 Zhōngguó Gòngchǎndǎng Communist Party of China (CPC); the Chinese Communist Party 中國科學院 Zhōngguó Kēxuéyuàn Chinese Academy of Sciences 中國同盟會 Zhōngguó Tóngménghuì United League of China (1905-1912, predecessor of the Kuomintang 國民黨) 中國證監會 Zhōngguó Zhèngjiànhuì China Securities Regulatory Commission 中國工農紅軍 Zhōngguó Gōng-Nóng Hóngjūn Chinese Workers’and Peasants’ Red Army (1928-1937); the Red Army 中國人民解放軍 Zhōngguó Rénmín Jiěfàngjūn Chinese People’s Liberation Army (PLA) 中國人民志願軍 Zhōngguórénmínzhìyuànjūn Chinese People’s Volunteers 中國社會科學院 Zhōngguó Shèhuì Kēxuéyuàn Chinese Academy of Social Sciences 中國新經濟峰會 Zhōngguó xīn jīngjì fēnghuì China New Economy Summit 中國移動互聯網 Zhōngguó yídòng hùliánwǎng China Mobile Net; CM Net 中國工農民主政府 Zhōngguó Gōng-Nóng Mínzhǔ Zhèngfǔ Chinese Workers’ and Peasants’ Democratic Government (in the revolutionary base areas during the Second Revolutionary Civil War, 1927-1937) 中國出口商品交易會 Zhōngguó chūkǒu shāngpǐn jiāoyìhuì China Export Commodities Fair (Guangzhou Fair) 中國共產主義青年團 Zhōngguó Gòngchǎnzhǔyì Qīngniántuán Communist Youth League of China 中國人民政治協商會議 Zhōngguó Rénmín Zhèngzhì Xiéshāng Huìyì Chinese People’s Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC)

noun 1 bell 這口銅鐘是明永樂初年鑄造的。 Zhè kǒu tóng zhōng shì míng yǒng yuè chū nián zhùzào de. This bronze bell was cast in the early years of Yongle of the Ming Dynasty. 2 clock 鐘停了。 Zhōng tíng le. The clock has stopped. 3 time as measured in hours and minutes 六點鐘 Liù diǎn zhōng six o’clock
noun Mid-autumn Festival (15th day of the eighth lunar month); Family Reunion Festival
noun colloquial hour 這齣戲演了三個半鐘頭。 Zhè chū xì yǎn le sān ge bàn zhōngtóu. The play lasted three and half hours.
noun Chinese (language or writing) (opp. 外文) 中文書刊 Zhōngwén shūkān books and magazines in Chinese 中文系 Zhōngwénxì Chinese department 中文信息處理 Zhōngwén xìnxī chǔlǐ Chinese data processing
noun noon; midday

verb 1 live; reside; stay 住城外 Zhù chéngwài live in the suburbs 住旅館 zhù lǚguǎn stay at a hotel 對面沒人住。 Duìmiàn méi rén zhù. Nobody lives opposite me. 他住在北京。 Tā zhù zài Běijīng. He lives in Beijing. 我住這間屋。 Wǒ zhù zhè jiān wū. I live in this room. or This is my room. 我們住上了新房。 Wǒmen zhù shàng le xīnfáng. We’ve moved into a new house. 2 stop; cease 雨住了。 Yǔ zhù le. The rain has stopped. 等風住了再走。 Děng fēng zhù le zài zǒu. Go when the wind drops. 3 [after a verb] firmly; to a stop 支持不住 zhīchíbuzhù cannot withstand; cannot hold out 拿住了, 別撒手。 Ná zhù le, bié sāshǒu. Hold tight and don’t let go. 她擋住了我的去路。 Tā dǎngzhù le wǒ de qù lù. She blocked my way. 這一下你可把我問住了。 Zhè yī xià nǐ kě bǎ wǒ wèn zhù le. You’ve got me there. or I don’t know what to say. 聽到這個消息我一下子愣住了。 Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi wǒ yīxiàzi lèng zhù le. I was struck dumb at the news. 悠揚的小提琴聲把我吸引住了。 Yōuyáng de xiǎotíqín shēng bǎ wǒ xīyǐn zhù le. The beautiful notes of a violin held me spellbound.

noun table; desk 把它擱桌上。 Bǎ tā gē zhuō shàng. Put it on the table. 
measure word [of a feast table, etc.] table; tableful 三桌客人 Sān zhuō kèren three tables of guests (at a dinner party) 一桌菜 yī zhuō cài a series of dishes for one table
noun table; desk

affix 1 [added to some nouns or noun morphemes] 亂子 luànzi trouble; mess 帽子 màozi hat 胖子 pàngzi fat person 旗子 qízi flag 推子 tuīzi hair clipper 2 [added to certain measure words] 這檔子事 zhè dàngzi shì this matter; this business 來了一伙子人。 Lái le yī huǒ zi rén. A group of people arrived. 我一下子想不起他的名字。 Wǒ yīxiàzi xiǎng bù qǐ tā de míngzi. I can’t recall his name at the moment.

verb 1 walk; go 走遍全國 zǒubiàn quánguó travel the length and breadth of the country 走很遠的路 zǒu hěn yuǎn de lù walk a long distance 走下主席臺 zǒu xià zhǔxítái step down from the rostrum 走群眾路線 zǒu qúnzhòng lùxiàn follow the mass line 走社會主義道路 zǒu shèhuìzhǔyì dàolù take the socialist road 走在遊行隊伍的前列 zǒu zài yóuxíng duìwu de qiánliè march in the van of the procession 走前人沒有走過的道路 zǒu qiánrén méiyǒu zǒu guò de dàolù break new paths; take untrodden paths 一直往前走 Yī zhí wǎng qián zǒu go straight ahead 這船一小時走十五海里。 Zhè chuán yī xiǎoshí zǒu shíwǔ hǎilǐ. The ship makes 15 knots. 2 run; move 鐘不走了。 Zhōng bù zǒu le. The clock has stopped. 你這步棋走壞了。 Nǐ zhè bù qí zǒu huài le. You’ve made a bad move. 這個錶走得很準。 Zhège biǎo zǒu de hěn zhǔn. This watch keeps good time. 打得贏就打, 打不贏就走。 Dǎ de yíng jiù dǎ, dǎ bù yíng jiù zǒu. Fight when you can win, leave when you can’t. 3 leave; go away 走開！ Zǒukāi! Get away! or Clear off! 我們該走了。 Wǒmen gāi zǒu le. It’s time we left. or We must be off now. 他把藍圖拿走了。 tā bǎ lántú ná zǒu le. He’s taken the blueprint away. 4 demonstrate a certain tendency See 78185187走高zou3gao1走高;78194147走強zou3qiang2走強 5 visit; call on 他們兩家走得很近。 Tāmen liǎng jiā zǒu de hěn jìn. The two families often visit each other. 6 euphemistic pass away 昨夜他安詳地走了。 Zuóyè tā ānxiáng de zǒu le. He died peacefully last night. 7 through; from 咱們走這個門進去吧。 Zánmen zǒu zhège mén jìnqu ba. Let’s go in through this door. 8 leak; let out; escape 走氣了。 Zǒu qì le. The gas is leaking. or The air is escaping. 9 depart from the original; lose the original shape, flavour, etc. 把原來的意思講走樣了 bǎ yuánlái de yìsi jiǎng zǒu yàng le fail to get the original meaning across; distort the original meaning

verb 1 walk; go on foot 孩子已經學會走路了。 Háizi yǐjing xuéhuì zǒulù le. The baby has learned to walk. 你們是坐車去還是走路去？ Nǐmen shì zuò chē qù hái shì zǒulù qù？ Will you go by bus or on foot? 打運動戰, 走路的時間常多於作戰的時間。 dǎ yùndòngzhàn, zǒulù de shíjiān cháng duōyú zuòzhàn de shíjiān. In mobile warfare, more time is often spent on the move than fighting. 2 leave; go away

adverb 1 [in front of an adjective or a verb] most; -est 最大 zuìdà the biggest 最美 zuì měi the most beautiful 最小 zuìxiǎo the smallest 最不發達國家 zuì bù fādá guójiā the least developed country 最基本的條件 zuì jīběn de tiáojiàn fundamental prerequisites 他最不講道理。 Tā zuì bù jiǎng dàoli. He’s most unreasonable. 我最喜歡吃巧克力冰激凌。 Wǒ zuì xǐhuan chī qiǎokèlì bīngjilíng. I like chocolate ice cream best. 2 [placed in front of a noun of locality, or a place word] farthest or nearest to (a place) 最東頭 zuì dōngtóu farthest to the east; at the very east end 最上頭 Zuì shàngtou farthest (or nearest) to the top; at the very top 
noun the utmost; the best (or highest, greatest, etc.) 鑽石之最 zuànshí zhī zuì the best (or biggest) of all the diamonds

noun 1 recently; lately; of late 最近幾天 zuìjìn jǐ tiān in the last few days; these last few days 最近的消息 zuìjìn de xiāoxi the latest news; recent news 最近一期的《英語學習》 zuìjìn yī qī de 《Yīngyǔ Xuéxí》 the current issue of English Language Learning 我最近很忙。 Wǒ zuìjìn hěn máng. I’ve been very busy lately. 2 in the near future; soon 最近要上演許多新電影。 Zuìjìn yào shàngyǎn xǔduō xīn diànyǐng. Many new films will be released soon. 
adjective nearest 最近的一家商店 zuìjìnde yījiā shāngdiàn the nearest shop

verb 1 do; make; produce; manufacture 做結論 zuò jiélún pass a verdict; reach a conclusion 做衣服 zuò yīfu make clothes 做長期打算 zuò chángqī dǎsuan plan for the long term 這種糖是甜菜做的。 Zhèzhǒng táng shì tiáncài zuò de. This sugar is made from beets. 這是你自己做的嗎？ Zhè shì nǐ zìjǐ zuò de ma？ Did you make this yourself? 2 cook; prepare 做菜 zuòcài cook a dish 3 do; act; engage in 做好本職工作 zuòhǎo běnzhí gōngzuò do one’s best at one’s job 從點滴的事情做起 cóng diǎndī de shìqing zuò qǐ start with little things 大事做不來, 小事又不做 dàshì zuò bù lái, xiǎoshì yòu bù zuò incapable of big jobs yet despise small ones 照正確的意見去做 zhào zhèngquè de yìjian qù zuò act upon correct views 共做了兩萬多個勞動日 gòng zuò le liǎngwàn duō ge láodòngrì did a total of more than 20,000 workdays 4 be; become 做演員 zuò yǎnyuán become an actor or actress; go on the stage 後來她做保育員了。 Hòulái tā zuò bǎoyùyuán le. Later she became a child-care worker. 今天開會由你做主席。 Jīntiān kāihuì yóu nǐ zuò zhǔxí. You’ll be the chairman at today’s meeting. 5 write; compose See 37179904做文章zuo4wen2zhang1做文章 6 hold a family (or home) celebration See 37179648做壽zuo4shou4做壽 7 used as; used for 這篇文章可以做教材。 Zhè piān wénzhāng kěyǐ zuò jiàocái. This article may be used as teaching material. 樹皮可以做造紙的原料。 Shùpí kěyǐ zuò zàozhǐ de yuánliào. Bark may be used as raw material for paper. 8 form or contract a relationship 做對頭 zuò duìtóu set oneself against sb. 做朋友 zuò péngyou make friends with 9 pretend; feign; do sth. for form's sake See 37181184做樣子zuo4yang4zi5做樣子 10 dialect kill 把人質做了 bǎ rénzhì zuòle kill the hostage
verb 1 cook rice 做米飯 zuò mǐ fàn cook rice 做了一鍋飯 zuò le yī guō fàn have a pot of rice cooked 2 do the cooking; prepare a meal; cook 做飯的 zuòfàn de a cook

verb 1 do work; do a deed; handle affairs 他做事做得很好。 Tā zuò shì zuò de hěn hǎo. He does his work well. 他在你們廠做什麼事？ Tā zài nǐmen chǎng zuò shénme shì？ What’s his job in your factory? 做事不能只憑動機, 不問效果。 Zuò shì bù néng zhǐ píng dòngjī, bù wèn xiàoguǒ. In any action, motive is important but so is effect. 2 work; have a job 他沒做事。 Tā méi zuò shì. He has no job. 他在鋼鐵廠做事。 Tā zài gāngtiě chǎng zuòshì. He works in an iron and steel mill.
noun yesterday
